story:
We’re using the best materials and components we can find to build an excessively quality watch. Italian Natural Leather, Swiss Ronda, and 316L Stainless Steel, to name a few.

 

 

 

 

This isn’t our first rodeo. The Quarter Century Watch will be our third watch collection to be created by crowdfunding. 

 

Our network of manufacturing partners is reliable, from the hand-made cases to the slide box packaging that the watch arrives in. 

 

 

 

By offering the QCW directly via Indiegogo we are able to cut out the retail channel, middlemen markups, brand exclusivity/scarcity, and offer a $450 watch for a quarter of the price. Seriously, try to find a better watch for a better price, and we’ll match it.

 

We've designed the QCW to be the best possible option out there. We were never satisfied with the options presented to us, and you can easily see why.

 

 

We wanted an excessively high quality, handmade watch useful & durable enough for everyday wear. The QCW is beautifully crafted for timelessness with a less is more approach to ensure durability and longevity. A classic minimal look without unnecessary features or fancy dials.

 

 

Our minimal design ensures a durable construction for years to come.

 

 

THESE WATCHES ARE BACKED BY A 25 YEAR GUARANTEE

First and foremost, these watches are built to last. You can finally get peace of mind. We're so confident that your Quarter Century Watch will be the most durable, everyday wear you'll ever own that we are backing them with a 25 year guarantee.

 


OVERVIEW : Built to last with premium components, minimalism, structural balance, and ergonomics in mind.

 

We chose a case with a convex design for optimal fit and comfort in everyday wear. Sometimes watches can protrude and dig into the metacarpal bones, causing discomfort in daily activities. Not the Quarter Century Watch.

 

Furthermore, the crown is generally the most uncomfortable part of a watch for everyday wearers. We opted for a 4PM crown position to solve this issue.

This design allows for your wrist to move and flex naturally without even the slightest abrasion. With the 4PM crown, you never have to deal with the discomfort of the crown and case digging into your metacarpal bones. 

No more minor long-term bruising, scratching of the skin, or deformities. This watch will truly be the most comfortable, ergonomic timepiece you own.

 

You can’t expect to have reliability at the highest level without a functional foundation and solid construction.

 

We wanted to keep the case minimal, at only 7mm thick and 41mm in diameter. To increase durability while maintaining a lightweight construction, we decided on a 316L steel case. This allows for a strong case that is also a perfect weight to the touch. It is the industry standard when it comes to luxury watches. 

 

It will hold up in daily use for over 25 years, guaranteed.

 

 

The case is to be sandblasted first, to have all the edges softened, but also brushed on the bezel, to offer a distinct, durable surface. It is 41 mm, which is a versatile size for any occasion.

 

 

 

Our designers and engineers have worked tirelessly to perfect this watch. In designing, we wanted to keep the watch functional and easy to read. An ultra minimal 2-hand analog face function was exactly all we needed.

 

 

When it comes to the watch that we designed for everyday wear for over 25 years, functionality was key. This is the epitome of enduring craftsmanship. 

 

 

 

 

While we don’t like to make light of potential risks for a watch in the field, our designers did just that. To top off a dependable construction, we will use the best crystal we have to offer. The highly demanded sapphire crystal, from the last project, comes standard with all Quarter Century Watches.

 

Sapphire crystals are made from minerals grown in furnaces. When the resulting material is removed from this, it’s not in the large sheets that glass emerges in, but rather in big blocks called “boules.” 

 

 

 

With our signature compass triangle at the 12 o'clock position, the Quarter Century Watch is a product of minimal design and understated precision detailing.

 

 

Every single minute detail of this timepiece was considered, from the spacing used between lettering, to the precision lume stripes on our hand markers. It is truly a product of purpose and precision.

 

 

 

The 316L steel backplate is secured with four steel screws. Logo and specifications are precision lasered after a classic brush finish.

 

 

 

Our vegetable-tanned leather is finished the old-fashioned way- with very little artificial treatment. This natural Italian leather is only minimally treated with a blend of organic oils and waxes to give it the perfect touch, and a spark of life. The raw leather will build character to develop a beautiful tone over the years with your wear. 

 

 

Our dyed leather will also break in to become soft and supple over time for comfortable daily wear. Additional strap options like tan leather will be available for add-on following the campaign.

 

 

 

 

Time is our constant companion, but even the most extravagant watch needs a reliable movement to keep it in regular motion. And Switzerland has earned itself an enviable reputation as a manufacturer of the finest watch movements. 

RONDA

 

Ronda has been committed to time for decades now. And the company today is one of the world’s largest manufacturers of precision electronic watch movements of innovative design.

 

As a family-owned company that is now in second-generation hands, Ronda attaches great value to maintaining its full independence. Their movements are debatably the most accurate in the world and built to last for many years.

 

 

As an added convenience, lume is subtly added to the hands to allow easy visibility at all times. 

 

 

With lume precisely painted onto the hands, your watch can be read easily when transitioning from bright to low light conditions. The watch will charge itself during the day and remain lit while in low light conditions.

 

 

OFFERED IN 3 CASE STYLES:

  • SANDSTONE GOLD // A timeless white dial on a gold case w/ natural leather strap.
  • PHANTOM BLACK // An upscale black on black look.
  • GRAPHITE STEEL // A classic steel finish w/ natural leather strap for a subtle everyday wear.


ADD-ONs

CLASSIC HAVOK COLLECTION (OUR 1ST COllection)

Our original collection is available to add onto any pledge. You may select a reward with a Classic Havok Watch or you can add it when you fill out your survey after the campaign. 

STRAPS

Additional straps in other colors such as tan leather will be offered for add-on after the campaign. All straps are 20mm in both the QCW and Classic Havok collections. More straps may be released as stretch goals.

  • TAN LEATHER STRAP // A rich tan, dyed onto top grain leather with oiled edges for durability.
  • BLACK LEATHER STRAP // A simple black band. Same as the Phantom Black QCW.
  • BROWN LEATHER STRAP // A vegetable tanned brown band that will age with a darker patina.
  • OLIVE NUBUCK STRAP // A classic army olive green in nubuck.
  • BURGUNDY NUBUCK STRAP // A dark burgundy nubuck.
  • more to come...

Add-ons will be available after the campaign in the surveys. Don't worry about adding on items for a custom order until then!

For the past 3 years we have chose to work with an established watch manufacturing group known for rigorous quality control. We have a great relationship with our manufacturing partners. We've thoroughly toured their facility multiple times and they are completely aligned with our goals. We visited their facility in the Summer of 2014 in detailed tours, and again in January 2015.

With multiple stages in the manufacture and quality check process, we are confident in their ability to deliver a quality product. We were impressed with their sophisticated manufacture process including different rooms for assembly, air pressure checkpoints, water pressure stations, 48-hour timekeeping accuracy test, and (of course) a drop test. All of their facilities meet all necessary regulation and code for operation.

Though they host the manufacturing of many large retail brands, the general managers made sure all of our requirements were met and accommodated. Their experienced staff and attention to detail was what made our decision to choose them so easy. We, at Elliot Havok, are extremely confident they will meet our needs.

We will offer the Havok watch at wholesale pricing with radical transparency. Not only should the watch be priced so that nobody breaks their bank, but what goes into the watch should be disclosed. You’ll know when we can make changes, add-ons, or stretch goals. But honestly, we really don’t know where we can improve this modern masterpiece.

SPECIFICATIONS:

  • Case Diameter: 41 mm 
  • Case Thickness: 7 mm 
  • Face Diameter: 37 mm 
  • Band Material: Genuine Leather Band 
  • Band Max/Min Length: 21cm/15.5cm 
  • Band Width: 20 mm 
  • Lug Width: 2.3mm 
  • Total Weight: 49g 
  • Case Material: 316L Steel 
  • Back Plating: Stainless Steel 
  • Clasp: Standard Buckle Clasp 
  • Clasp Material: Stainless Steel 
  • Dial Window Material: Sapphire Crystal Glass  
  • Display: 2-hand Analog  
  • Movement: Swiss Ronda 
  • Water Resistant: 5 ATM / 50 Meters 

SWISS RONDA MOVEMENT:

  •  Standard battery: 364 
  •  Standard battery life: 10 Years 
  •  Battery voltage: 1.5 V 
  •  Current consumption – typical: 0.23 μA 
  •  Current consumption – maximum: 0.3 μA 
  •  Useful torque minute – typical: 29 μNm 
  •  Operating temperature: 0 - 50 °C 
  •  Instantaneous rate: -10/ +20 sec/month 
  •  Resistance to magnetic fields: 18.8 Oe 
  •  Resistance against shock: NIHS 91-10 
  •  Model: 751E

 

We drew inspiration for the "Quarter Century" idea from our very first Elliot Havok Kickstarter- The Quarter Century Belt. The idea of something built to last over 25 Years was ambitious at first, but we wanted to build the reputation to create quality products, for a fraction of our competitors' prices. Kickstarter responded, and we were able to fund our very first project.

Then, in 2014, we launched the first Havok Watch Collection, becoming the most backed watch on Kickstarter with 4500 backers. And last year our Racer Chronograph raised over $350,000. We were only able to do so by offering the best product for the best price. Basically “the best bang for your buck”. We will never overcharge and dump ridiculous retail markups onto our supporters. We adamantly dislike when high designer markups are just passed onto the consumer.

Furthermore, we will offer the Havok watch at wholesale pricing with radical transparency, inspired by Everlane. Not only should the watch be priced so that nobody breaks their bank, but everything that goes into the watch should be disclosed.

This is absolutely the best watch, for the best price- bar none.

HAVOK TIMEPIECES ARE BACKED WITH A WARRANTY

We believe in our watches, and you should too. If anything were to happen to your watch, we hope that you will send it back to us for repair or replacement. We will cover all internal parts should they ever fail you. They are built so well, that we will cover them for 25 years.

POST-FUNDING

This is where Indiegogo comes in. We need your continued support to launch this specific line of watches. We are raising funding specifically for further R&D, manufacturing, packaging, and logistics for the QCW Havok Timepiece collection. Your support for the production of these affordable, quality watches will also make them available to all in the future. And of course, you will be the first to own a Havok Quarter Century Watch. Thank you for taking the time to check out the project.

Elliot Havok consists of a diverse team of creative product designers with cross-functional skills within the fields of design, development, and manufacturing. Our team encompasses over 20 years of combined experience in bringing innovative products to life. 

Steven will be spearheading the design and development of the QCW collection, while Bryan and Joe supervise logistics, communications, and backer relations. With the support of the rest of our experienced team including industrial and graphic designers, we are ready to build you a product that you can proudly support.

  

                  

 HI-RES GALLERY: HERE

It's super easy!
1. Decide how many Quarter Century Watches you would like then click the pink button that says, "GET THIS PERK."
2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
3. Receive and fill out the survey for color choices via email
4. We receive your color choices and prepare your watch. 
5. You receive your order and eternal convenience is in your hands :)

Seriously, try to find a better watch for a better price, and we’ll match it.A closer look at other options... We've designed the QCW to be the best possible option out there. We were never satisfied with the options presented to us, and you can easily see why.QCW w/ tan strap  We wanted an excessively high quality, handmade watch useful & durable enough for everyday wear. The QCW is beautifully crafted for timelessness with a less is more approach to ensure durability and longevity. A classic minimal look without unnecessary features or fancy dials.  Our minimal design ensures a durable construction for years to come. QCW is sized for women as well! THESE WATCHES ARE BACKED BY A 25 YEAR GUARANTEEFirst and foremost, these watches are built to last. You can finally get peace of mind. We're so confident that your Quarter Century Watch will be the most durable, everyday wear you'll ever own that we are backing them with a 25 year guarantee.  OVERVIEW : Built to last with premium components, minimalism, structural balance, and ergonomics in mind. We chose a case with a convex design for optimal fit and comfort in everyday wear. Sometimes watches can protrude and dig into the metacarpal bones, causing discomfort in daily activities. Not the Quarter Century Watch. Furthermore, the crown is generally the most uncomfortable part of a watch for everyday wearers. We opted for a 4PM crown position to solve this issue.This design allows for your wrist to move and flex naturally without even the slightest abrasion. With the 4PM crown, you never have to deal with the discomfort of the crown and case digging into your metacarpal bones. No more minor long-term bruising, scratching of the skin, or deformities. This watch will truly be the most comfortable, ergonomic timepiece you own. You can’t expect to have reliability at the highest level without a functional foundation and solid construction. We wanted to keep the case minimal, at only 7mm thick and 41mm in diameter. To increase durability while maintaining a lightweight construction, we decided on a 316L steel case. This allows for a strong case that is also a perfect weight to the touch. It is the industry standard when it comes to luxury watches.  It will hold up in daily use for over 25 years, guaranteed.  The case is to be sandblasted first, to have all the edges softened, but also brushed on the bezel, to offer a distinct, durable surface. To top off a dependable construction, we will use the best crystal we have to offer. The highly demanded sapphire crystal, from the last project, comes standard with all Quarter Century Watches. Sapphire crystals are made from minerals grown in furnaces. When the resulting material is removed from this, it’s not in the large sheets that glass emerges in, but rather in big blocks called “boules.”    With our signature compass triangle at the 12 o'clock position, the Quarter Century Watch is a product of minimal design and understated precision detailing.  Every single minute detail of this timepiece was considered, from the spacing used between lettering, to the precision lume stripes on our hand markers. It is truly a product of purpose and precision.   The 316L steel backplate is secured with four steel screws. Logo and specifications are precision lasered after a classic brush finish.    Our vegetable-tanned leather is finished the old-fashioned way- with very little artificial treatment. This natural Italian leather is only minimally treated with a blend of organic oils and waxes to give it the perfect touch, and a spark of life. The raw leather will build character to develop a beautiful tone over the years with your wear.   Our dyed leather will also break in to become soft and supple over time for comfortable daily wear. Additional strap options like tan leather will be available for add-on following the campaign.    Time is our constant companion, but even the most extravagant watch needs a reliable movement to keep it in regular motion. And Switzerland has earned itself an enviable reputation as a manufacturer of the finest watch movements. RONDA Ronda has been committed to time for decades now. And the company today is one of the world’s largest manufacturers of precision electronic watch movements of innovative design. As a family-owned company that is now in second-generation hands, Ronda attaches great value to maintaining its full independence. Their movements are debatably the most accurate in the world and built to last for many years.  As an added convenience, lume is subtly added to the hands to allow easy visibility at all times.   With lume precisely painted onto the hands, your watch can be read easily when transitioning from bright to low light conditions. The watch will charge itself during the day and remain lit while in low light conditions.  OFFERED IN 3 CASE STYLES:

SANDSTONE GOLD // A timeless white dial on a gold case w/ natural leather strap.

PHANTOM BLACK // An upscale black on black look.

GRAPHITE STEEL // A classic steel finish w/ natural leather strap for a subtle everyday wear.
 ADD-ONsCLASSIC HAVOK COLLECTION (OUR 1ST COllection)Our original collection is available to add onto any pledge. You may select a reward with a Classic Havok Watch or you can add it when you fill out your survey after the campaign. STRAPSAdditional straps in other colors such as tan leather will be offered for add-on after the campaign. All straps are 20mm in both the QCW and Classic Havok collections. More straps may be released as stretch goals.

TAN LEATHER STRAP // A rich tan, dyed onto top grain leather with oiled edges for durability.

BLACK LEATHER STRAP // A simple black band. Same as the Phantom Black QCW.

BROWN LEATHER STRAP // A vegetable tanned brown band that will age with a darker patina.

story:
Le produit en lui-même est prêt, mais maintenant nous avons besoin du soutien de la communauté Kickstarter pour atteindre notre objectif et couvrir nos coûts.  

Si nous y arrivons, nous souhaitons utiliser cette technologie pour l'appliquer à tout le vestiaire masculin: pulls, chemises et vestes.  

Nous comptons l'appliquer pour le vestiaire féminin à horizon 2019.  

Voici ce dont nous avons besoin auprès de la communauté Kickstarter pour lancer la production et couvrir nos futurs coûts de développement:

Selon nous, le meilleur moyen de vous montrer la différence entre nos t-shirts et les t-shirts ordinaires est tout simplement de les comparer.  

On a donc invité des modèles minces, costauds et athlétiques à notre studio en leur demandant d'amener leur t-shirt favori. Puis on a fait les photos avant/après dont vous pouvez voir les résultats ci-dessous:  

(PS: Pour les plus sceptiques d'entre vous, les photos ont été prises selon les mêmes conditions.)

Modèle N°1: Mince - Ectomorphe

           Modèle mince - Vue de devant

La silhouette en V de Michele est bien plus accentuée. "J'ai l'air beaucoup plus costaud et moins maigrichon"

            Modèle mince - Vue de côté

Ici le torse de Michele semble plus large.

            Modèle mince - Vue de dos

A la place d'une silhouette mince, les muscles du dos et les trapèzes sont bien plus accentués.  

Modèle N°2: Athlétique - Mésomorphe

           Modèle athlétique - Vue de devant

Raphael fait parti des rares chanceux à avoir un torse naturellement en V. Pourtant, même avec sa silhouette, on voit bien que le cou, le torse et les trapèzes sont bien plus prononcés. La longueur du t-shirt est également bien plus adaptée que le M classique.

            Modèle athlétique - Vue de côté

Le t-shirt est généralement plus ajusté et les bras semblent clairement plus musclés grâce à la manche en biais.

            Modèle athlétique - Vue de dos

Ici encore, le haut du dos est accentué et la taille réduite. Selon Raphael: "Mon dos a l'air incroyable ! Je ressemble à Michael Phelps ! "

Modèle N°3: Costaud - Endomorphe

           Modèle costaud - Vue de devant

Pierre a une silhouette bien plus élancée et définie ici. Selon lui, " C'est comme si j'avais perdu 10 kg juste en changeant de t-shirts"

            Modèle costaud - Vue de côté

Vu de côté, le torse de Pierre est plus prononcé, son ventre est plus mince et ses bras plus définies.

            Modèle costaud - Vue de dos

Les trapèzes de Pierre sont accentués et il semble bien plus mince.

De manière générale, les t-shirts Morph permettent un fit plus précis et accentuent le V du torse pour chaque morphologie. C'est ce que permet notre technologie: la prise en compte de nombreuses données différentes sur les morphologies combinées à des techniques sartoriales et à l'intégration du nombre d'or. Nous sommes allés beaucoup plus loin que simplement définir une bonne coupe. Voici quelques explications à partir des détails de nos t-shirts:

Il est souvent compliqué de trouver la bonne taille lorsqu'on achète en ligne (surtout qu'elles varient d'une marque à une autre). Nous avons résolu ce problème en développant un système de taille basé sur votre morphologie et votre taille. L'expérience finale est simple et fun: vous trouvez votre taille en à peine 30 secondes et 2 clics. Plus besoin de renvoyer des achats à la mauvaise taille.  

Voici comment ça marche:

Le problème des vêtements mal coupés ou à la mauvaise taille est perturbant pour ceux qui sont un peu plus gros ou un peu plus petits que la moyenne. Voici ce que nous ont apprit ceux qui sont venus au showroom:

Avec nos neuf tailles différentes, chaque morphologie est prise en compte et personne n'est laissé de côté.  

On ne sait pas ce qu'il en est pour vous, mais en ce qui nous concerne ça ne nous flatte pas spécialement d'être un XS ou un XXXL. 

C’est pourquoi nous avons voulu créer un système de tailles plus amusant, inspiré de la mythologie grecque.  

Chez nous, toutes les tailles (qu’on appelle Archétypes) sont représentées par un héros ou un dieu de la Grèce Antique, illustré par un symbole.  

Ce symbole illustre le principal accomplissement du héros. Ces étiquettes de taille seront placées sur la manche droite, comme vous le voyez sur cette photo:

Nous espérons obtenir beaucoup de réactions et d'interactions amusées grâce à ce nouveau système de taille bien plus fun et attractif.  

PS: Pas besoin de choisir votre archétype pour le moment. Une fois le Kickstarter terminé nous enverrons un mail individuel à tous nos soutiens pour déterminer votre morphologie.  

PPS: Le système Morph est pertinent dans tous les continents et pour toutes les différentes morphologies: d'un grand Viking à un petit samurai.

 

us ne devriez du coup pas avoir de soucis pour trouver la bonne taille pour votre t-shirt. Si néanmoins vous souhaitez échanger votre t-shirt, pour n'importe quelle raison, c'est possible mais nous ne pourrons pas vous rembourser les frais de retours.  

Etant donné que nous commençons et que nos t-shirts sont distribués à un prix déjà fortement réduit, nous ne pourrons malheureusement pas accepter les retours.

      

The invention itself is made, but we now need the support of the Kickstarter crowd to reach our funding goal so we can start production and cover future development costs. 

If you help us succeed, we will be taking this technology and apply it to other male garments, such as jumpers, shirts and jackets. We aim to apply the same system and fit for women by 2019.

We found that the best way for us to show you the difference between our T-shirts and 'normal ones' is to literally compare them. So we invited a lean, stocky and athletic model to the studio and asked them to bring their favourite T-shirt. Then we made Before and After pictures. Check out the results below.  

PS: for the sceptics among you, the pictures were taken under the same conditions. 

 

Model Nr 1: Lean - Ectomorph

            Lean model - front view

You can see that Michele's got more of a V-shape and in his words 'I look much bigger. Less of a skinny guy'. 

 Lean model - profile

 Here Michele's chest looks more broad. 

 Lean model - back view

Instead of his usual lean figure, Michele's back and lateral muscles look much bigger. 

Model Nr 2: Athletic - Mesomorph

 Athletic model - front view

Raphael is one of the lucky ones with his naturally V-shaped body. However, even with him you can see that his neck, chest and trapezius muscles stand out more. The length of the T-shirt is also more suited to him, instead of his classical Medium.

 Athletic model - profile

The T-shirt looks better fitted in general and his arm looks more muscular thanks to the curved sleeve.

 Athletic model - back view

Here you see that the top of his back looks more broad and his waist looks slimmer. In Raphael's words: 'Man, my back looks amazing! I look like Michael Phelps'.  

Model Nr 3: Stocky - Endomorph

 Stocky model - front view

Pierre has got a much leaner and more defined figure here. In his words 'It looks like I've lost 10kg just by changing T-shirts'.

 Stocky model - profile

From the side, Pierre's chest has more bulk to it, his belly is slimmer and his arms more defined.

 Stocky model - back view

Pierre looks like he has got a bigger upper back and slimmer waist.

In general, Morph T-shirts provide a more accurate fit and pronounced V-shape with every body type. This is because of our technology, the integration of data with high end tailoring techniques and the Golden ratio. It's not just about fit anymore, we took it a step beyond. Here's some more details of our T-shirts with their explanation.

Because sizes are not the same from one brand to another it can be very difficult and frustrating to buy clothing online. We've solved this problem by developing a sizing system that's based on your specific body type and height.  

The result is a super easy and efficient sizing experience: it takes barely 30 seconds and 2 clicks to find your right size. So you won't have problems with finding your size or returning badly fitted clothing anymore.  

Here’s how it works:

 So the process of finding your right size is efficient AND fun.   

The problem of badly fitted clothing is especially troubling when it comes to guys that are bigger or smaller than the average. 

Here's some quotes of people that visited our showroom:  

With our 9 different sizes, each and every body type is covered, nobody is left behind.  

On top of that, we don’t know many guys that actually like to be an XS or XXXL, ourselves included. That’s why we decided to make a more inspiring sizing experience.

Using Greek mythology, we've developed a much cooler system where every size, or Archetype as we call it, is represented by an Ancient Greek Hero or God, illustrated by a symbol on the sleeve. So whichever your body type, everyone gets to be a Boss.

We hope that with this fun detail, people will feel proud of who they are and relate to each other in a more positive way.  

PS: Don't worry about your Archetype (size) for the Kickstarter. After the Kickstarter is over we will individually email all of our backers with a link to our homepage so they can find out their Archetype.  

PPS: The Morph sizing system is consistent in every continent AND it fits different kind of people too - from a big Viking to a small Samurai ;).

The T-shirts come in 3 different colours, a classic navy blue, a sporty marble grey and a classic bordeux.

 

To make our T-shirts super comfortable, sustainable and to prevent allergies, we decided to use high quality organic cotton.  

The T-shirts are hand made in Paris. We work together with the same ateliers that work with some of the most known luxury brands in the world (sorry, we can't actually disclose the names because of Kickstarter policy). All of this is to make sure that our T-shirt is the BEST T-shirt you will ever wear.  

First of all, the models we used are our friends. So normal people like you and me. However, if you’re still doubting, here are some before and after photos we took of people that came to our showroom, so you can see for yourself.

Here's some feedback of people that visited our showroom and tried on the T-shirts:  

PS: turn on CC for English subtitles.  

 

As we are just starting up and offering our T-shirts at highly discounted prices on Kickstarter, we won’t be able to accept returns. If however you wish to exchange your shirt for any reason, it is possible but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping.
story_txt:
Le produit en lui-même est prêt, mais maintenant nous avons besoin du soutien de la communauté Kickstarter pour atteindre notre objectif et couvrir nos coûts.  Si nous y arrivons, nous souhaitons utiliser cette technologie pour l'appliquer à tout le vestiaire masculin: pulls, chemises et vestes.  Nous comptons l'appliquer pour le vestiaire féminin à horizon 2019.  Voici ce dont nous avons besoin auprès de la communauté Kickstarter pour lancer la production et couvrir nos futurs coûts de développement:Selon nous, le meilleur moyen de vous montrer la différence entre nos t-shirts et les t-shirts ordinaires est tout simplement de les comparer.  On a donc invité des modèles minces, costauds et athlétiques à notre studio en leur demandant d'amener leur t-shirt favori. Puis on a fait les photos avant/après dont vous pouvez voir les résultats ci-dessous:  (PS: Pour les plus sceptiques d'entre vous, les photos ont été prises selon les mêmes conditions.)Modèle N°1: Mince - Ectomorphe           Modèle mince - Vue de devantLa silhouette en V de Michele est bien plus accentuée. "J'ai l'air beaucoup plus costaud et moins maigrichon"            Modèle mince - Vue de côtéIci le torse de Michele semble plus large.            Modèle mince - Vue de dosA la place d'une silhouette mince, les muscles du dos et les trapèzes sont bien plus accentués.  Modèle N°2: Athlétique - Mésomorphe           Modèle athlétique - Vue de devantRaphael fait parti des rares chanceux à avoir un torse naturellement en V. Pourtant, même avec sa silhouette, on voit bien que le cou, le torse et les trapèzes sont bien plus prononcés. La longueur du t-shirt est également bien plus adaptée que le M classique.            Modèle athlétique - Vue de côtéLe t-shirt est généralement plus ajusté et les bras semblent clairement plus musclés grâce à la manche en biais.            Modèle athlétique - Vue de dosIci encore, le haut du dos est accentué et la taille réduite. Selon Raphael: "Mon dos a l'air incroyable ! Je ressemble à Michael Phelps ! "Modèle N°3: Costaud - Endomorphe           Modèle costaud - Vue de devantPierre a une silhouette bien plus élancée et définie ici. Selon lui, " C'est comme si j'avais perdu 10 kg juste en changeant de t-shirts"            Modèle costaud - Vue de côtéVu de côté, le torse de Pierre est plus prononcé, son ventre est plus mince et ses bras plus définies.            Modèle costaud - Vue de dosLes trapèzes de Pierre sont accentués et il semble bien plus mince.De manière générale, les t-shirts Morph permettent un fit plus précis et accentuent le V du torse pour chaque morphologie. C'est ce que permet notre technologie: la prise en compte de nombreuses données différentes sur les morphologies combinées à des techniques sartoriales et à l'intégration du nombre d'or. Nous sommes allés beaucoup plus loin que simplement définir une bonne coupe. Voici quelques explications à partir des détails de nos t-shirts:Il est souvent compliqué de trouver la bonne taille lorsqu'on achète en ligne (surtout qu'elles varient d'une marque à une autre). Nous avons résolu ce problème en développant un système de taille basé sur votre morphologie et votre taille. L'expérience finale est simple et fun: vous trouvez votre taille en à peine 30 secondes et 2 clics. Plus besoin de renvoyer des achats à la mauvaise taille.  Voici comment ça marche:Le problème des vêtements mal coupés ou à la mauvaise taille est perturbant pour ceux qui sont un peu plus gros ou un peu plus petits que la moyenne. Voici ce que nous ont apprit ceux qui sont venus au showroom:Avec nos neuf tailles différentes, chaque morphologie est prise en compte et personne n'est laissé de côté.  On ne sait pas ce qu'il en est pour vous, mais en ce qui nous concerne ça ne nous flatte pas spécialement d'être un XS ou un XXXL. C’est pourquoi nous avons voulu créer un système de tailles plus amusant, inspiré de la mythologie grecque.  Chez nous, toutes les tailles (qu’on appelle Archétypes) sont représentées par un héros ou un dieu de la Grèce Antique, illustré par un symbole.  Ce symbole illustre le principal accomplissement du héros. Ces étiquettes de taille seront placées sur la manche droite, comme vous le voyez sur cette photo:Nous espérons obtenir beaucoup de réactions et d'interactions amusées grâce à ce nouveau système de taille bien plus fun et attractif.  PS: Pas besoin de choisir votre archétype pour le moment. Une fois le Kickstarter terminé nous enverrons un mail individuel à tous nos soutiens pour déterminer votre morphologie.  PPS: Le système Morph est pertinent dans tous les continents et pour toutes les différentes morphologies: d'un grand Viking à un petit samurai.


 



us ne devriez du coup pas avoir de soucis pour trouver la bonne taille pour votre t-shirt. Si néanmoins vous souhaitez échanger votre t-shirt, pour n'importe quelle raison, c'est possible mais nous ne pourrons pas vous rembourser les frais de retours.  
Etant donné que nous commençons et que nos t-shirts sont distribués à un prix déjà fortement réduit, nous ne pourrons malheureusement pas accepter les retours.

       
The invention itself is made, but we now need the support of the Kickstarter crowd to reach our funding goal so we can start production and cover future development costs. 
If you help us succeed, we will be taking this technology and apply it to other male garments, such as jumpers, shirts and jackets. We aim to apply the same system and fit for women by 2019.



We found that the best way for us to show you the difference between our T-shirts and 'normal ones' is to literally compare them. So we invited a lean, stocky and athletic model to the studio and asked them to bring their favourite T-shirt. Then we made Before and After pictures. Check out the results below.  
PS: for the sceptics among you, the pictures were taken under the same conditions. 
 
Model Nr 1: Lean - Ectomorph

            Lean model - front view
You can see that Michele's got more of a V-shape and in his words 'I look much bigger. Less of a skinny guy'. 

 Lean model - profile
 Here Michele's chest looks more broad. 

 Lean model - back view
Instead of his usual lean figure, Michele's back and lateral muscles look much bigger. 
Model Nr 2: Athletic - Mesomorph

 Athletic model - front view
Raphael is one of the lucky ones with his naturally V-shaped body. However, even with him you can see that his neck, chest and trapezius muscles stand out more. The length of the T-shirt is also more suited to him, instead of his classical Medium.

 Athletic model - profile
The T-shirt looks better fitted in general and his arm looks more muscular thanks to the curved sleeve.

 Athletic model - back view
Here you see that the top of his back looks more broad and his waist looks slimmer. In Raphael's words: 'Man, my back looks amazing! I look like Michael Phelps'.  
Model Nr 3: Stocky - Endomorph

 Stocky model - front view
Pierre has got a much leaner and more defined figure here. In his words 'It looks like I've lost 10kg just by changing T-shirts'.

 Stocky model - profile
From the side, Pierre's chest has more bulk to it, his belly is slimmer and his arms more defined.

 Stocky model - back view
Pierre looks like he has got a bigger upper back and slimmer waist.




In general, Morph T-shirts provide a more accurate fit and pronounced V-shape with every body type. This is because of our technology, the integration of data with high end tailoring techniques and the Golden ratio. It's not just about fit anymore, we took it a step beyond. Here's some more details of our T-shirts with their explanation.



Because sizes are not the same from one brand to another it can be very difficult and frustrating to buy clothing online. We've solved this problem by developing a sizing system that's based on your specific body type and height.  
The result is a super easy and efficient sizing experience: it takes barely 30 seconds and 2 clicks to find your right size. So you won't have problems with finding your size or returning badly fitted clothing anymore.  
Here’s how it works:

 So the process of finding your right size is efficient AND fun.   
The problem of badly fitted clothing is especially troubling when it comes to guys that are bigger or smaller than the average. 
Here's some quotes of people that visited our showroom:  

With our 9 different sizes, each and every body type is covered, nobody is left behind.  
On top of that, we don’t know many guys that actually like to be an XS or XXXL, ourselves included. That’s why we decided to make a more inspiring sizing experience.
Using Greek mythology, we've developed a much cooler system where every size, or Archetype as we call it, is represented by an Ancient Greek Hero or God, illustrated by a symbol on the sleeve. So whichever your body type, everyone gets to be a Boss.


We hope that with this fun detail, people will feel proud of who they are and relate to each other in a more positive way.  
PS: Don't worry about your Archetype (size) for the Kickstarter. After the Kickstarter is over we will individually email all of our backers with a link to our homepage so they can find out their Archetype.  
PPS: The Morph sizing system is consistent in every continent AND it fits different kind of people too - from a big Viking to a small Samurai ;).


The T-shirts come in 3 different colours, a classic navy blue, a sporty marble grey and a classic bordeux.

 

To make our T-shirts super comfortable, sustainable and to prevent allergies, we decided to use high quality organic cotton.  
The T-shirts are hand made in Paris. We work together with the same ateliers that work with some of the most known luxury brands in the world (sorry, we can't actually disclose the names because of Kickstarter policy). All of this is to make sure that our T-shirt is the BEST T-shirt you will ever wear.  

First of all, the models we used are our friends. So normal people like you and me. However, if you’re still doubting, here are some before and after photos we took of people that came to our showroom, so you can see for yourself.








Here's some feedback of people that visited our showroom and tried on the T-shirts:  
PS: turn on CC for English subtitles.  



 



As we are just starting up and offering our T-shirts at highly discounted prices on Kickstarter, we won’t be able to accept returns. If however you wish to exchange your shirt for any reason, it is possible but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping.

story:
Comma Fashion Showcase

Comma Fashion Showcase is an independent show held by fashion design and fashion marketing graduates from the Savannah College of Art And Design (SCAD), Hong Kong. This showcase - which features a capsule collection from each of the seven designers - will be the first time these young, fresh talents will present their exciting work to the public.

The meaning of the Comma has a symbolic significance. The Comma not the end of a sentence; instead, it is the continuation of it. In the same way, this fashion showcase does not signify the end; rather, it stands for a new chapter in their creative careers.

The purpose of the showcase is not simply to show off new work. Through this showcase, the designers aim to inspire others within the fashion industry, as well as any young individual who inspires to be a part of this dynamic and exciting field.

Our event will be held on 23 June at The Annex in Central, followed by a show in the Apple store at Tsim Sha Tsui the next day. The showcase will also be a used as a means to educate the viewer about the complexities behind fashion design by featuring not just the finished products, but also the process behind each designer’s collection. Sketchbooks featuring fabric samples and rough sketches will be available to the public for viewing. By doing this, the showcase aims to take the visitors on an amazing journey from a few simple concepts to beautiful garments on the runway.

What we need

As this is the first fashion show we are organising by ourselves, we are basically running the show from the production to marketing. With the kind help from fellow students, creatives and volunteers, we are able to put this show together. We also have found several sponsors for the event space, sound system and Hong Kong Fur Federation has graciously provided partial financial sponsorship. However, the simple show will still incur basic costs we cannot get sponsors for: 

  • Makeup for two shows and 15 models: USD1500
  • Food & drinks for 10 volunteers and 15 models: USD1500
  • Printing of look books and collaterals: USD500
  • Security for the event, transportation of our collections, visual merchandising for the show: USD500

The Impact

Every bit of your contribution would help us. This is the first and only time that all our graduate collections will be shown in its entirety to friends, family and more importantly, the local Hong Kong fashion industry professionals. It may actually be the only time this would happen! Your contributions would not only help seven designers to have a successful event but aid in supporting crew of three marketing students. 

To express our appreciation for your help, we have designed three leather products- earphone holder, coin pouch and card holder- which we will make and send to you as a 'thank you'! 

To learn more about our showcase, you can visit our website and RSVP to our event. Do feel free to ask us any questions and we will get back to you as soon as possible!

Thank you for your support!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Comma Fashion Showcase

Comma Fashion Showcase是由香港薩凡納藝術設計大學的時裝設計及時裝行銷及管理系畢業生所舉辦的一個展示會。時裝展羅列了七名年輕、具天份的設計師之作品，亦是他們首次向公眾展示其激動人心的作品。

Comma 不是一句句子的結尾，相反，它是一句句子的延續。同樣道理，此時裝展並不是意味着結束，而是開展設計師們創作生涯新的一頁。

時裝展目的不是單純展示新設計，而是希望能激勵從事時裝行業的人士，及鼓舞任何對此領域有興趣的年輕人。

是次時裝展將於6月23日於中環別館舉行，翌日移師尖沙嘴Apple Shop。通過今次演出，希望傳遞一個訊息給大家：時裝設計背後是一個大考驗，由設計者的構思，物料的選用至完成一件作品。藉此，大家能了解我們所用的質料，怎樣由簡單的概念變成一件走在天橋上的服裝。

我們的需要

這是我們自行組織的第一個從基本生產到行銷的時裝展。期間得到同學們、創作人員及自願人員的幫助，才能做好這次展出。我們還得到一些贊助商提供活動場地，音響系統及香港毛皮業協會慷慨地提供了部分財政贊助。然而，我們仍需為下列基本費用籌集資金︰

  • 兩場演出的15名模特兒及化妝：USD1500
  • 10名自願人員及15名模特兒的膳食：USD1500
  • 印刷Lookbook及保證金：USD500
  • 是次活動保安、展品運輸、推廣：USD500

你們每一分的支持都是對我們的幫忙。是次演出是我們的首次也是唯一一次向我們的家人和朋友，更重要的，是向本地時裝工業展示我們的作品。就此一次，不但使7位設計者夢想成真，亦是對3名時裝行銷及管理系同學的支持。

為答謝您的幫忙，我們設計了3款皮具產品 － 耳筒套、硬幣包及卡套以表謝意！

詳情請瀏覽我們的網站或到Eventbrite 登記出席活動。 如有查詢，我們定必盡早回覆！

story:
OUR STORY 

Hi! We're Charlotte and Sherene, co-creators of CoIX (pronounced COY). We're two proudly tall women who wear size UK 11/US 13/EU 46 footwear and have found the shoe shopping experience challenging and disheartening, to say the least. We grew frustrated with the lack of choices, poor fit and quality, and uninspiring styles and color options in footwear for our size. As modern, professional women we often wished we could also express our style confidently beyond our ankles. We resolved to create a solution to allow us to express our style and individuality from head to toe. #COIXshoesmystyle

Although we have different style compasses, we would agree our true North isn't guided by trends. CoIX was created out of a need for effortlessly chic footwear that transcends trends for people like us.

We want to create an uplifting shoe shopping experience and can't wait to see you excited about pulling together your whole look with CoIX shoes being the cherry on top! Choose your perfect pair of CoIX shoes to bring your next ensemble to life, whether it’s an important meeting you need to stand tall for or a night out on the town. CoIX shoes is here to finally help complete your style story.

 

ABOUT COIX 

CoIX is the footwear brand we (and you) have been longing for. A well-designed pair of quality made shoes is hard to come by. This could not be truer for people who wear larger shoe sizes, uncatered to and overlooked by mainstream fashion and footwear brands. We have struggled for years to find shoes that spoke to our fashion senses and versatile lifestyles. We found shoes that were trendy, but fit poorly, or made for comfort at the expense of style. CoIX (pronounced COY) was founded from our desire to have footwear that fulfilled all of these criteria. We also deserve the quality and array of choices in footwear that people who wear standard sizes have access to.

We launched CoIX to give you essential heels (and flats coming soon) to reclaim the shoe shopping and wearing experience for people like us, making it fun and pleasurable instead of an unfulfilling mission.

CoIX shoes offers smart, contemporary style combined with supreme craftsmanship. Our debut capsule collection showcases modern styles meet classic silhouettes, designed to be transeasonal footwear staples. Each pair is handcrafted in Spain to a high standard of quality. Perfect for all-day wear thanks to supreme cushion insoles that support your feet with each step. No longer will you need to sacrifice beauty for wearability, or accept the pain of beautiful shoes.

We are starting with just three sizes UK 9, 10 and 11 (US 11, 12 and 13 / EU 44, 45 and 46) with plans to expand to half sizes and wide widths in the future. We have found that shoe sizes vary from store to store, often running too small! You will find that our shoes run true to size, if not a little generously. Please see the size chart below to see if we have the right size for you.

 

OUR GOAL 

With the funds from this campaign, we will stock our debut AW19 capsule collection detailed below. You can pre-order a pair from our collection, shipping in early December, or simply donate to show support!

SUPPORT 

Please show support in any way you can. Any amount is appreciated! If you'd like to contribute to this campaign, without perks, you can simply click on the 'BACK IT' button at the top of the page. You’ll be able to enter the amount you'd like to contribute and choose your payment method.

Please note that if you select the 'BACK IT' button, you will only be donating funds in the amount you enter. In this case, you will not have claimed any perk.

 

PERKS

LUXURY SHOE BAG

Donate £30 (approximately $40) and we'll treat you to a luxury, CoIX branded shoe bag with a personal thank you note to show our appreciation. Our shoe bags are made of a lovely, soft white brushed cotton fabric with a delicate drawstring, perfect for protecting your shoes.  Choose the 'CoIX Luxury Shoe Bag' perk on the right.

 

PRE-ORDER COIX AW19 COLLECTION

Save up to 15% when you pre-order a pair of shoes from our debut collection through this campaign. Choose from our 5 styles, a selection of duos or order the entire collection! Each shoe comes in 2 colour options. You can choose your preferred colour and shoe size when you choose the perk you would like to order. 

Order our EARLY BIRD perks by Friday, 23rd November (Black Friday) to get FREE shipping!

All orders after the 23rd November will incur additional shipping charges. See more details in the Shipping & Returns section below. 

 

Check out our full list of perks and pre-order options on the right.

We truly appreciate every backer that helps us get closer to our goal of raising £5,000 and launching our dream. 

 

THE COIX AW19 COLLECTION 

 

We are excited to be launching with 5 classic styles, each available in 2 colours. All 90mm (3.5 inches) in height, this collection of essential heels combine smart style and elite craftsmanship for high-quality shoes you will wear time and time again for years to come. Each shoe is lovingly handcrafted by skillful shoemakers, with decades of experience, using the finest materials to ensure the highest quality and comfort. Constructed with a memory foam insole for maximum comfort, our shoes are not only gorgeous but comfortable enough to wear for hours on end. 

Be the first to own our limited collection of beautiful, handcrafted shoes you can’t get your hands on anywhere else. Every season will be a limited run with a small number of pairs available per style! If you love them, get them before they're gone!

 

Monaco Block Heel Sandal

Our Monaco sandal is perfectly poised to elevate your look with a comfortable mid-height block heel and wide front strap. The delicate ankle strap draws to a close with a gold-tone buckle. Available in a soft, mustard colored suede and a light pink Nappa leather, pair with a flowy skirt or blazer and jeans to step into the weekend. 

Heel height: 90mm | 3.5 in

Colours/Fabrics available: 

  • Sol Suede 
  • Ballet Slipper Pink Nappa Leather

 

Dalston Ankle Boot

Timelessly shaped with a pointed toe, the Dalston adds instant sophistication to a range of outfits. The sturdy, stacked block heel ensures all-day comfort, ideal for trekking through the city. Includes a zip closure on the instep. Choose between a soft black suede or buttery, smooth dark brown leather.

Heel height: 90mm | 3.5 in

Colours/Fabrics available: 

  • Maple Leather
  • Noire Suede

 

 Marylebone Block Heel Pump 

The versatile Marylebone pump offers a streamlined silhouette with a flattering low-cut vamp, almond toe and a sculpted block heel that's so easy to wear. Team this wardrobe essential with everything from denim to tailored separates for chic off-duty ensembles. Available in sumptuous suede in shades of blush rose and steel gray. 

Heel height: 90mm | 3.5 in

Colours/Fabrics available: 

  • Steel Suede
  • Rose Suede

Soho Stiletto 

A low cut vamp perfectly frames the foot and a slender pointed toe complements the heel on the Soho, our signature stiletto. Let them elevate everything from sharp tailoring to fluid skirts and fitted dresses. Perfect to take you from work to the weekend. Available in gorgeous fall shades of brick red suede and brown Nappa leather. 

Heel height: 90mm | 3.5 in 

Colours/Fabrics available: 

  • Chestnut Nappa Leather 
  • Autumn Suede 

Seville Ankle Strap Pump 

The Seville elegantly wraps around the ankle, while side cutouts reveal the foot in all its beauty. Understatedly chic and versatile in equal measure with a flattering pointed toe and a mid-height block heel, then lined with rose-beige leather for a comfortable fit. Style them with a pencil skirt for the office or with a fluid dress for an evening occasion. Available in black and dark grey suede.

Heel height: 90mm | 3.5 in

Colours/Fabrics available:

  • Noire Suede
  • Storm Suede

 

FIT/SIZE GUIDE


Our footwear is available in sizes UK 9 - 11 | US 11 - 13 | EU 44 - 46, normal width. We are working on introducing wide widths and half sizes in the future (please stay tuned).  

 

TIMELINE

 

SHIPPING & RETURNS 

Shipping

We will only be offering shipping of our shoes to the US, Canada, UK, France, and Germany. Our Early Bird perks include FREE shipping, available until Friday, 23rd November (Black Friday). Once the Early Bird window closes the following shipping costs will apply:

  • UK: £5
  • France/Germany: £15 
  • USA/Canada: £20  

 All duties, fees, and taxes applicable to these regions are included.

All shipments are insured against damage or theft from the point of collection through to delivery to you at the specified delivery address. We will cover the costs to insure the parcel.  

Please make sure that the delivery address is correct and complete to avoid returns due to packages that cannot be delivered. Before we ship your order, we will send you a note informing you that the package will soon be on its way. Once your order has been shipped, we will send you a confirmation e-mail containing your unique shipment number.  

Please send all questions regarding your shipment to us at info@coixshoes.com.

 

Returns and exchange  

We want you to be happy with your first pair of CoIX shoes. In case they don’t fit or you want to return them for any reason, you can do so within 14 days of receipt of your order. We will refund the full amount, apart from any shipping costs incurred. 

Please note that we do not offer a return shipping label. If you want to exchange them for another size, we will have to charge additional shipping costs. 

For further questions regarding your shoe size, please refer to our size chart or simply contact us at info@coixshoes.com

.

ABOUT THE FOUNDERS 

Hi! We're Charlotte and Sherene, the founders of CoIX, and we're so thankful you've read through our whole campaign so you could learn a little bit more about us. We're based in London working in business development and technology. Our friendship blossomed from a shared joy of music, TV, travel and all things tall girl related. We were inspired to start CoIX not only as a creative outlet, but to help empower others. This is just the start for CoIX, please join us on our journey — we can’t wait to share and grow with you. 

 

SPREAD THE WORD 

Know someone who would love CoIX shoes? Share our campaign with them and join our social circles!
story_txt:
OUR STORY 
Hi! We're Charlotte and Sherene, co-creators of CoIX (pronounced COY). We're two proudly tall women who wear size UK 11/US 13/EU 46 footwear and have found the shoe shopping experience challenging and disheartening, to say the least. We grew frustrated with the lack of choices, poor fit and quality, and uninspiring styles and color options in footwear for our size. As modern, professional women we often wished we could also express our style confidently beyond our ankles. We resolved to create a solution to allow us to express our style and individuality from head to toe. #COIXshoesmystyle 
Although we have different style compasses, we would agree our true North isn't guided by trends. CoIX was created out of a need for effortlessly chic footwear that transcends trends for people like us.
We want to create an uplifting shoe shopping experience and can't wait to see you excited about pulling together your whole look with CoIX shoes being the cherry on top! Choose your perfect pair of CoIX shoes to bring your next ensemble to life, whether it’s an important meeting you need to stand tall for or a night out on the town. CoIX shoes is here to finally help complete your style story.
 
ABOUT COIX 
CoIX is the footwear brand we (and you) have been longing for. A well-designed pair of quality made shoes is hard to come by. This could not be truer for people who wear larger shoe sizes, uncatered to and overlooked by mainstream fashion and footwear brands. We have struggled for years to find shoes that spoke to our fashion senses and versatile lifestyles. We found shoes that were trendy, but fit poorly, or made for comfort at the expense of style. CoIX (pronounced COY) was founded from our desire to have footwear that fulfilled all of these criteria. We also deserve the quality and array of choices in footwear that people who wear standard sizes have access to.
We launched CoIX to give you essential heels (and flats coming soon) to reclaim the shoe shopping and wearing experience for people like us, making it fun and pleasurable instead of an unfulfilling mission.
CoIX shoes offers smart, contemporary style combined with supreme craftsmanship. Our debut capsule collection showcases modern styles meet classic silhouettes, designed to be transeasonal footwear staples. Each pair is handcrafted in Spain to a high standard of quality. Perfect for all-day wear thanks to supreme cushion insoles that support your feet with each step. No longer will you need to sacrifice beauty for wearability, or accept the pain of beautiful shoes.
We are starting with just three sizes UK 9, 10 and 11 (US 11, 12 and 13 / EU 44, 45 and 46) with plans to expand to half sizes and wide widths in the future. We have found that shoe sizes vary from store to store, often running too small! You will find that our shoes run true to size, if not a little generously. Please see the size chart below to see if we have the right size for you.
 

OUR GOAL 
With the funds from this campaign, we will stock our debut AW19 capsule collection detailed below. You can pre-order a pair from our collection, shipping in early December, or simply donate to show support!
SUPPORT 
Please show support in any way you can. Any amount is appreciated! If you'd like to contribute to this campaign, without perks, you can simply click on the 'BACK IT' button at the top of the page. You’ll be able to enter the amount you'd like to contribute and choose your payment method.
Please note that if you select the 'BACK IT' button, you will only be donating funds in the amount you enter. In this case, you will not have claimed any perk.

 
PERKS
LUXURY SHOE BAG
Donate £30 (approximately $40) and we'll treat you to a luxury, CoIX branded shoe bag with a personal thank you note to show our appreciation. Our shoe bags are made of a lovely, soft white brushed cotton fabric with a delicate drawstring, perfect for protecting your shoes.  Choose the 'CoIX Luxury Shoe Bag' perk on the right.
 
PRE-ORDER COIX AW19 COLLECTION
Save up to 15% when you pre-order a pair of shoes from our debut collection through this campaign. Choose from our 5 styles, a selection of duos or order the entire collection! Each shoe comes in 2 colour options. You can choose your preferred colour and shoe size when you choose the perk you would like to order. 
Order our EARLY BIRD perks by Friday, 23rd November (Black Friday) to get FREE shipping!
All orders after the 23rd November will incur additional shipping charges. See more details in the Shipping & Returns section below. 
 
Check out our full list of perks and pre-order options on the right.
We truly appreciate every backer that helps us get closer to our goal of raising £5,000 and launching our dream. 
 

THE COIX AW19 COLLECTION 
 
We are excited to be launching with 5 classic styles, each available in 2 colours. All 90mm (3.5 inches) in height, this collection of essential heels combine smart style and elite craftsmanship for high-quality shoes you will wear time and time again for years to come. Each shoe is lovingly handcrafted by skillful shoemakers, with decades of experience, using the finest materials to ensure the highest quality and comfort. Constructed with a memory foam insole for maximum comfort, our shoes are not only gorgeous but comfortable enough to wear for hours on end. 
Be the first to own our limited collection of beautiful, handcrafted shoes you can’t get your hands on anywhere else. Every season will be a limited run with a small number of pairs available per style! If you love them, get them before they're gone!
 
Monaco Block Heel Sandal 

Our Monaco sandal is perfectly poised to elevate your look with a comfortable mid-height block heel and wide front strap. The delicate ankle strap draws to a close with a gold-tone buckle. Available in a soft, mustard colored suede and a light pink Nappa leather, pair with a flowy skirt or blazer and jeans to step into the weekend. 
Heel height: 90mm | 3.5 in
Colours/Fabrics available: 

Sol Suede 
Ballet Slipper Pink Nappa Leather

story:
Short Summary/Impact:

Altix Clothing Classic HEROSHOES: Brand new Low-style canvas shoes, aimed to bring hope, positivity, and unite the globe. Welcome to the future of Fashion.  Positive footwear that Unite the Ignite Hope.

Hey friends! Altix Clothing is in the process of designing our very first shoe (See attached sample photo) aimed to unite the globe and spread hope and positivity along the way. We introduce to you... the Classic HEROSHOES. 

Classic HEROSHOES are superiorly constructed canvas shoes, rugged, low-style, designed with full-print Altix-Inspired Positivity fueled artwork. Every pair of Classic HEROSHOES will contribute to the greater efforts of our mission to spread positivity and hope... with insanely cool shoes.

HEROSHOES are Altix Clothing's first line of completely branded footwear, offering a new product/social connecting experience. Here's how it works...

  1. Upon receiving your Classic HEROSHOES, you will be prompted via the attached information card, to take a photograph of yourself and your Classic HEROSHOES! Have fun! Be the original person you are.
  2. Send the photograph to Altix Clothing, including your optional name, and city-location.
  3. Your photograph of you and your Classic HEROSHOES will then be geotagged to you! On our brand-new revolutionary "Interactive World Map" displayed proudly on www.altixclothing.com ! 
  4. View other Classic HEROSHOES photographs from all over the country and beyond, as we demonstrate unity among the nations. Spreading HOPE and POSITIVITY in our message and actions along the way -

Your efforts will be presented for the world to see on www.altixclothing.com as we make history in this new and exciting wave of social-based fashion. Are you ready to change the world with us? The Classic HEROSHOES. 

- 10% profit for Every pair of HEROSHOES purchased will benefit our official partners at the Potter's House Organization of Guatemala. (Potter's House Organization Facebook page Image below) Discover more... https://www.facebook.com/pages/Potters-House-Guatemala/126010484392)

What We Need & What You Get

  • In order to make this world changing dream a reality, we need your help friends. Our team has been working tirelessly to design the freshest new footwear available with our established manufacturing friends. As final sample-production comes to an exciting finish, we need your help to turn these shoes into a reality. As you can imagine, a brand new footwear-brand production of this size comes with its expenses, such as the the shoe materials, shoe design, tooling costs, and the completion of the ultimate product itself. We have been working with our manufacturing friends for the last 5 months, and are all lined up! We just need your help to push forward -

Other Ways You Can Help

Let's spread the word like wildfire! Here we go -

  • Spreading the word on social media, email, to friends and family, all greatly helps! Facebook.com/altixclothing // twitter.com/Altixclothing
  • Check out the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out about this exciting new product.

Thanks friends - Let's do this!

The Above photos are the original HEROSHOE samples. Since their completion, we have made some design changes to the shoes. The photos below show the new sample with black outsole trim, smooth-outsoles, and black laces.  


Still to come... Logo on outsole heel of the shoes, printed insole (same pattern as canvas) and the option of BLACK canvas shoes, with white print. News and updates will be posted upon receiving. Here we go -

***Above Classic HEROSHOES photos are sample photos. Final shoes will be even more awesome then then these sample photos***

story:
My son and his football team, the La Jolla Torreys, have earned the chance to go to the Super Bowl for pop warner football. This is an once in a lifetime opportunity for these boys and their coaches. They get the chance to travel to Florida and experience the ESPN Wide World of sports complex at Disney World.

This is has been an amazing group of kids. At the start of the season they didn't have enough players to make a team. The boys were told they may not get a chance to play. The boys scrambled and were able to get just enough players to make a team. With just enough kids, most of the players play offense and defense during the whole game. They have worked so hard to accomplish their goals.

We are looking for your support. As you know taking a group of boys and coaches to Florida is a huge undertaking. Donations of any amount could help. If you have a business, or work for a business, looking to make end of the year donations please contact me.

Thank you for supporting these boys.

story:
Story of “PETLY”


“During your absense, prevent obesity with a healthy lifecycle”

PETLY is a pet appliance for a small dog/cat that automatically feeds dried food when the timer is set. Having your pet eating the set amount of food daily at a certain time help manage pet's health effectively while preventing from eating too much or eating all at once. Its simple design that matches to any interior embraces the message of RINN Inc. to "offer the high-quality and beautiful lifestyle", which is delicately handmade by those experienced engineers in Nagano Prefecture of JAPAN.



PRODUCT IMAGES

FEATURES

It features the simple yet beautiful design that blends right into any interior decor.

Compact size of “PETLY” is designed to fit into any spaces.

Easily operated with simple buttons and dials.
Settings are also simple.

Detachable repository and the food tray are washable.
You can keep them clean all the time.

The shape of “PETLY” is stable with its low center of gravity is designed so that it is difficult to fall when your pet had made a mischief. Also, we have designed the positions of  the buttons with consideration of possible errors made by pets.

The manufacturing of "PETLY" has been commissioned to a Japanese long-established electronics manufacturer with over 50-year history.Ther overwhelming technologies of Made in Japan bring you safe quality products.


petly.jp


　　　　　　
ORDER NOW
http://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B00ULBSTHY/

story:
WHO WE ARE: 

Bucco Couture is the first New Jersey Based Menswear Provider that offers a “Mobile Custom Tailoring Experience" to its many clients in the Metropolitan area.  The “Next Level” for us is to Market the Bucco brand more aggressively and provide career opportunities for our veterans and long-term unemployed members of the communities we serve.

WHAT WE DO: 

We provide our clients with Custom Menswear and Professional apparel in the convenience of their home or office. We dress our clients for where they are going with our team of “Best in Class” Wardrobe Consultants. The Bucco Experience combines the latest advances in men’s fashion with the best of “Old World” Tailoring and Service. We offer Suits, Slacks, Shoes, Sportswear, Leather Goods and Accessories to the most successful men from New York to Atlanta.

WHAT WE NEED:

We are raising $100,000, To Continue our Rapid Growth, Market the Bucco Brand, Establish our “Community Training Program” and Hire 4 Veterans or unemployed Americans as Wardrobe Consultants. Best of All, we intend to increase our support for "The Wounded Warriors and First Responders Charity's as they care for our Service Men and Women. 

HOW YOU CAN HELP: 
We are offering one of our Bucco Couture Custom Ties and a set of our Custom Designed Cuff-Links. These 2 High Value Gifts that will enable you to enjoy and share our products and provide us with the resources to complete our growth plan. We want to avoid the Big Banks and partner with you to achieve our goals and make a greater contribution to our community and our country.

story:
ORIGINAL JEWELS 




JOYAS ORIGINALES .DONDE TODO SE FUNDE A LA PERFECCION PARA CREAR UN ASPECTO NUEVO Y ORIGINAL

Que es  SergioMatias : es una nueva marca de joyería que combina las gemas naturales con los metales nobles como la plata y el oro . Nuestras combinaciones de colores intentan crear armonía entre los look desenfadados de la mujer moderna .

 Hemos elegido la libélula como logotipo porque es un ser vivo que denota energía , estabilidad y es un símbolo de la buena suerte .Simboliza el cambio en la perspectiva de la autorrealización, y el cambio tiene su origen en la madurez mental y emocional y la comprensión del significado más profundo de la vida. su fuerza y gran facilidad de movimiento ,puede recorrer hasta 80 km ,volar hacia delante hacia atrás y permanecer  quieta .En muchas culturas asocian las libélulas con el cambio ,si una libélula vuela cerca de ustedes es señal de que buenos cambios se les aproxima .



RECOMPENSA 1 

PRECIOSA PULSERA DE PLATA DE LEY CON CUENTAS DE LAVA VOLCANICA FACIL DE PONER, AJUSTABLE 
envío gratis península y baleares 

Please add $11 for international  shipping.

POR SOLO 34 $ PUEDE SER TUYA 



RECOMPENSA  2

PRECIOSA PULSERA DE PLATA DE LEY CHAPADA EN ORO AMARILLO CON CUENTAS DE CORAL .FACIL DE PONER, AJUSTABLE

envío gratis península y baleares 

Please add $11 for international  shipping.

POR SOLO 34 $ PUEDE SER TUYA

Quien promueve esta campaña ??????

 Mi nombre es Sergio y después de trabajar mas de 7 años en la industria de la moda y participar en creación de varias marcas de joyería he decido que es  momento de emprender un nuevo camino y crear esta maravillosa marca junto a un maravilloso equipo y para esto necesito vuestra ayuda.

Necesitamos vuestro apoyo para llevar acabo este proyecto y solo con vuestra ayuda lo conseguiremos .

Nuestro deseo  no es ser una marca de joyeria mas ,nooo nuestro sueño es con el tiempo crear una firma solida,apreciada y reconocida mundialmente y juntos podemos lograrlo.

DONDE IRAN LOS FONDOS

Los fondos iran destinados en el acondicionamento de un nuevo espacio de trabajo,en la creacion de nuevas colecciones ,nuevos envoltorios y  la creacion de una tienda online

¿PORQUE INDIEGOGO?

Hemos elegido esta manera de financiar nuestro proyecto porque llevamos un mes hablando con los bancos para conseguir financiacion y quiero darles las gracias por el tiempo que nos han dedicado ,les ha encantado nuestro proyecto y nos han felicitado por la pasion que le ponemos pero al final para concedernos el prestamo nos piden garantias que no podemos ofrecer asi que nos han derivado a inversores privados que estan deacuerdo en asociarse a nosotros pero pensandolo mejor no queremos que un tercero especule con nuestro trabajo con nuestro  sueño vendiendo su participacion en su momento oportuno , por eso queremos que ustedes sean nuestro socio ,nuestro amigo ...............

compare esta campaña en su facebook,twiter ,google+, compartela en el muro de sus amigos y pidale que a su vez la comparta .Has que esto se haga real 
gracias .......................................

story:
Our Mission

We are a team of engineers, designers, and creators who have represented some of the largest and respected retail brands in the world. We are excited to continue the same work, but as entrepreneurs building a brand we are passionate about. We're focused on bringing together distinct designs, comfort, and quality craftsmanship with each one of our products, and to start we're launching with a line of sunglasses we're really proud of.

This campaign represents the start of a brand and the culmination of many years dedicated to our craft. With your support, we'll be able to continue on this journey together.

 

Our Values

Our Approach to Craftsmanship

We are extremely proud of our designs and believe that it takes special craftsmanship to bring them to life. So we took them to the only place in the world we believed could accomplish this. Japan, a manufacturing culture known for precision, reliability, and durability. Where production is truly art. The Japanese have a saying, Shokunin, which means mastery of one’s craft.

Our journey brought us to a small coastal town 300 miles outside of Tokyo. A region notorious for expert sword making since the 14th century, craftsmen here have also been producing high-end optical frames for decades. After nearly a year of developing, iterating, and improving our prototypes with a team of master craftsmen, we're finally confident in putting our frames into the hands of our backers.

Our Approach to Lenses

We're bringing something completely new to the sunglass game with our Blackout Lenses, which are manufactured using a proprietary process that combines a UV light-adaptive layer with our signature Smoke Tint. The result: your glasses will have our signature Smoke Tint in the shade or indoors, but will quickly transform under direct sunlight. To those checking you out, your Blackout Lenses will have a richer, deeper and darker hue, giving you a distinct look that no other pair of sunglasses offer today. And by adapting to your surroundings, these lenses actually help combat eye strain and glare no matter how powerful the direct sunlight is.

We don't believe in distorting your vision or adding excessive flair to our lenses. All of our lenses are designed to decrease glare while maintaining true color perception. They are all UV 400, offering the highest quality of protection on the market today by blocking out 100% of UVA and UVB light.

All of our lenses are made with a dense synthetic resin that offers the clarity and durability of glass while remaining extremely light (half the weight of glass) and shatter-resistant. 

Our Approach to Comfort

We want our glasses to be so comfortable that you forget you're even wearing them. Light, balanced, and flexible. Many brands today are promoting frames made of exotic materials like walnut wood or bamboo. These often look great, but bottom line is they are extremely unforgiving and usually uncomfortable, like wearing a pair of picture frames on your face. We've stuck to time-tested materials like high-grade titanium, known for ultralight comfort. 30% stronger than steel, but nearly 50% lighter.

Our Approach to Style

Many of us are still rocking the same sunglass styles that were popular over 30 years ago. But everything else around us has changed. We've dropped the baggy jeans, the cargo shorts, and the fat ties. We believe it's time to step up our sunglass game as well. We're inspired by classic designs, but strive to create fresh, contemporary styles without the excessive flair. Let's say farewell to the Wayfarer.

Our Approach to Quality

We believe in only creating products we can stand behind. Too many brands today take advantage of loose product-labeling laws to convince their customers that their products are better simply because their label says they're "Made In" a country we associate with quality. Many glasses on the market, however, are actually mass produced in a different country from the one their label boasts, only to be shipped elsewhere for final labeling and packaging.

Our sunglasses are actually Made in Japan. Every part we source is from Japan, and our final products are 100% hand-assembled in Japan. Rigorous quality inspections are conducted after each stage of the manufacturing process, which means that every pair of our sunglasses is crafted with confidence.

Our Approach to Price

There's no doubt that many luxury & designer products are made with superior materials. But most of the premium we pay as consumers is for the brand (read more about Veblen goods).

We don't believe in price inflation. We're about building a sustainable, mission-based company that strives to deliver the very best products to our customers at price points that are accessible. We will only sell our products direct-to-consumer to ensure we are passing as much of the savings as we can to our customers. Compare our prices to other amazing sunglass brands handcrafted in Japan like Dita and Barton Perreira, which average well over $400 at retail.

 

Our Sunglasses

Specter Veil combines a classic silhouette with a low-profile design: 

  • Great fit for medium to wider faces, and will look amazing on most face shapes. Measurements are as follows: 
    • Width - 143mm
    • Height - 42mm
    • Length of Temple - 145mm
  • This frame comes in either Matte Black or Tortoise Shell
  • Premium Cellulose Acetate, a natural and renewable material derived from cotton and wood pulp
  • Brushed Matte Titanium Accents
  • Titanium Flex Hinges for Comfort
  • Reinforced with Titanium Wire Skeleton for Durability and Balance
  • Unisex

 

Specter Valor is constructed entirely of high-grade titanium, featuring this season’s most sought after flat-lens look:

  • Great fit for medium to narrower faces, and will look amazing on Square, Oval, and Heart face shapes. Measurements are as follows: 
    • Width - 140mm
    • Height - 41mm
    • Length of Temple - 145mm
  • This frame comes in either Matte Black or Gunmetal
  • 100% High-Grade Titanium
  • Extremely Durable, Lightweight, and Corrosion-Resistant
  • No-Slip Titanium Nosepads
  • Unisex

 

Both frames can we paired with any of our three lenses:

  • Our Proprietary Blackout Lenses, the first the world has ever seen. They go from a dark, yet comfortable tint in the shade to a much richer and darker hue under the sun, giving you a distinct look that no other pair of sunglasses offer today.
  • Our Polarized Smoke Lenses, coated with a special film that helps reduce glare and eyestrain, allowing you to see crisply and cleanly with a level of detail that may surprise you.
  • Our Signature Smoke Lenses, designed and tinted to decrease glare while maintaining true color perception.

 

Gallery:

     

     

    The Journey Ahead

    While we're confident in our plan and timeline, we want to acknowledge that we're still learning each and everyday. This really is just the start of our journey together. Your pledge will help us fund the first production run of our sunglasses ever and we're so excited to get these into your hands this summer. As sunglasses are considered Class 1 medical devices in the US and we're shipping our products straight from Japan, we are doing all the requisite work in advance to ensure a smooth import process. We will notify our backers immediately should we encounter any delays.

    Thank You so much for your support and please help us spread the word!

     

    FAQ

    Are your sunglasses available with prescription lenses?

    Unfortunately we do not offer prescription lenses at this time. If you'd like, we can send you our frames and you can ask your local optician or optometrist to help pair these with prescription lenses. Please email us at Support@SpecterStore.com to place an order.

     

    How many different colors and frame styles do you offer?

    We currently offer two frame styles, Veil and Valor. Veil comes in Matte Black or Matte Tortoise. Valor comes in either Matte Black or Matte Gunmetal. With your help, we'll be able to develop additional styles and colors, which we'll make available later this year.

     

    How do I select my Frame and Color combination?

    We will email you a form in a few days. Please reach out to Support@SpecterStore.com if you did not receive this or if you have any questions.
