story:
THE CALENDAR WATCH by What?

A watch that combines the heritage of watchmaking and one of a kind design with an always visible daily calendar that syncs with the most popular digital calendars, so you can see your day at a glance.

After careful testing and studies, we have come to the conclusion that the best user experience is achieved by making the Calendar Watch as simple as possible by leaving all extra features to our App and online calendars. There are no buttons or unnecessary functions. 

This is a new way to look at time. 

The Calendar Watch allows you to be on top of your game and gives you the ability to better manage your time.

The watch can also save you time because you are not constantly opening calendars for quick checks and it allows you to focus on what you should be doing. It is an efficiency tool to define your work life. Multitasking drops an average man’s IQ by 15 points (source: Stanford).

Nobody likes the guy who is constantly checking his phone at a restaurant, regardless of what’s so important on the screen. Don’t be that guy, yet still know what’s happening in your calendar. On average, a smartphone owner checks their phone 221 times a day (in UK, source: Tecmark) and we think that’s a bit too much.

The battery of the Calendar Watch lasts for weeks and keeps your schedule with you, even when your smartphone dies.

We didn’t want to complicate your life by adding another complicated device, we wanted to help make your life simpler.

Never be late for another meeting. Calendar Watch gives you more freedom from your phone, increases your productivity, and gives you peace of mind.

We have been getting some press attention!
Here is a selection of what the media has been saying about us and our new Calendar Watch:


The Calendar Watch is a real and lasting classic timepiece.

The watch is conceived and designed by renowned Japanese art director Masashi Kawamura, who has been featured on the FastCompany’s most creative people list, and Italian industrial designer Umberto Onza, who together have fused the aesthetics and demands of consumers who want to curate their own style with an eye toward story, craftsmanship, and individuality.

With its iconic, refined features, the watch pays tribute to the heritage of watchmaking. It’s polished stainless steel case provides a classic feel, with both comfort and durability, while it’s domed hardened K1 crystal glass is made to last.

You can choose from four models: Polar White, Aqua Blue, Special Edition Black and Verdant Green.The Polar White model has a polished stainless steel body and comes with a brown genuine leather strap with white stitching.

The Aqua Blue model has a matte stainless steel body and comes with a blue suede leather strap.

The Verdant Green model combines green tones with a matt gold effect case, together with pale gold color printed features and hour hand. Complimentary wristbands will also be made available.


The Special Edition Black model has a matte gun-metal black body and comes with a black genuine leather strap with a stylized texture.


The watch features two distinct modes, FIXED and FLEXIBLE, and you can switch between the modes with our accompanying App.

In FLEXIBLE mode the display will be updated segment by segment every 15 minutes, following the hour hand. In this mode, you always see the next 12 hours:


With FIXED mode, the display is completely updated every 12 hours and you can set the starting hour in our App. You can choose what you want the watch to show, for example maybe your work day from 9AM to 9PM, or 7AM to 7PM:



It’s up to you!

Automatic Time Syncing

The analog movements of the watch are synced with the digital components and the App. So the hands are automatically adjusted to the right time - even when you travel to different time zones.

Tapping Input 

By double tapping the watch, it shows your next 12-24h schedule for 5 seconds in both fixed and flexible modes. The watch also vibrates for 0.3 seconds as feedback. After, the display refreshes again and displays your 0-12h schedule.

With a triple tap your schedule is synced immediately with your phone (otherwise the watch automatically syncs every 15 minutes). The watch responds with two 0.3 second vibrations and an animation.

When in airplane mode, a triple tap will wake up the watch and turn on the Bluetooth.

Power Saving

When the watch has not detected any movement for 15 minutes, the watch enters its power-saving mode. This is visualized by the second hand stopping at the 12 o’clock position, while the hour and minute hands will continue to show the time. As soon as motion is detected, the second hand will jump to the correct time.

Notifications

The watch notifies you by vibrating and by flashing the particular event segment according the alert time you have set on your calendar. 

Time accuracy：±15 seconds per month (23℃ ± 5℃, 73F ± 41℃)
Operation temperature: 0℃ to +45℃ (32F to 113F)
Battery life：~3 weeks 
Battery: Li-ion (3.7V, 100mAh), 1pc 
Watch keeps 48h schedule
Waterproof: 5 ATM
Assembled in China

Stainless steel case, Double domed, hardened K1 crystal glass, Modern quick release strap, Bluetooth Low Energy 4.0, E-paper Display, Analog 3-hand movement, Rechargeable battery (with charger).

From the beginning, it was crucial that the watch should not become another device that needed charge daily. Even with continuous syncing with the digital calendar we have been able to make the battery last for weeks, 3 of them we are confident to say! The watch keeps your calendar even when your smartphone dies. 

The watch will notify you that the battery is running low by moving the second-hand in 5-second intervals when the battery level is less than 10%, and in 15-second intervals when the battery level is less than 5%.

The watch comes with a charging dock. This has been deliberately designed with a minimalist look, and to be small and robust enough to travel with you when you are on the road.


Our application functions as a tool to manage the settings of your watch, not as a calendar.  All calendar related functions are completed in the digital calendar of your choosing. 

With the App you can:

- See the watch’s battery level
- Switch between the Fixed and Flexible modes 
- Switch between calendars 
- Set and choose the watch to include several calendars 
- Set the watch to airplane mode 
- Set alarms 
- Put the watch into the power saving mode

Our application and the watch currently sync with the following calendars: iCalendar, Google Calendar, Outlook.com, Facebook Events, Yahoo!, Yandex, and we will be adding more on the way. Any other calendar suggestions are greatly appreciated.

As a unique design feature, we have extended the lugs to travel through the sides of the watch, giving it a very distinctive look.

We have also made them interchangeable, allowing you to swap in differently colored lugs to create a unique timepiece. Changing the lugs with the provided tool is quick, so you can tailor the watch to match your mood or outfit.



Changing the watch face, lugs and wristbands provides a virtually endless possibility of combinations. The lugs can be pre-ordered with your Kickstarter pledge by selecting the options with lugs and/or wristbands, or ordered separately when the product comes to market.

The options for the extra wristbands are for the Unlimited packages.

The options for the extra lug colors for the Limited/Unlimited packages.

The wristbands and lugs can also be bought separately when the product comes to market.

A special tool for changing the lugs comes with the package.

The team has designed and manufactured a similar watch with an E-Paper display and Bluetooth connectivity, that is already on the market. It's called Stop-the-Time Watch. The concept: When life brings you joy that seems too good to be true, Stop-the-Time watch lets you stop the time to mark the moment on the watch face and pair it with a detailed story in the accompanying App. By marking these memorable moments, you create your own unique pattern of moments on the watch face. Read more at www.whatwatch.com

Risks and challenges

We have an experienced team, plus we have launched a watch model last fall which is fully functioning and has much of the same technologies, bluetooth, e-paper screen etc. In addition, the What? Calendar Watch is nearly complete. We’re currently testing at our factory and are ready to meet the estimated delivery times.

Demand Forecasting Risk

We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan according to our previous experience. We are also going to be updating the plan in accordance with the Kickstarter success and demand.

Supply Chain Risk

We’re working with a very capable team who have successfully delivered the previous smartwatch to market. Nevertheless, component delays and unexpected shortages are possible. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

Communication is key for us. Thank you in advance for your support!
story_txt:
THE CALENDAR WATCH by What?
A watch that combines the heritage of watchmaking and one of a kind design with an always visible daily calendar that syncs with the most popular digital calendars, so you can see your day at a glance.




After careful testing and studies, we have come to the conclusion that the best user experience is achieved by making the Calendar Watch as simple as possible by leaving all extra features to our App and online calendars. There are no buttons or unnecessary functions. 
This is a new way to look at time. 



The Calendar Watch allows you to be on top of your game and gives you the ability to better manage your time.
The watch can also save you time because you are not constantly opening calendars for quick checks and it allows you to focus on what you should be doing. It is an efficiency tool to define your work life. Multitasking drops an average man’s IQ by 15 points (source: Stanford).

Nobody likes the guy who is constantly checking his phone at a restaurant, regardless of what’s so important on the screen. Don’t be that guy, yet still know what’s happening in your calendar. On average, a smartphone owner checks their phone 221 times a day (in UK, source: Tecmark) and we think that’s a bit too much.
The battery of the Calendar Watch lasts for weeks and keeps your schedule with you, even when your smartphone dies.

We didn’t want to complicate your life by adding another complicated device, we wanted to help make your life simpler.
Never be late for another meeting. Calendar Watch gives you more freedom from your phone, increases your productivity, and gives you peace of mind.


We have been getting some press attention!Here is a selection of what the media has been saying about us and our new Calendar Watch:



The Calendar Watch is a real and lasting classic timepiece.
The watch is conceived and designed by renowned Japanese art director Masashi Kawamura, who has been featured on the FastCompany’s most creative people list, and Italian industrial designer Umberto Onza, who together have fused the aesthetics and demands of consumers who want to curate their own style with an eye toward story, craftsmanship, and individuality.

With its iconic, refined features, the watch pays tribute to the heritage of watchmaking. It’s polished stainless steel case provides a classic feel, with both comfort and durability, while it’s domed hardened K1 crystal glass is made to last.






You can choose from four models: Polar White, Aqua Blue, Special Edition Black and Verdant Green.The Polar White model has a polished stainless steel body and comes with a brown genuine leather strap with white stitching.


The Aqua Blue model has a matte stainless steel body and comes with a blue suede leather strap.






The Verdant Green model combines green tones with a matt gold effect case, together with pale gold color printed features and hour hand. Complimentary wristbands will also be made available.



The Special Edition Black model has a matte gun-metal black body and comes with a black genuine leather strap with a stylized texture.






The watch features two distinct modes, FIXED and FLEXIBLE, and you can switch between the modes with our accompanying App.
In FLEXIBLE mode the display will be updated segment by segment every 15 minutes, following the hour hand. In this mode, you always see the next 12 hours:


With FIXED mode, the display is completely updated every 12 hours and you can set the starting hour in our App. You can choose what you want the watch to show, for example maybe your work day from 9AM to 9PM, or 7AM to 7PM:
It’s up to you!
Automatic Time Syncing
The analog movements of the watch are synced with the digital components and the App. So the hands are automatically adjusted to the right time - even when you travel to different time zones.

Tapping Input 
By double tapping the watch, it shows your next 12-24h schedule for 5 seconds in both fixed and flexible modes. The watch also vibrates for 0.3 seconds as feedback. After, the display refreshes again and displays your 0-12h schedule.
With a triple tap your schedule is synced immediately with your phone (otherwise the watch automatically syncs every 15 minutes). The watch responds with two 0.3 second vibrations and an animation.
When in airplane mode, a triple tap will wake up the watch and turn on the Bluetooth.
Power Saving
When the watch has not detected any movement for 15 minutes, the watch enters its power-saving mode. This is visualized by the second hand stopping at the 12 o’clock position, while the hour and minute hands will continue to show the time. As soon as motion is detected, the second hand will jump to the correct time.
Notifications
The watch notifies you by vibrating and by flashing the particular event segment according the alert time you have set on your calendar. 
Time accuracy：±15 seconds per month (23℃ ± 5℃, 73F ± 41℃)Operation temperature: 0℃ to +45℃ (32F to 113F)Battery life：~3 weeks Battery: Li-ion (3.7V, 100mAh), 1pc Watch keeps 48h scheduleWaterproof: 5 ATMAssembled in ChinaStainless steel case, Double domed, hardened K1 crystal glass, Modern quick release strap, Bluetooth Low Energy 4.0, E-paper Display, Analog 3-hand movement, Rechargeable battery (with charger).

This has been deliberately designed with a minimalist look, and to be 
small and robust enough to travel with you when you are on the road.

story:
OUR STORY

Banner Day is about an application of embroidery on an every day t-shirt. The idea for the brand sparked on Kate and Grahm's first date in Manhattan, NY the summer of 2014. Grahm was wearing a hand me down embroidered t-shirt which grabbed Kate's attention. Kate is a fashion industry veteran was a buyer and fashion director for the mogul e-comm site, www.shopbop.com, for a decade. Grahm and Kate's relationship quickly progressed and they bonded over their passion for style, product and take action personalities. After researching and designing for a year, Kate & Grahm launched Banner Day to the wholesale market in December 2015.

Founders Grahm Sisson & Kate Ciepluch

"We love how a playful scene comes to life through embroidery and wanted to offer this beloved artisnal look in a silhouette and fabric that was more relaxed and casual. All artwork is original and captures the places and elements of the best day possible on one quintessential unisex shape."


THE PRODUCT

After careful deliberation, the duo landed on 1 signature item to keep the brand focused -- the quintessential crew neck silhouette.
100% linen, unisex, offered in 3 colors and 4 sizes. Embroidered artwork denotes emotional expression on a unique fabrication that speaks to certain experiences people have and where that feeling brings them back to.



ORDERS SECURED

  • Banner Day has secured $70K in purchase orders and is producing 1,000 t-shirts in 20 different designs. The brand will be stocked in reputable stores including shopbop.com, Intermix, Anthropologie, Otte, and the Four Seasons resorts in Hawaii and Mexico. Our factory is well under way with the process and they will be completed and leave India on May 31st. 
  • Designs sold include: Band Scene, Sunbather Scene, Poppy Flower Scene, Cacti Scene, Musical Note Scene, Friday Saturday Sunday Pocket Tee, American Flag Poppy Tee, Fish Pocket Tee, & June July August Pocket Tee. 


OUR REQUEST

  • The $10K round of capital we are seeking to raise will supplement our personal contribution, supporting confirmed purchase orders that total $70K from 20 boutiques worldwide. 
  • After searching worldwide for the exact artisan feeling hand embroidery we desired, we sourced a factory through a long time industry contact in India who made the prototypes used to secure purchase orders. We have already paid a  deposit to the factory and will have capitol from our stores when we ship for the balance upon inspection, but we are in need of $10K for the second factory installment. 
  • With a projected profit margin of 60%, we will then have cash flow to support future season collections, continue to fund our talented team, invest in customer acquisition, as well as access to working capitol. 

WHY IT WILL WORK

  • Press: We already have a confirmed placement upon product arrival on Vogue.com!
  • Our product is valuable to the world because it is a representation of a connection to nature and nostalgia. The t-shirts possess that special quality that make them your favorite thing in your closet. We are not only relying on our own opinion but a poll of 100's of who saw and reacted positively to our prototypes. 
  • Our Team is top notch!                                                                                                   SALES SHOWROOM: Summer Somewhere showroom is handling our wholesale sales, seeing 300 stores per market with 13 different sales events a year in Los Angeles, New York City, and Miami.                                                                 ARTIST: Nicholas Francis, a brilliant artist and storyteller                                   PRODUCTION: Type Alpha, production sourcing experts                      
  • We are confident in our abilities after running a successful womens ready-to wear-line, Laveer, since 2012 which ships between $500-1M/year. We have extensive relationships with buyers, tradeshows, and editors that we will be able to utilize for the benefit of Banner Day. We have already taken steps to conquer 2 challenges Laveer regularly faces - design budget and a long production assembly line. Our factory in India makes new design protos at no cost and is full package - they take care of fabric sourcing, dying, cutting, sewing, marking and grading, screen printing the label inside the shirts, as well as the hand embroidery for one cost which makes our margin very transparent as we enter a production cycle. 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

  • Risks include boutiques ordering product and not being able to pay upon delivery. We have put precautions in place including a factor to insure PO's and credit card deposits from stores our factor does not approve. 
  • Production issues and delays are always a potention. In our contract with the factory we have put into place a protective clause which charges them interest for every day they are late. 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP!

  • Sign up for our email list on www.bannerday.us and follow us on instagram @banner_day

story:
Find us on Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/GetDadToChemo

 

Update 2/28: Our dad started his treatments on Monday. So far, so good! It's rough, but he's holding strong. Our mom recently discovered that the insurance company will not be covering the cost of the food for our dad's feeding tube. Our dad's birthday is March 4th. Please consider making a donation or leaving a comment this weekend to show our dad you are thinking of him this weekend on his birthday. Thank you for all of your thoughts, prayers, and generosity! We all appreciate it so very much!

*** THANK YOU SO MUCH! I haven't had a chance to update, but thanks to the generosity of all of you, we made our goal in just 10 days! Any money we raise in addition to the $700 will be used towards medical expenses not covered by insurance. You are all wonderful. We are lucky to know you, thank you!***

GET OUR DAD TO CHEMO!

Who Are We?

Our names are Doug(29), Jim(25), Kristie(24), and Cody(16). We are so completely blessed to have an amazing father. For three of us, he isn't our biological parent, but for the past 22 years he's been the best dad for which any of us could have ever asked. His name is Steve Harsh. In addition to the four of us kids, our dad also has four lively grandchildren, our mom Dawn his wife of 22 years, and a very loving (pain in the butt) dog named Marvin.

Why Do We Need You?

About 6 months ago, our dad started to get sick. At first he thought it was just the flu or a persistent cold. As time went on he did not get better. Two months ago, his doctors found a lump in his throat at the base of his tongue, as well as one in his lymph node. They are cancerous, brought on by the HPV virus. In the coming weeks he starts chemo and radiation treatments. His treatments are 5 days a week for 7 weeks at a facility 2 hours away from his home in Allenstown, New Hampshire. He will also have numerous checkups and appointments.

How Can You Help?

As the main earner, being out of work is very stressful for our dad. With all the appointments, our mom and dad are making many trips to and from his doctors in Lebanon, NH. We want to help get our dad to treatments. The money we're trying to raise would be used for gas expenses. Any extra would be used to help offset the medical costs not covered by insurance. We are guessing the cost of gas to be around $700 for around 140 hours of driving total (4 hour round trips, 5 days a week, 7 weeks). Help us give him the peace of mind that this money will bring.

Our dad is only 47 years old. He has a lot more time to spend on this earth and we have a lot more time to spend with him. If you can help in any way, we would be so grateful. Your thoughts, prayers, and well wishes will be incredibly helpful. We understand many do not have the funds to contribute. That's okay! Please just get the word out for us and leave your positive thoughts and energy. Thank you so very much!

-Doug, Jim, Kristie, and Cody

 ***The funds raised from this are being payed to a paypal account in the name of Steve's son-in-law, Matthew White. He will be managing the account and transferring all funds to Steve and Dawn. Thanks again!***

story:
Our Story

We are BA Honours Textile Design students at Loughborough University, working in the areas of Print, Multimedia and Weave. We are fundraising for our final year show to be held in July 2012.

Whether printed silks for fashion, woven lengths seen for interiors or a textile art multimedia piece, each student has spent the last three years learning and perfecting their skills in order to produce a textile collection of the highest standard. 

This London show is a chance for us to showcase our work independently of University and we have worked hard to make it a success. It is so important as it will give us, as students, the opportunity to be viewed not only by the public but by industry professionals. In turn this will aid us in making the difficult transition from education to employment.

We are aiming to raise $1500 which is the equivalent to roughly £900. This will go towards the venue hire, opening night refreshments and entertainment, lighting and other additional costs which contribute to making the exhibition the success we hope it will be.

 

Thank you for your support!

story:
Hicktown Couture derives from a love of Country and Rock. Holding itself to an ideal of providing fashion that aims to bridge the gap from the generation of bull riding and cattle raising to the modern cowboy. Hicktown Couture maintains the work ethic of the traditional cowboy with the lifestyle of the modern man. It is fashion respecting the independence of contemporary country girls and believes she deserves a brand that embraces her wild side.

Hicktown Couture respects the modern cowboy and his southern belle, who continue the traditional hard days work; moreover, it believes they deserve to wear a brand that fashionably carries those hard days into their harder and even crazier nights.

Hicktown Couture intends to be representative of a lifestyle and hopes to enshrine a strong and continuous sense of pride for those who wear it. Our founders are proud of this lifestyle, are working hard, and will continually strive to provide a brand appealing to any person who understands, appreciates, or shares our vision.

We are four guys with roots in the Mid and Southwest, and who believe that the modern cowboy is bolder than just flannels and 10-gallon hats, and that the contemporary country girl is sexier than bonnets and bloomers. We are transcending tradition, while maintaining our roots, and creating a brand many can be proud to wear.

We are seeking funding to launch this lifestyle brand on a broader scale. We have developed goals to successfully launch our brand. We need funding to assist us in all aspects of our launch. From sourcing, building inventory, advertising avenues and securing retail representation.

Hicktown Couture maintains the work ethic of the traditional cowboy with the lifestyle of the modern man. It is fashion respecting the independence of contemporary country girls and believes she deserves a brand that embraces her wild side.
Hicktown Couture respects the modern cowboy and his southern belle, who continue the traditional hard days work; moreover, it believes they deserve to wear a brand that fashionably carries those hard days into their harder and even crazier nights.
Hicktown Couture intends to be representative of a lifestyle and hopes to enshrine a strong and continuous sense of pride for those who wear it. Our founders are proud of this lifestyle, are working hard, and will continually strive to provide a brand appealing to any person who understands, appreciates, or shares our vision.
We are four guys with roots in the Mid and Southwest, and who believe that the modern cowboy is bolder than just flannels and 10-gallon hats, and that the contemporary country girl is sexier than bonnets and bloomers. We are transcending tradition, while maintaining our roots, and creating a brand many can be proud to wear.
We are seeking funding to launch this lifestyle brand on a broader scale. We have developed goals to successfully launch our brand. We need funding to assist us in all aspects of our launch. From sourcing, building inventory, advertising avenues and securing retail representation.

story:
REBEL stands for quality, relentless innovation, and unique craft.

Fusing function with a masculine style, the Rebel is a worthy companion for the bold one living on the edge - a reflection of the Rebel man's soul.

Never relenting, we created a limited-edition - an exclusive timepiece - which speaks to the drive inside all of us. Distinctly eye-catching, we made sure Rebel is deceptively practical and up to Swiss standards with the benefit of attainability. Triumph goes to the explorer and the trailblazer, though it never looked so clean. 

The rebel man knows his purpose. His unrelenting drive and bold self-expression are exactly what makes him so irresistibly alluring, to inspire a bold and creative lifestyle - for both urban dwellers as well as for those who heed the call of the wild.

Let your new companion bring out what makes you uniquely Rebel.

At times, we all deal with self-doubt, yet the Rebel lives on. Strong, confident and daring, he makes every moment count. 

What kind of REBEL are you wearing today?

SWISS AUTOMATIC MOVEMENT

A twin brother of the legendary ETA 2824, this Sellita SW200-1 has a proven track record of accuracy and durability. It winds on your wrist automatically and purrs along at 28,800 beautiful beats per hour.

CASE DESIGN: DESIGN FROM SCRATCH 

Nothing comes standard here at Rebel, and that includes our unique case design. Built for toughness and designed for good looks, it sits comfortably on your wrist above or (well) below sea level.

SWISS SUPERLUMINOVA 

We’re not saying to leave the flashlight at home, we are saying that legibility comes easy on the Rebel AQUAFIN thanks to Swiss Superluminova. Go ahead and shine bright you crazy diamond.

SWISS MADE - LIMITED EDITION

Good is the enemy of great, and that’s why we settle for nothing but the best. When it comes to watches, great = Swiss. Designed in Brooklyn, built-in Switzerland. (Under the newest and most stringent regulations).

30 ATM/300M/1000FT WATER RESISTANT 

Go deep. Real deep. Rated to 30 ATM or 1000 feet. The Rebel AQUAFIN can take you farther than you could have imagined in the sea and on land.

story:
HOUKIE SKATEBOARD SHOE PROTECTOR

SAVE $$ ON SKATEBOARDING SHOES !! 

 Tired of wasting money on new skate shoes?? Problem solved!!

This is a flexible overshoe that will protect all areas where damage occurs when skateboarding.  . The Houkie is stylish, removable and reusable. The actual product will be injection molded rubber and in many different colors.  The initial launch color will be black.  The lightweight HOUKIE only weighs 185 grams!  

The product will not be bulky (approx 1/16th of an inch thick) and will allow the skater to keep the "board feel" that is of utmost importance!

Skateboarding has progressed from casually riding on a skateboard to stunts, tricks and maneuvering the skateboard in many ways such as kicks, flips, jumps, spins.....etc. This new maneuvering and riding of the skateboard has been known to cause excessive and severe damage to many areas of the rider's shoes due to the surface that the rider is on, and the manipulation of the skateboard with the rider's feet. On the top of the skateboard is "grip tape" which is essentially sandpaper. This grip tape, when it comes in comes in contact with the skateboarder's shoe during the tricks and maneuvers, adds traction to the shoe in order for the rider to perform the tricks. This grip tape also causes tearing and major wear to several areas of the shoe. The main areas of the shoe that is affected are the outside upper of the shoe, the laces of the shoe, the ball area of the sole as well as the heel and heel area of the sole. In addition, the soles of the rider's shoe is susceptible to wear from the grip tape and the hard surfaces on which the rider is skating on when his is riding and performing these tricks and stunts, for example: concrete, blacktop, hardwood etc. Within a short time, the skateboarder has worn his shoe down so much that he will need to replace the shoe because it is no longer usable or safe to use. In this day and age, a skate shoe can range in cost from $40 to over $100 per pair.

 

The current products on the market provide some protection of the upper portion of the shoe, but not to the bottom of the shoe. These "patches" are affixed to the shoe with adhesive glues or other types of adhesive means.  Another product is a type of glue or rubber cement that is applied to the area of the upper portion of the shoe that dries to form a barrier where the wear is prevalent.

The current products as stated above are semi-permanent fixes that are mostly not removable from the shoe. These products, such as the adhesive patches, cannot be removed once applied and do not last very long. They do not allow the skateboarder to wear it for any other use than to skateboard since the shoe is altered and not very visually appealing. They do not protect all areas of the shoe where damage and wear is prevalent. The glue/rubber cement product also is not removable once applied. Not only does this product takes time to dry before the rider can wear the shoes to skateboard,  it is made of toxic and harmful chemicals. Although it can be placed on most areas where the damage is prevalent, It is very messy and does not provide the best protection. It is a very temporary fix to the problem. These products are not removable nor are they reusable. 

Our local tester, Stevie Gandy (photo above) says that he loves the HOUKIE. According to Stevie, he has better board control, can do flick tricks more efficiently and he doesn't even feel the HOUKIE on his shoes because they are so light.

The HOUKIE is a removable and reusable flexible overshoe that is placed over the shoe which will cover all areas of the shoe that are damaged during skateboarding. This overshoe is made of a flexible material that conforms to the shoe in all areas needed in order to protect specific portions of the shoe while conforming to the shoe's shape.  The overshoe adds additional cushioning and traction to the heel and ball of the shoe. The middle of the overshoe is constructed in a way to allow the overshoe to be stretched to fit and conform to a very broad range of shoe sizes. The upper and the sole also has added traction in the form of raised areas or other forms of traction to allow the "grip" of the shoe to the skateboard for the efficient execution of tricks and stunts. The overshoe also covers the laces area on the front of the shoe protecting them from damage where it is prevalent. 

 

Once the skateboarder has finished using the product, it can be removed and saved to be reused at a later time. The construction of this overshoe is such that it can be used on any type of shoe therefore making any shoe style a "skateboarding" shoe. There is also areas of the HOUKIE that will allow for different company logos who wish to sponsor or license the product.

 

We are hoping to have the Houkie last over 4 months so this will save tons of $$ on shoes.  Feel free to ask any questions about the Houkie. 

 

We have 22 testers that have been testing numerous custom compounds of material that we want to make the Houkie with.  After 18 months of testing,  we have found the compound that we will be using for the Houkie.  It is all natural and the greatest part is that it is 100% recyclable. 

 

Our testers have found that the Houkie adds tremendous grip that allows them better board control.  The consistant "grip" in the "flick" or "ollie" area makes every trick consistent and they say they are able to do the tricks more efficiently with less effort!

 

Another bonus is that the added cushioning of the sole not only protects the sole,  but adds that cushion so you do not need to buy additional insoles.  Another money saving benefit!!

 

We have gone through 6 design changes so far and have finally fixed all the bugs in the design.    We have also located a manufacturer here in the USA so this will be American Made and we will be able to guarantee the consistency and quality of the HOUKIE.  Below is a pic of the design phases from beginning to present.....

So far, we have done all of the development work, spent the money to get molds and samples tested so we could get this product created and out there for you guys to protect your shoes.  We are in the final stretch and are so close to having this completed!  This is where your support will push us to the finish!!  We have moved the manufacturing of the HOUKIE to the USA!!! 

 

WE ARE READY TO GET THE HOUKIE INTO PRODUCTION!!!

The money raised will be used for the creation of the final design production molds and getting inventory to send out. This is the final obstacle in our way.  Click your level and help us get the Houkie out there in a few short months!!

story:
Please go to Turbo Ace Website to order:

http://www.turboace.com/icamdesigngears.aspx

 

 

 

World's Safest & Fastest Holster with 1 Second Release and Complete Camera Security to Prevent Accidental Drops

 

A seamless execution of form and function with 21 astonishing features and mounting options.

SAFETY is the primary reason why most photographers have yet to switch away from dangling heavy cameras on neck/shoulder straps. While camera holsters are made to transfer payloads to your body and neutralize swings and bounces, we have heard so many horror stories about dropped cameras and lenses. Hence from the get-go, our mission is to create not just a holster of convenience but a comprehensive fail-safe system that is crucial in securing your valuable investment. Featuring a seamless integration of security lock on a single-hand 1-second release, Click will also work in conjunction with your neck strap. This double security approach offers the ultimate in camera safety while providing instant camera access.

 

A modular design for adaptability and expandability, Click features a secured 3-Point mount compatible with a wide variety of belts and shoulder straps. Catering to varying camera gear and events, you can select from 3 quick release plates for adaptability. And build-in funneling can be further enhanced with Expanded Funnel. 

COMPARISON CHART

How does Click stack up against the competition? We took Click and the two top selling camera holsters for an extensive test drive. You will discover there are more than 10 reasons to step up from the conventional holsters to the Click. See comparison chart below.

 

 

For independent testing and review by one of industry's most recognized camera reviewers Michael Andrew, go to www.michaelthemaven.com

 

 

 

Pro Application

 

Click is not only designed for recreational photography, but also for professional applications including weddings. You can carry up to 3 cameras comfortably with the Click setup.

 

 

MODULAR DESIGN

Keeping it compact with just a Click on a belt or customizing a sophisticated Click setup with a complete line of Click Accessories, you can easily transition from point and shoot to covering professional events. There is an endless selection of mounts and upgrades that targets specific functions or promotes comfort so you can stay focused.

 

 

  • Click Camera Holster, adaptable to small and large cameras
  • Tooless Mounting for a wide range of belt/strap width/thickness
  • Arca Swiss Compatible for easy transition to tripods
  • Use the Click Holster with your shoulder strap
  • Integrated Travel/Pro Belts targeting different payloads
  • Expanded Funnel for no-look 3D holstering of bigger camera/lens
  • Mount Camera Cushion Pad for comfort and protection
  • Integrated Fail-Safe Strap to prevent disaster
  • Multi-Camera Setup for professional shoots

TOOLLESS 3-POINT MOUNT WITH TOP-LOADING HOLSTERING

Click's quick and easy Toolless 3-Point Mounting offers substantial advantages in both functionality and adaptability. When mounted sideways on a belt, the typical 2-point mounted holster or clip is forced into an undesirable side-loading orientation so gravity is working against alignment and safety. In contrast, a 3-Point Mount design enables the Click to retain the preferred top-loading orientation whether it's attached to a horizontal belt (i.e. waist belt or Pro Belt) or a vertical strap (i.e. handbag or backpack).

SINGLE-HAND 1-SECOND DRAW & NO-LOOK FUNNEL HOLSTERING

While a security latch may prevent a camera from been accidentally bounced or pushed out of a holster, it also hinders and delays access on conventional camera holsters because you need to first look down to locate and release that security latch with both hands.

With Click, your natural hand position on the camera automatically guides your pinkie finger to the release trigger enabling your right hand - without assistance of your left hand - to deactivate that security and draw the camera with one smooth contiguous motion. 

 

 

BUILT-IN FUNNEL

Click's Built-in Funnel (All Click Packages) easily guides your camera into the holster. 

 

 

EXPANDED FUNNEL FOR NO-LOOK 3D HOLSTERING

You can choose to further expand funneling by attaching the optional Expanded Funnel (Included with PREMIUM/ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES) which facilitates faster guided no-look 3D holstering of cameras, especially in low light or indoor shoots.

 

NO BELT NEEDED 

Click can work without a belt. The middle clamp locks into to the thicker seam at the top of your pants and prevents it from dislodging. It's a secure design suited to either men or women.

 

 

ANTI-SWING & ANTI-BOUNCE

Click's guided tracks represent a crucial improvement over conventional steel pin holsters. Once funneled and secured into Click's holstered position, a camera, even with long lenses, won't swing and bounce as you walk.  

INSTANTLY MOUNTS ON TRIPOD

Once adapted to your camera, the Click’s Arca Swiss-compatible Quick Release Plate (Optional Dual Arca Swiss/RC2 Compatible Quick Release Plate for Manfrotto is also available for purchase) enables you to effortlessly transition between the Click Holster and a tripod without any adapter or plate change. Other compatible holsters sacrifice Arca Swiss’s build-in security catch that prevents your camera from accidentally dislodging from the tripod.

 

 

Each Click holster that we ship is paired with a Pro Quick Release Plate. For additional Quick Release Plates please see Click Accessories below.

 

 

Turbo Ace offers unprecedented versatility when it comes to instant tripod mounting. There are 3 types of mounting plates that works with the Click holster.

  • Pro Quick Release Plate is Arca Swiss compatible and its tapered edge provides easy NO-LOOK funneling for both large and small cameras. (Included with DELUXE/PREMIUM/ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES)
  • Lite Quick Release Plate is light and unobstrusive, a more practical fit for your smaller DSLR camera. (Can be purchased separately as an option.)
  • Dual Quick Release Plate for photographer who uses both the Manfrotto RC2 and the Arca Swiss quick release system. (Can be purchased separately as an option.)

 

 

INVERTIBLE FOR LENS CHANGE

Click's smart invertible feature can easily transform into a Lens Changing Station . Simply holster the camera face up and the camera is lock and secured for lens change.

 

 

WORKS IN CONJUNCTION WITH NECK/SHOULDER STRAP

Click's open architecture allows you to simultaneously use your holster and your neck/shoulder strap. While Click Holster steadies and transfers the entire payload to your waist, your neck/shoulder strap retains all its original functions and serves as a fail-safe. To accommodate your shoulder strap's larger hooks to Click's Quick Release Plate, you will need the Shoulder Strap Anchor and Tension Balancer (Included with ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES).

 

 

SAFETY LOCK

While a locking mechanism may prevent a camera from being accidentally knocked out of the holster, it's also inherently obstructive. In order to streamline camera access without sacrificing security, Click designers developed an exclusive Single-Hand Release mechanism to unlock and draw your camera in one smooth motion.

FAIL-SAFE STRAP

In lieu of using your neck/shoulder strap, you can instead choose to hook Click's adjustable Fail-Safe Strap between the Click Holster and its Quick Release Plate (mounted under your camera). If the camera is knocked out of your hand, the strap will catch the camera before it hits the ground.

 

 

FREE FAIL-SAFE STRAP BY SHARING

Help us spread the word about Click. There are 4 different ways to get a Free Fail-Safe Strap ($12 value) with your DELUXE/PREMIUM/ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES

1. Share Click in your Facebook, Instagram or any Photography forum/blog and email us a link, print screen or photo of the computer screen of you sharing. You can choose to LIKE our Turbo Ace Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/turboacewow/

2. Email us a photo of other brand camera holster you own, within 12 hours after you have completed a Click pledge (email to Sales@turboace.com).

3. Sign up a friend to pledge one of the Click Packages, then both you and your friend will get a free Fail-Safe strap. Email us you and your friends names after he/she has pledged (email to Sales@turboace.com).

4. Help us reach a total of 1,000 Click packages.

We will very much appreciate your participation in helping us promote Click. Please feel free to use any of the photos on this page and share them with any photography communities.

WATERPROOF & SUBMERSIBLE

If you ever need to operate in the rain, underwater or simply in high humidity, we have included this waterproof, submersible and rust-resistant upgrade for all Click Packages. We went through the entire parts list of the Click to make sure it is rust proof. The main body is made of aluminum but due to strength requirement some parts have to be made of stainless steel and they are much more costly to produce than carbon steel used on many conventional holsters.

 

 

CAMERA CUSHION PAD

To prevent bigger, heavier cameras from bumping against you, a Camera Cushioned Pad can be fitted between your belt and the holster.

TRAVEL BELT

Although Click's 3-Point mount is compatible with most waist belts, you can choose between a couple of 2 inch belt options for personalized applications. While our light and robust Travel Belt (Included with PREMIUM / ELITE / ULTIMATE PACKAGES) will easily support an average DSLR camera, we have also designed a Pro Belt for professional and specialized applications.

 

PRO BELT

Professionally integrated with multiple elements, the Pro Belt is structured to comfortably support heavier combination of camera gear for longer duration. While typical one-size-fits-all designs don't quite fit "all", Pro Belt's Dual-Adjustment truly provides the perfect cushion and fit for waists ranging from 24” to 46”, a compelling advantage over common waist belts in both function and comfort. (Included with ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES)

 

 

  • Dual Adjustments fit comfortably from 24”-46”
  • Secured Buckle Mechanism to prevent accidental releases
  • 2” Belt with 3” Padding to comfortably support heavier payloads
  • Multi-Holster Options to support multiple cameras
  • Compatible with Cushioned Camera Pad

MULTI-HOLSTER SETUP ON PRO BELT

Need to use two cameras, three cameras (one on shoulder strap and two on the Pro Belt)? You can easily mount multiple Click Holsters on your waist belt and/or neck/shoulder strap. As you transition to heavier professional cameras/lenses, the best multi-holster/camera setup starts with our highly recommended Pro Belt for extra comfort and support.

There are two types of Camera Cushion Pads: a standard Camera Cushion Pad (Included with DELUXE/PREMIUM/ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES) for the primary holster and a different Camera Cushion Pad with Velcro & Belt Clip (Included with ULTIMATE PACKAGES) to mount additional holster on the Pro Belt.

 

 

CLICK SPECIFICATIONS

  • Dimensions: 3.8" width x 2.8" height x 0.7" thick (97mm x 71mm x 18mm)
  • Weight: 0.36 lb (163g)
  • Material: Aluminum & Stainless Steel
  • Finish: Anodized Black
  • Thumb Wheel Diameter: 18mm
  • Quick Release Plat: Compatible with Arca Swiss (38mm plate width) standard on many tripods.
  • Mounting Belt Width: 42.4mm (1.67") Maximum
  • Mounting Belt Width using Pad with Velcro Straps & Belt Clasp: 53.3mm (2.1") Maximum
  • Mounting Belt and Pad Thickness: 4mm Belt + 5mm Pad, Total 9mm
  • Mounting Vertical Strap Thickness: 10mm Maximum
  • Vertical Payload: 200 lbs
  • Funnel Shift Tolerance: 16mm (8mm on each side)
  • Funnel Angle Tolerance with Build-in Funnel: 5°-45°
  • Funnel Angle Tolerance with Expanded No-Look Funnel: 22°-75°

CLICK ACCESSORIES

Optional Click accessories below can only be purchased at the link below. To combine your Indiegogo package with these accessories so they can be shipped together without additional shipping cost, please enter your Indiegogo Backer Number in the Company Name Field when you enter your shipping address. http://www.turboace.com/icamdesigngears.aspx

  • Camera Cushion Pad fits on Travel Belt ($19)
  • Camera Cushion Pad with Velcro & Belt Clip for 2nd camera, fits on Pro Belt ($29)
  • Pro Quick Release Plate (Arca Swiss Compatible) ($19)
  • Lite Quick Release Plate (Arca Swiss Compatiblel) ($15)
  • Dual Quick Release Plate (RC2 and Arca Swiss Compatible) ($29)
  • Fail-Safe Strap ($12)
  • Expanded No-Look Funnel ($19)
  • Travel Belt ($19)
  • Pro Belt ($29)
  • Anchor & Tension Balancer to work with Shoulder Strap. Your shoulder/neck strap must be able to extend below your waist in order to work in conjunction with the Click ($19)
  • Waterproof Upgrade ($20 Value free with DELUXE/PREMIUM/ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES ONLY)
CLICK PACKAGES CHART
 

 

CALIFORNIA SALES TAX

For packages shipped to California Addresses, please add 8% sales tax to your total pledge before shipping charges. Otherwise your California orders will not be shipped. 

TIMELINE & DELIVERY

  • April - Jun 2015: Click Holster Concept & Research
  • Jun - Aug 2015: Initial Click Holster Design & 3D Modeling
  • Aug - Sep 2015: Holster Prototype #1 & Evaluation of Single-Hand Release mechanism
  • Sep 2015: Holster Prototype #2 & Evaluation of mounting mechanism options and refinements
  • Oct 2015: Extension Funnel Prototype #1 with optimization of shift and angle tolerance
  • Nov 2015: Holster Prototype #3 to refine; Extension Funnel Prototype #2 & #3
  • Dec 2016: Holster Prototype #4; Click Field Testing
  • Jan 2016: Holster Prototype #5 with 3rd Party Testing & Evaluation; Pro Belt Concept & Design & Integration; More 3rd Party Testing & Evaluation, More Field Testing
  • Feb 2016: Holster Prototype #6 with integration of shoulder strap & R-strap; Pro Belt Prototype #1 & #2; Filming for Kickstarter starts; More 3rd Party Testing & Evaluation; More Field Testing
  • Mar 2016: Holster Prototype #7 & #8; Pro Belt Prototype #3; Start of Procurement, Launch Click Kickstarter Campaign; More Field Testing
  • Apr 2016: Completion of procurement and set up assembly line
  • May 2016: Click production begins; Click Kickstarter Campaign ends
  • Jun 2016: Launch Click Indiegogo Campaign
  • Jun - Aug 2016: Click production
  • Aug2016: Click Indiegogo Campaign ends
  • Sep 2016: Shipment of Click Packages to backers (Premium/Elite/Ultimate Packages)
  • Oct 2016: Shipment of Click Packages to backers (Deluxe)

 

Risks and challenges

Developing the world’s best camera holster system requires a unique set of industry-specific knowledge, experience and manufacturing resources. There is no other entity more qualified that iCam Design, a division of Turbo Ace, a leading U.S. drone and camera gear developer since 2008.

In developing Click, our vision is to innovate and craft a highly adaptable system worthy of the finest cameras. To meet this unprecedented challenge, Turbo Ace assembled a collective effort to push performance, increase functionality, refine aesthetics, implement adaptability and improve user experience. It’s truly an evolution based on an exhaustive cycle of innovation, prototyping, field testing and evaluation.

As we near the final phase of this journey and continue to receive feedback from professional camera equipment reviewers, there is an increasing sense of urgency and excitement. To ensure on-time delivery, Turbo Ace must now simultaneously start procurement and setup assembly. With your support, we will bring the Click Camera Holster to full production. Having successfully completed and fulfilled 4 previous Kickstarter/Indiegogo campaigns, we have every confidence that Click will exceed your highest expectations.
story_txt:
Please go to Turbo Ace Website to order:
http://www.turboace.com/icamdesigngears.aspx
 
 

Click with 21 Compelling Functions World's Safest & Fastest Holster with 1 Second Release and Complete Camera Security to Prevent Accidental Drops A seamless execution of form and function with 21 astonishing features and mounting options.SAFETY is the primary reason why most photographers have yet to switch away from dangling heavy cameras on neck/shoulder straps. While camera holsters are made to transfer payloads to your body and neutralize swings and bounces, we have heard so many horror stories about dropped cameras and lenses. Hence from the get-go, our mission is to create not just a holster of convenience but a comprehensive fail-safe system that is crucial in securing your valuable investment. Featuring a seamless integration of security lock on a single-hand 1-second release, Click will also work in conjunction with your neck strap. This double security approach offers the ultimate in camera safety while providing instant camera access.
Click Holster Working in Tandem with Neck Strap 
A modular design for adaptability and expandability, Click features a secured 3-Point mount compatible with a wide variety of belts and shoulder straps. Catering to varying camera gear and events, you can select from 3 quick release plates for adaptability. And build-in funneling can be further enhanced with Expanded Funnel. 
COMPARISON CHART
How does Click stack up against the competition? We took Click and the two top selling camera holsters for an extensive test drive. You will discover there are more than 10 reasons to step up from the conventional holsters to the Click. See comparison chart below.
 
Click Comparison Chart 
For independent testing and review by one of industry's most recognized camera reviewers Michael Andrew, go to www.michaelthemaven.com
 
 
 
Pro Application
 
Click is not only designed for recreational photography, but also for professional applications including weddings. You can carry up to 3 cameras comfortably with the Click setup.
  
MODULAR DESIGN
Keeping it compact with just a Click on a belt or customizing a sophisticated Click setup with a complete line of Click Accessories, you can easily transition from point and shoot to covering professional events. There is an endless selection of mounts and upgrades that targets specific functions or promotes comfort so you can stay focused.
 
Modular Design with Detachable Cushion Pad Mountable to your personal belt 

Click Camera Holster, adaptable to small and large cameras
Tooless Mounting for a wide range of belt/strap width/thickness
Arca Swiss Compatible for easy transition to tripods
Use the Click Holster with your shoulder strap
Integrated Travel/Pro Belts targeting different payloads
Expanded Funnel for no-look 3D holstering of bigger camera/lens
Mount Camera Cushion Pad for comfort and protection
Integrated Fail-Safe Strap to prevent disaster
Multi-Camera Setup for professional shoots

TOOLLESS 3-POINT MOUNT WITH TOP-LOADING HOLSTERING
Click's quick and easy Toolless 3-Point Mounting offers substantial advantages in both functionality and adaptability. When mounted sideways on a belt, the typical 2-point mounted holster or clip is forced into an undesirable side-loading orientation so gravity is working against alignment and safety. In contrast, a 3-Point Mount design enables the Click to retain the preferred top-loading orientation whether it's attached to a horizontal belt (i.e. waist belt or Pro Belt) or a vertical strap (i.e. handbag or backpack).
SINGLE-HAND 1-SECOND DRAW & NO-LOOK FUNNEL HOLSTERING
While a security latch may prevent a camera from been accidentally bounced or pushed out of a holster, it also hinders and delays access on conventional camera holsters because you need to first look down to locate and release that security latch with both hands.
With Click, your natural hand position on the camera automatically guides your pinkie finger to the release trigger enabling your right hand - without assistance of your left hand - to deactivate that security and draw the camera with one smooth contiguous motion. 
 
Single Hand Release Trigger 
BUILT-IN FUNNEL
Click's Built-in Funnel (All Click Packages) easily guides your camera into the holster. 
 
Build-In Funnel for Easy Holstering 
EXPANDED FUNNEL FOR NO-LOOK 3D HOLSTERING
You can choose to further expand funneling by attaching the optional Expanded Funnel (Included with PREMIUM/ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES) which facilitates faster guided no-look 3D holstering of cameras, especially in low light or indoor shoots.

EXPANDED FUNNEL 
NO BELT NEEDED 
Click can work without a belt. The middle clamp locks into to the thicker seam at the top of your pants and prevents it from dislodging. It's a secure design suited to either men or women.
 
Click Works Without a Belt 
ANTI-SWING & ANTI-BOUNCE
Click's guided tracks represent a crucial improvement over conventional steel pin holsters. Once funneled and secured into Click's holstered position, a camera, even with long lenses, won't swing and bounce as you walk.  
INSTANTLY MOUNTS ON TRIPOD
Once adapted to your camera, the Click’s Arca Swiss-compatible Quick Release Plate (Optional Dual Arca Swiss/RC2 Compatible Quick Release Plate for Manfrotto is also available for purchase) enables you to effortlessly transition between the Click Holster and a tripod without any adapter or plate change. Other compatible holsters sacrifice Arca Swiss’s build-in security catch that prevents your camera from accidentally dislodging from the tripod.
 
Click comes with Security Catch for tripod. 
Each Click holster that we ship is paired with a Pro Quick Release Plate. For additional Quick Release Plates please see Click Accessories below.
 
3 TYPES OF QUICK RELEASE PLATES 
Turbo Ace offers unprecedented versatility when it comes to instant tripod mounting. There are 3 types of mounting plates that works with the Click holster.

Pro Quick Release Plate is Arca Swiss compatible and its tapered edge provides easy NO-LOOK funneling for both large and small cameras. (Included with DELUXE/PREMIUM/ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES)
Lite Quick Release Plate is light and unobstrusive, a more practical fit for your smaller DSLR camera. (Can be purchased separately as an option.)
Dual Quick Release Plate for photographer who uses both the Manfrotto RC2 and the Arca Swiss quick release system. (Can be purchased separately as an option.)

 
Convert any Quick Release Plate to Arca Swiss for Click 
INVERTIBLE FOR LENS CHANGE
Click's smart invertible feature can easily transform into a Lens Changing Station . Simply holster the camera face up and the camera is lock and secured for lens change.
 
Click Instantly Transforms to a Lens Changing Station 
WORKS IN CONJUNCTION WITH NECK/SHOULDER STRAP
Click's open architecture allows you to simultaneously use your holster and your neck/shoulder strap. While Click Holster steadies and transfers the entire payload to your waist, your neck/shoulder strap retains all its original functions and serves as a fail-safe. To accommodate your shoulder strap's larger hooks to Click's Quick Release Plate, you will need the Shoulder Strap Anchor and Tension Balancer (Included with ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES).
 
Works in Conjunction with Shoulder Strap 
SAFETY LOCK
While a locking mechanism may prevent a camera from being accidentally knocked out of the holster, it's also inherently obstructive. In order to streamline camera access without sacrificing security, Click designers developed an exclusive Single-Hand Release mechanism to unlock and draw your camera in one smooth motion.
FAIL-SAFE STRAP
In lieu of using your neck/shoulder strap, you can instead choose to hook Click's adjustable Fail-Safe Strap between the Click Holster and its Quick Release Plate (mounted under your camera). If the camera is knocked out of your hand, the strap will catch the camera before it hits the ground.
 
Fall Safe Strap 
FREE FAIL-SAFE STRAP BY SHARING
Help us spread the word about Click. There are 4 different ways to get a Free Fail-Safe Strap ($12 value) with your DELUXE/PREMIUM/ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES
1. Share Click in your Facebook, Instagram or any Photography forum/blog and email us a link, print screen or photo of the computer screen of you sharing. You can choose to LIKE our Turbo Ace Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/turboacewow/
2. Email us a photo of other brand camera holster you own, within 12 hours after you have completed a Click pledge (email to Sales@turboace.com).
3. Sign up a friend to pledge one of the Click Packages, then both you and your friend will get a free Fail-Safe strap. Email us you and your friends names after he/she has pledged (email to Sales@turboace.com).
4. Help us reach a total of 1,000 Click packages.
We will very much appreciate your participation in helping us promote Click. Please feel free to use any of the photos on this page and share them with any photography communities.
WATERPROOF & SUBMERSIBLE
If you ever need to operate in the rain, underwater or simply in high humidity, we have included this waterproof, submersible and rust-resistant upgrade for all Click Packages. We went through the entire parts list of the Click to make sure it is rust proof. The main body is made of aluminum but due to strength requirement some parts have to be made of stainless steel and they are much more costly to produce than carbon steel used on many conventional holsters.
 
WATERPROOF & SUBMERSIBLE 
CAMERA CUSHION PAD
To prevent bigger, heavier cameras from bumping against you, a Camera Cushioned Pad can be fitted between your belt and the holster.
TRAVEL BELT
Although Click's 3-Point mount is compatible with most waist belts, you can choose between a couple of 2 inch belt options for personalized applications. While our light and robust Travel Belt (Included with PREMIUM / ELITE / ULTIMATE PACKAGES) will easily support an average DSLR camera, we have also designed a Pro Belt for professional and specialized applications.
 
Adjustable Travel Belt PRO BELT
Professionally integrated with multiple elements, the Pro Belt is structured to comfortably support heavier combination of camera gear for longer duration. While typical one-size-fits-all designs don't quite fit "all", Pro Belt's Dual-Adjustment truly provides the perfect cushion and fit for waists ranging from 24” to 46”, a compelling advantage over common waist belts in both function and comfort. (Included with ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES)
 
Pro Belt 

Dual Adjustments fit comfortably from 24”-46”
Secured Buckle Mechanism to prevent accidental releases
2” Belt with 3” Padding to comfortably support heavier payloads
Multi-Holster Options to support multiple cameras
Compatible with Cushioned Camera Pad

MULTI-HOLSTER SETUP ON PRO BELT
Need to use two cameras, three cameras (one on shoulder strap and two on the Pro Belt)? You can easily mount multiple Click Holsters on your waist belt and/or neck/shoulder strap. As you transition to heavier professional cameras/lenses, the best multi-holster/camera setup starts with our highly recommended Pro Belt for extra comfort and support.
There are two types of Camera Cushion Pads: a standard Camera Cushion Pad (Included with DELUXE/PREMIUM/ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES) for the primary holster and a different Camera Cushion Pad with Velcro & Belt Clip (Included with ULTIMATE PACKAGES) to mount additional holster on the Pro Belt.
 
  
CLICK SPECIFICATIONS

Dimensions: 3.8" width x 2.8" height x 0.7" thick (97mm x 71mm x 18mm)
Weight: 0.36 lb (163g)
Material: Aluminum & Stainless Steel
Finish: Anodized Black
Thumb Wheel Diameter: 18mm
Quick Release Plat: Compatible with Arca Swiss (38mm plate width) standard on many tripods.
Mounting Belt Width: 42.4mm (1.67") Maximum
Mounting Belt Width using Pad with Velcro Straps & Belt Clasp: 53.3mm (2.1") Maximum
Mounting Belt and Pad Thickness: 4mm Belt + 5mm Pad, Total 9mm
Mounting Vertical Strap Thickness: 10mm Maximum
Vertical Payload: 200 lbs
Funnel Shift Tolerance: 16mm (8mm on each side)
Funnel Angle Tolerance with Build-in Funnel: 5°-45°
Funnel Angle Tolerance with Expanded No-Look Funnel: 22°-75°

CLICK ACCESSORIES
Optional Click accessories below can only be purchased at the link below. To combine your Indiegogo package with these accessories so they can be shipped together without additional shipping cost, please enter your Indiegogo Backer Number in the Company Name Field when you enter your shipping address. http://www.turboace.com/icamdesigngears.aspx

Camera Cushion Pad fits on Travel Belt ($19)
Camera Cushion Pad with Velcro & Belt Clip for 2nd camera, fits on Pro Belt ($29)
Pro Quick Release Plate (Arca Swiss Compatible) ($19)
Lite Quick Release Plate (Arca Swiss Compatiblel) ($15)
Dual Quick Release Plate (RC2 and Arca Swiss Compatible) ($29)
Fail-Safe Strap ($12)
Expanded No-Look Funnel ($19)
Travel Belt ($19)
Pro Belt ($29)
Anchor & Tension Balancer to work with Shoulder Strap. Your shoulder/neck strap must be able to extend below your waist in order to work in conjunction with the Click ($19)
Waterproof Upgrade ($20 Value free with DELUXE/PREMIUM/ELITE/ULTIMATE PACKAGES ONLY)

CLICK PACKAGES CHART
 
 
CALIFORNIA SALES TAX
For packages shipped to California Addresses, please add 8% sales tax to your total pledge before shipping charges. Otherwise your California orders will not be shipped. 
TIMELINE & DELIVERY

April - Jun 2015: Click Holster Concept & Research
Jun - Aug 2015: Initial Click Holster Design & 3D Modeling
Aug - Sep 2015: Holster Prototype #1 & Evaluation of Single-Hand Release mechanism
Sep 2015: Holster Prototype #2 & Evaluation of mounting mechanism options and refinements
Oct 2015: Extension Funnel Prototype #1 with optimization of shift and angle tolerance
Nov 2015: Holster Prototype #3 to refine; Extension Funnel Prototype #2 & #3
Dec 2016: Holster Prototype #4; Click Field Testing
Jan 2016: Holster Prototype #5 with 3rd Party Testing & Evaluation; Pro Belt Concept & Design & Integration; More 3rd Party Testing & Evaluation, More Field Testing
Feb 2016: Holster Prototype #6 with integration of shoulder strap & R-strap; Pro Belt Prototype #1 & #2; Filming for Kickstarter starts; More 3rd Party Testing & Evaluation; More Field Testing
Mar 2016: Holster Prototype #7 & #8; Pro Belt Prototype #3; Start of Procurement, Launch Click Kickstarter Campaign; More Field Testing
Apr 2016: Completion of procurement and set up assembly line
May 2016: Click production begins; Click Kickstarter Campaign ends
Jun 2016: Launch Click Indiegogo Campaign
Jun - Aug 2016: Click production
Aug2016: Click Indiegogo Campaign ends
Sep 2016: Shipment of Click Packages to backers (Premium/Elite/Ultimate Packages)
Oct 2016: Shipment of Click Packages to backers (Deluxe)

There is no other entity more qualified that iCam Design, a division of Turbo Ace, a leading U.S. drone and camera gear developer since 2008.In developing Click, our vision is to innovate and craft a highly adaptable system worthy of the finest cameras. To meet this unprecedented challenge, Turbo Ace assembled a collective effort to push performance, increase functionality, refine aesthetics, implement adaptability and improve user experience. It’s truly an evolution based on an exhaustive cycle of innovation, prototyping, field testing and evaluation.As we near the final phase of this journey and continue to receive feedback from professional camera equipment reviewers, there is an increasing sense of urgency and excitement. story:
R-PUR is the first anti-pollution mask specifically designed for motorbikes and bicycles users, made in France. 

This mask allows you to breathe a clean air by filtering toxic particles, fine particles / diesel, pollens as well as viruses and bacteria present in the air, all without compromising on comfort and style.

This new generation filtering solution offer a protection greater than the highest European norm en149 - FFP3. 

Le masque R-PUR, c'est le premier masque anti-pollution made in France spécialement conçu pour les utilisateurs de 2 roues. 

Ce masque vous permet de respirer un air pur en filtrant les particules toxiques, les particules fines / diesel, les pollens ainsi que les virus et les bactéries présents dans l’air, le tout sans faire de compromis sur le confort et le style. 

Cette filtration nouvelle génération est au dessus de la norme européenne de masque respiratoire en149 - FFP3.
 

 

 

We have selected a high quality fabric with a "water repellent" coating that allows it to stay dry and waterproof while remaining extremely breathable. This fabric is used for, military grade and special forces uniforms but also in the high fashion industry. 

Nous avons sélectionné un tissu de qualité doté d'un revêtement "déperlant" qui lui permet de ne pas s'humidifier et ainsi d'être imperméable tout en restant très respirant. Ce tissu est utilisé notamment dans les tenues militaires des forces spéciales ou dans la haute couture.

 

The valve is a patented technological prowess increasing exhalations by 50% than with a conventional valve. This allows better internal filter ventilation when you exhale in order to stay dry. Furthermore, the hot air flow redirection system removes the appearance of fog on the visor or glasses.

La valve d'extraction de l'air chaud est une prouesse technologique brevetée permettant une expiration 50% plus rapide qu'avec une valve classique. Cela permet une meilleure ventilation interne du filtre lorsque vous expirez afin de rester au sec. De plus la redirection des flux d'air chaud permet d'éviter l'apparition de buée sur la visière ou les lunettes.

 

Thanks to the internal anti-perspirant thermo-control® you will always feel comfortable in your R-PUR mask. Its temperature control technology allows you to stay cool in summer or during physical activities but also protects you from the harsh winter air. No need for neck or face protection, with R-PUR, we’ve got you covered!

Grâce au revêtement interne anti-transpirant thermo-control® vous serez toujours à l'aise dans votre masque R-PUR. Sa technologie de régulation de la température vous permet de rester au frais en été ou lors d'un effort et vous protège de l'air frais en hiver. Plus besoin de cache cou, avec le masque R-PUR vous êtes protégés.

The fasteners have been specifically designed the helmet to fit easily over the mask. Additionnally, a 100% nylon self-adhesive allows for a secure grip and easy removal. The simplicity of our product remains one of our priorities.

Les attaches ont été spécialement conçues afin de permettre l'enfilement d'un casque par dessus le masque. De plus un auto-adhésif 100% nylon permet un accrochage / détachage facile. La simplicité d'utilisation de notre produit reste l'une de nos priorités.

This new generation filter enables the elimination of micro particles referred to as PM 2.5; however the filtering process goes further since it now filters up to nanoparticles which is the equivalent of PM 0,04 (60 times smaller than the PM2,5) ! In terms of comparison, let us add that norm EN149-FFP3, which is the highest European norm as far as breathing protection masks go, only requires up to a 0,4 micrometer filtration. Proof that R-PUR masks have gone the distance on that criterion!

Cette nouvelle génération de filtre permet de filtrer les micro-particules dites “PM 2.5”, mais la filtration va plus loin et filtre cette fois jusqu’à la nanoparticules, ce qui équivaut à PM 0,04 (60 fois plus petite que les PM2.5) ! En termes de comparaison il faut savoir que la norme EN149-FFP3 qui est la plus haute norme européenne en matière de masque de protection respiratoire ne demande qu’une filtration maximale de 0,4 micromètre. Car pour nous une efficacité optimale était une condition sine qua non !

 

Because it’s important that the filter is always very efficient, we opted for a replaceable filter solution for our mask. The filter needs to be replaced on an average of every 1 to 2 months depending on your usage, but don’t worry the mobile application will tell you when it’s time. The filters will be available on our website and shipped worldwide.

Pour être sûrs de vous offrir une filtration toujours optimal, nous avons décidé d’utiliser un filtre interchangeable pour notre masque. Le filtre se remplace entre 1 et 2 mois pour une utilisation moyenne en agglomération, mais rassurez-vous, l’application vous permettra de connaître l’usure exacte de celui-ci. Les filtres seront disponibles sur notre site web livrables dans le monde entier. 

You will be invited to give your itinerary information on our web site or on the smartphone application so it will provide you with the approximate expiration date of your current filter. It never been that easy to know when to replace it.

Vous serez invités à renseigner votre itinéraire à l’aide de notre site web ou de notre application mobile qui seront en mesure de calculer une date d’expiration indicative de votre filtre actuel. Ainsi il est simple de savoir quand le remplacer.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Thank you ! 
The R-PUR TEAM

story:
Hello, my name is Melissa Tarr.  I  graduated from the University of Massachusetts with a BA in Fashion Merchandising in 1988. My experience spans years in retail management ,visual display and wholesale apparel sales. I took my  successful career in fashion merchandising and my eye for the old and spun off a new venture in the spring of 2013.  Design of Mine- Vintage Chic repurposed Jewelry. A longtime resident of Cape Ann, I am inspired by the history and beauty that surrounds her. I love to incorporate earthy elements from hours of beachcombing  with vintage pieces.  Marrying shell and metal has proved to be a eye pleasing union.

Design of Mine offers an exciting mixture of custom designed pieces using repurposed materials, contemporary elements, and vintage jewelry.  Antique keys, charms and chains anchor my jewelry collection.  The eclectic mix offers something for everyone.

I embrace every aspect of my new business with a passion.  From the hunt for the unique elements which are focal points of the pieces, to the creation process, then finally selling to the public. I particularly pride myself on being able to look at objects in a different way and my ability to incorporate them into something of beauty.  What some see  as a pile of broken "junk" I see as a jackpot of opportunity to "create".

I am seeking funding for my new business in the amount of $5000.  I have been very successful in the retail aspect of my business.  Now I would like to develop the wholesale end.  There is a definate need in the wholesale market for one-of-a-kind pieces.  Boutique owners want to have something original and not "cookie cutter" for their stores.  The funding will help to grow this aspect of the business.  Specifically being used  toward purchase of stock, advertising, and trade show fees.
