I love to incorporate earthy elements from hours of beachcombing  with vintage pieces.  Marrying shell and metal has proved to be a eye pleasing union.Design of Mine offers an exciting mixture of custom designed pieces using repurposed materials, contemporary elements, and vintage jewelry.  Antique keys, charms and chains anchor my jewelry collection.  The eclectic mix offers something for everyone.I embrace every aspect of my new business with a passion.  From the hunt for the unique elements which are focal points of the pieces, to the creation process, then finally selling to the public. I particularly pride myself on being able to look at objects in a different way and my ability to incorporate them into something of beauty.  What some see  as a pile of broken "junk" I see as a jackpot of opportunity to "create". I am seeking funding for my new business in the amount of $5000.  I have been very successful in the retail aspect of my business.  Now I would like to develop the wholesale end.  There is a definate need in the wholesale market for one-of-a-kind pieces.  Boutique owners want to have something original and not "cookie cutter" for their stores.  The funding will help to grow this aspect of the business.  Specifically being used  toward purchase of stock, advertising, and trade show fees.

story:
Founded in 2014, Martenero is a premium watch brand offering original, contemporary designs at accessible price points. Our aesthetic revolves around creating unique designs that stem from the classics. With a strong respect for the heritage brands that have come before us, we're driven to make our watches new classics in their own right. We call it ‘Tradition Refreshed’. 

Martenero’s latest release is the Edgemere Reserve. A new version of our original Edgemere model, it’s a nautical-themed watch inspired by the marine chronometer.

It’s the seventh design that we have released, and we think it’s our best yet. With so many watches to choose from, it was important that we came up with a design that was truly original. And we think we did it - this is something you can take anywhere and know that you’re wearing something truly unique. You don’t have to look like everyone else, you can have your own original look when wearing this watch. 

 The Edgemere Reserve is also our most detailed watch yet with complications including a power reserve, 24-hour time subdial, and date window. This is the type of design and details that are more commonly found on watches costing thousands of dollars, and we’re happy to be able to offer this at a fraction of that cost.

The design of the watch is loosely based on a marine chronometer, but we took it in a pretty unique direction. At the heart of the design is the dial. An elevated hour ring stands out against the base of the dial, and for each colorway the hour ring contrasts noticeably with both the interior and outer ring. This adds a lot of complexity and nuance to the design, and helps give it such an original look. We then added very distinctive colors to each dial in order to better highlight certain design features. Every piece of the dial design is unique to Martenero. 

We then made sure that all of the hands are all balanced and work in harmony together. Since there are five hands in total (hour, minute, second, power reserve, 24-hour time), it was important to get this detail right as any inconsistency would throw the design out of balance.

We decided to size this at 40 mm, which we think is the perfect size for this watch. It’s noticeable but not overpowering on the wrist, and it nicely fits a wide range of wrist sizes.

 There are five different available colorways for the Edgemere, and they’re all completely different. While it’s one design, the five different options feel like totally different watches. There’s white if you’re looking for something understated; blue or dark blue if you want something sporty; silver for something a little more dressy; or black if you prefer a look that’s a little more stark. 

BLUE

Our flagship version of the Edgemere Reserve, this is the most colorful and eye-catching version of them all. The multi-colored dial stands out on the wrist, but still maintains its balance through the carefully selected colors. 

WHITE

Our most restrained version, the white dial is perfect for those who prefer something a little more understated on their wrist. Despite its low-key design, the blue and red accents give the watch a very unique look.  

SILVER

The dressiest version of them all. Bursts of silver and light blue give the watch a dressy touch that makes it perfect for any occasion.

DARK BLUE

The deep blue color on this dial is for those who want something sporty yet versatile. Touches of red break up the otherwise all blue aesthetic.

BLACK

In contrast to our more colorful options, the black version is for those who prefer to wear something a little more stark. Touches of blue and mint add character to the otherwise subdued looking watch.

 All of the watch’s complications come together to add extra dimensions to the watch, and they also influence the aesthetics and help give it such a unique and balanced look.

POWER RESERVE

The watch has a 40-hour power reserve, and through the index at the top of the watch you can always see exactly how much of a charge you have built up. The hand will be pointed to the right at a full charge, straight down when it’s halfway charged, and to the left when the charge is running low. 

24 HOUR TIME

This is a subdial (dial within a dial) that sits at the 6 o’clock position. It doesn’t ever need to be adjusted, and gives a representation of the time in a 24 hours context.

DATE WINDOW

A clean, framed date window sits at the 3 o’clock position, not only displaying the date but also helping to balance the dial design.

While the design of the Edgemere Reserve is clean, the construction behind it is surprisingly complex. The case is made of stainless steel, and it’s an original design with both brushed and polished finishing. The crystal is a double-domed sapphire crystal with anti-reflective coating, which means that it won’t get scratched and there won’t be any reflection or glare when you’re checking the time. On the back of the case, there’s a sapphire crystal that shows the movement inside. In reference to the original design inspiration of the marine chronometer, there’s a nautical compass etched into the crystal. All of these elements come together to make a unique, well-designed and well-built case..

The dial has three layers between the base, hour ring, and applied numerals. This creates a visual stacking effect on the dial which is not seen on most watches. We then added texture to the base layer of the dial, framed the date window, and selected colors that best complement the design. It’s a very complicated construction that brings out the details in this design. 

 The Edgemere Reserve is powered by a Miyota 9132 movement that registers at 28,800 beats per hour. This is a very high-quality Japanese movement used by premium watch brands, and it's similar in accuracy to much more expensive Swiss movements.

One feature of the movement is that it’s automatic, so it will wind itself naturally as you wear it. It's also hacking, meaning that the second hand stops when you set the time, allowing for more accurate time setting. And with a power reserve of 40 hours, this is watch you can set aside for a while and it will continue to tick. 

 Our leather straps are made of genuine leather in the US. Matching edge paint on the sides and a hypoallergenic leather lining give the straps a very refined, finished look. The stitching details on the sides show that each strap is made by hand.

 All of our watches are designed, assembled, and tested in New York. Assembly and testing takes place in a Brooklyn workshop staffed by a family of watchmakers that has been in the business for two generations. This level of experience ensures that every watch that goes out the door has been subject to the highest level of scrutiny.

 Mechanics

  • Movement: Miyota 9132
  • Type: Mechanical; Automatic; Hacking
  • Beats Per Hour: 28,800
  • Power Reserve: 40 Hours

Specs

  • Case: 316L Stainless Steel
  • Crystal: Double-domed sapphire with anti-reflective coating
  • Case Back: Sapphire Exhibition
  • Water Resistance: 30 meters
  • Crown: Screw-Down

Dimensions

  • Diameter: 40 mm
  • Lug To Lug: 47 mm
  • Thickness: 11.8 mm
  • Lug Width: 20 mm

story:
Our Story & Our Mission

We are a team of volunteers that started Hope Outfitters back in 2012. 

We have poured everything into this company, not taking a penny of the profit along the way.  Since we started our clothing brand we have given back over $220,000 to the causes we have partnered with.  We started it because Jesus gave up everything to love us and we, in a small way, want to do the same.  So here's how it works: we design and sell apparel and give all of the profits away.  Every year we partner with a new charity, work to create awareness for it and donate 100% of the profits from the sale of our clothing back to its cause.  

It may seem small to buy a T-shirt, but it matters.  Mother Teresa said, "...Do small things with great love."   When all of us work together, our small acts can add up to make a big difference.  From the sale of our T-shirts we have healed the sick, sheltered the homeless, rescued girls out of human trafficking, provided clean water, granted money to adopting families, and so much more...all because of your purchases.  Together we are changing our world for Christ.  Together we are making a difference that will last for all eternity.

Our Campaign (What We Need)

We have exciting news to share--we have decided to open up a new store in downtown Spokane, WA at River Park Square Mall.  We know it's time to take that next big step of faith to expand our mission and message. 

    So here's where you come in!  God's been faithful to grow our company in the last 5 years, debt free!  Because He has used people like you to help us every step of the way.  When you invest in this project it will go toward three things:

    1. Remodeling the existing store (see video for pictures).  This is a huge job: new electrical, drywall, paint, signage, and furniture; cost is $45,000 (We'll try to do as much of the work ourselves to keep the cost down as much as possible.)
    2. Designing, developing and manufacturing our new fall clothing line to include tees, hats, dresses, and pants; cost is $55,000.
    3. All new inventory to fill up the new shop; cost is $60,000.

    Total Investment Needed: $150,000

    Here is a pic of the store that needs remodeling work:

    What You Get

    We are so grateful for anything you can give, but every person who gives over $100 will receive a $40 gift card.  This will allow you to buy any sweatshirt, T-shirt, or hat of your choice.  (The gift card will be sent to your email by March 2019.) To see our clothing click here.

    The Impact

    This new store and new line of clothing is important for 3 reasons:

    • First, we'll be able to sell more gear which means we can give back more money to the causes we partner with.
    • Second, we'll be able to spread the light and love of Jesus through downtown Spokane.
    • Third, this is our first big step of faith and it will be a model for opening stores all over America.

    We completely remodeled an older building for our first shop a few years ago and did most of the work ourselves.  It took an entire summer to finish but since then it has been a source of light and hope in our community.  Here is a picture of our existing store in Richland, WA:

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Maybe you don't have the means to give.  You can also help by sharing this campaign on social media.  Use the tools here and help us get the word out.  Together we can make a difference in the lives of so many around the world!!

story:
What We Need

We have completed our second round of prototypes (hooray!), and we're ready to begin production of the three versions of The Bike Dress and two types of safety shorts. 

Our travel has been scheduled to both San Francisco and Los Angeles to meet with our top choices for manufacturing. This trip will allow us to decide which one will be the best fit, and move forward with production. This is where we need your help! 

The funding will go towards paying for our first production run of these products so that we can begin selling them online. 

How We Will Make it Happen

Beth has over 15 years of experience in marketing, advertising, and design, and will take the lead on these aspects. Amber has 12 years of experience in project management, research, and planning. We are determined, hardworking, and passionate, all which will fuel the success of this endeavor.

We have the support and guidance of: 
George Bogdewiecz, who provides unique advice with his blend of both HR and Operational experience. He is known for implementing human capital initiatives from a business perspective and driving profitable growth. He currently runs his own company (HR Strategies and Solutions).

Erica Ellingsen, who has been vital in our business planning in getting The Bike Dress off the ground. She has a B.B.A. in Global Business: Marketing & Management from the University of Portland Pamplin School of Business, and 6-years of working in roles providing strategic financial and operational data analyses for companies both large and small. She is skilled in design and development of advanced financial models, corporate accounting, strategic financial management, and contract review and negotiation, making her an invaluable asset. 

Melissa Mattson has also been important to our success! She helps us with website design and maintenance, as well as marketing and SEO opportunities. She has over 5 years of experience working with agencies in Colorado and Oregon. 

About Us

We are two sisters that love when the clothing we own can serve multiple functions. It never made sense to us to wear ugly sneakers on the walk to work, then carry fancy but uncomfortable high heels to wear at the office. We feel burdened by the need to wear workout clothes to bike from place to place, and carry a change of clothes to look presentable when we arrive at our destinations. Why can’t one item do it all? 

We desire clothing that will suit our active lifestyles, but also encompass the stylish way we present ourselves every day. 

We are creating The Bike Dress in order to: 
Support a way to live more simply with a dress that can be used for any type of activity. 
Create clothing in which any person can feel comfortable and confident.
Empower people to be more active throughout every facet of their lives, not just when wearing athletic gear.
Reduce the need for carrying a bag or purse, but still have the ability to carry the necessities in pockets. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute financially there are other ways:

  • Share this page on Facebook, or with your email contacts. 
  • Brag about The Bike Dress to all your friends, and tag us on Instagram & Facebook @thebikedress.
  • Take our survey to help us better plan ahead.

story:
As seen in:

 

WHY TELEIO?

  • We cut out the middleman to provide you with the highest quality watches for unbeatable prices
  • We use the best materials to craft each and every one of our watches
  • Bold and clean designs that distinguish themselves with their minimalistic look, rather than excessive branding
  • 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We're so confident in our product, if you're not fully satisfied with your Teleio watch, return it within 60 days for a full refund.

Brands that use our same materials charge up to $500. Right now, you can get our watches for only $115!

Wow...the design is so sleek...

Why is Teleio's quality different?

Easily adjust any watch look with our quick interchangeable bands. One watch, many looks...Add $30 to your pledge for every extra strap that you would like.

 GENTLEMEN'S COLLECTION

  

  

  

LADIES COLLECTION 

  

  

 

   

 

The

Teleio Design

The Teleio design is very unique in itself. We purposely created our watches with no logos on the watch faces. Our goal was to distinguish ourselves with our clean and modern look, rather than excessive branding.

What is Teleio?

We decided to name our collection after Greek gods and goddesses to pay tribute to my fiancé’s Greek heritage. The gentleman’s collection is named after the Greek gods: Apollo, Poseidon, Hades, and Ares. The ladies collection is named after the Greek goddesses: Iris, Artemis, Athena, and Aphrodite. We named this watch brand Teleio, which originates from the Greek word “τέλειο.” When translated, the word means “perfect” in English. This is the standard we kept in mind when creating our product experience. Our goal is simply to provide you with the highest quality watch at prices that other reputable watch brands cannot compete with. We call this the Teleio Experience. 

    

 

 

100 % Satisfaction:

We here at Teleio know you all are absolutely going to fall in love with our watches, which is why we are giving every customer 60 days to return the watch if customers are not satisfied. We're here to provide our customers with the best possible product experience. In building this watch brand, our customers are our number one priority. 

2 Year Warranty:

Each watch comes with a 2 year warranty that covers any defects that may arise in the production of the watch itself. 

Warranty does not cover:

The life of the battery wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched crystal; alteration of the color and/or material of non metallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber; peeling of the plating) Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.)

Why Teleio Needs You?

With your help, the Teleio Experience will challenge and shake up the current industry standards when it comes to watch quality and pricing. Not only are you pledging for one of our high quality Teleio watches, you're helping us make our dream a reality. My fiancé and I always wanted to start a company that we were passionate about, and we're finally able to do this with your support!

How will you fulfill the order? 

After going through countless designs and prototypes, the final product is ready for mass production. Our manufacturers and fulfillment centers are in place and ready to fulfill thousands of orders not only quickly, but also efficiently. Thanks to our history with working with many other successful KickStarter projects, we are now able and ready to handle a project of this size. This will be our best project yet and your satisfaction is 100% guaranteed. 

International Backers

This project isn't just for backers in the United States. We will also be shipping Teleio watches worldwide! With that said, there are unique processes that apply specifically to international backers that we'd like you to be aware of. Please note that there is no way for us to charge any additional amount on our end for any applicable VAT/duties that may be a result of a specific country's local tax code. Therefore, these fees may be incurred upon receipt of your reward. These fees are the responsibility of each backer

Risks and challenges

We have worked with other successful Kickstarter projects and from those experiences we have gained the knowledge to pick the right facilities in order to easily transition from funding to delivery. We have manufacturers and fulfillment centers in place in order to produce and ship a high volume of orders in a timely fashion. We are very excited for each of you to receive your limited edition Teleio watch.
story_txt:
As seen in: WHY TELEIO?
We cut out the middleman to provide you with the highest quality watches for unbeatable prices

We use the best materials to craft each and every one of our watches

Bold and clean designs that distinguish themselves with their minimalistic look, rather than excessive branding

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We're so confident in our product, if you're not fully satisfied with your Teleio watch, return it within 60 days for a full refund.
Brands that use our same materials charge up to $500. Right now, you can get our watches for only $115!Wow...the design is so sleek...Why is Teleio's quality different?Easily adjust any watch look with our quick interchangeable bands. One watch, many looks...Add $30 to your pledge for every extra strap that you would like. GENTLEMEN'S COLLECTION      LADIES COLLECTION          The Teleio DesignThe Teleio design is very unique in itself. We purposely created our watches with no logos on the watch faces. Our goal was to distinguish ourselves with our clean and modern look, rather than excessive branding.What is Teleio?We decided to name our collection after Greek gods and goddesses to pay tribute to my fiancé’s Greek heritage. The gentleman’s collection is named after the Greek gods: Apollo, Poseidon, Hades, and Ares. The ladies collection is named after the Greek goddesses: Iris, Artemis, Athena, and Aphrodite. We named this watch brand Teleio, which originates from the Greek word “τέλειο.” When translated, the word means “perfect” in English. This is the standard we kept in mind when creating our product experience. Our goal is simply to provide you with the highest quality watch at prices that other reputable watch brands cannot compete with. We call this the Teleio Experience.       100 % Satisfaction:We here at Teleio know you all are absolutely going to fall in love with our watches, which is why we are giving every customer 60 days to return the watch if customers are not satisfied. We're here to provide our customers with the best possible product experience. In building this watch brand, our customers are our number one priority. 2 Year Warranty:Each watch comes with a 2 year warranty that covers any defects that may arise in the production of the watch itself. Warranty does not cover:The life of the battery wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched crystal; alteration of the color and/or material of non metallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber; peeling of the plating) Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.)Why Teleio Needs You?With your help, the Teleio Experience will challenge and shake up the current industry standards when it comes to watch quality and pricing. Not only are you pledging for one of our high quality Teleio watches, you're helping us make our dream a reality. My fiancé and I always wanted to start a company that we were passionate about, and we're finally able to do this with your support!How will you fulfill the order? After going through countless designs and prototypes, the final product is ready for mass production. Our manufacturers and fulfillment centers are in place and ready to fulfill thousands of orders not only quickly, but also efficiently. Thanks to our history with working with many other successful KickStarter projects, we are now able and ready to handle a project of this size. This will be our best project yet and your satisfaction is 100% guaranteed. International BackersThis project isn't just for backers in the United States. We will also be shipping Teleio watches worldwide! With that said, there are unique processes that apply specifically to international backers that we'd like you to be aware of. Please note that there is no way for us to charge any additional amount on our end for any applicable VAT/duties that may be a result of a specific country's local tax code. Therefore, these fees may be incurred upon receipt of your reward. These fees are the responsibility of each backerRisks and challengesWe have worked with other successful Kickstarter projects and from those experiences we have gained the knowledge to pick the right facilities in order to easily transition from funding to delivery. We have manufacturers and fulfillment centers in place in order to produce and ship a high volume of orders in a timely fashion. We are very excited for each of you to receive your limited edition Teleio watch.

story:
Purobu will work anywhere in the world, so please pre-order, wherever you are.

The free cellular data will work in 40 countries (View Map). If you are not in one of these countries, you can still use Purobu with your own SIM card (or WiFi).

Need to contact us? E-Mail hello@purobu.com

Share our campaign with your friends and get Purobu for free (More Info)


Introducing Purobu

Purobu is a tiny, lightweight device with a number of integrated sensors providing real-time information to the Purobu Cloud via Cellular/WiFi. This is then made available to the owner via a web-based control panel or an API.

The Purobu Probe has infinite uses. Some users may decide to use the probe to track their property or family in real-time (with no technical skills required) from anywhere in the world, via the website. On the other hand, developers may wish to create their own applications using the powerful API.



The Purobu Probe

Made of anodized aluminum and measuring 2in x 2in (5cm x 5cm), 0.4in (1cm) thin, and weighing only 1.8oz (50g), the device is small and light enough to be placed just about anywhere. It has a built-in lithium polymer battery, which will run up to a week (approx. 24 hours of continuous, real-time tracking).

You can also extend the battery life considerably by choosing to receive updates at intervals rather than in real-time. The device can also be powered by Micro USB.

Maintaining a continuous connection to the Purobu Cloud is essential to creating a real-time experience; as such the device has multiple connection methods available including WiFi and Cellular, with automatic roaming between the two.

Purobu uses the very latest ultra sensitive wireless technologies to ensure that a connection is possible in almost any environment.

The advanced integrated antenna design allows Purobu to continue working in a pocket, a bag, inside a glove compartment, or even inside a multi-story building.


Onboard Technologies

Sensing

  • GPS/GLONASS
  • Accelerometer (3 axis)
  • Gyroscope (3 axis)
  • Magnetometer
  • Barometer
  • Thermometer
  • Luminosity

Wireless

  • WiFi (2.4GHz)
  • 2G/3G Cellular
  • Bluetooth (LE)


The Purobu Cloud

The Purobu Cloud provides you with live access to location and sensor information via a web-based control panel, as well as a powerful developers' API.


Purobu Control Panel

We have developed the control panel to be as intuitive and app-like as possible.

We have created a control panel that displays live information without needing to refresh; this includes showing the device's current location via a moving marker on a map, as well as device stats, such as signal strength and battery status.

You can also add and remove widgets that display sensor data.


Security & Privacy

We take security and privacy very seriously, and fully understand how sensitive your location and sensor information can be. By default, we don't store your information on our servers for any longer than it takes for you to access it via the control panel or API. Once you have viewed the latest data, it is then disregarded.

If you are happy for us to store your data (using industry-standard encryption), you will be able to enable a feature, (disabled by default), which will provide you with extra functionality, such as being able to view historical information.


Purobu Cloud API



The Rest API is incredibly powerful and enables you to build your own apps using sensor data from the device. Our goal is to ensure that new sensor information is available in the API within 100ms. This low level of latency will allow you to create the kind of apps that would usually require a local sensor.

We will be providing libraries in various programming languages, including PHP, Ruby, Java, .NET, Python and Node to make integration even simpler.


API Resources

  • Device Status (Connection, Battery, Signal Strength)
  • GPS/GLONASS (Latitude, Longitude, Altitude)
  • Accelerometer (X, Y and Z in G-Force)
  • Gyroscope (X, Y and Z in Rads)
  • Magnetometer (X, Y and Z Heading + Mag/True North)
  • Barometer (Reading in hPa)
  • Thermometer (Reading in °F or °C)
  • Luminosity (Reading in Lux)

The Indiegogo Campaign

We have made significant progress over the past few months, including coding the initial version of the cloud software and device firmware, and we are currently working on a prototype, with a view to presenting it in January 2015.

Although we have set a goal of $50,000 on Indiegogo, we actually already have the funding we need to complete the project. We are using the Indiegogo platform as a way to generate pre-orders which will enable us to manufacture a larger initial batch, and therefore bring down the cost of individual components.

To this end, we are offering our Indiegogo backers some truly fantastic perks.


The Perk - $149

  • 1 Purobu Probe (Saving $100 off the launch price of $249)
  • Lifetime Purobu Cloud Service (with Unlimited API)
  • 12 Months Unlimited Cellular (Works in 40 Countries)
  • Micro USB Cable + US/UK/EU/AU and 12v Car Plugs
  • Free Global Shipping

As an Indiegogo backer, you won't have to pay any monthly or annual fees for the service. The Indiegogo perk also includes a SIM card with 12 months of unlimited cellular, which can be used in 40 countries at no cost to you.

The cellular service doesn't require registration or activation, will work on arrival, and will stop working after 12 months. The cellular service will not automatically renew. After 12 months you have several options available to you:

  1. Take the SIM card out and use WiFi only OR
  2. Put in your own SIM card from any provider OR
  3. Buy another 12 months of data from Purobu (will not automatically renew)

Cellular Coverage

With the included SIM card, your probe will be able to roam on an unlimited basis in 40 countries at no charge. The SIM card can only be used with the device and is restricted to allow internet traffic to and from the Purobu Cloud.



About Us

The team working on Purobu is small but very experienced and includes software developers and hardware engineers with over 30 years of combined experience. All of the people working on Purobu are fully committed to completing the project.

Purobu is a project by Tesla Dynamic Ltd, a company based in the United Kingdom with company registration number 08161832, whose registered office is at 86-90 Paul Street, London, EC2A 4NE, United Kingdom. Tesla Dynamic Ltd has been trading since 2012 in the telecoms space, including M2M cellular services.


The Timeline

We expect to begin shipping in early 2015, however we don't want to over promise and under deliver. We have therefore added a few extra months to the timeline to take in to account any possible delays. We are hoping to surprise our backers.


Referral Scheme

Share our campaign with your friends and get a free Purobu device at launch.

Simply share our campaign with your friends on social media using the Indiegogo Share Tools, and for every 5 people who click your link and go on to pre-order (perks of $149 and above), you will receive a Purobu device at launch completely free of charge, with lifetime Purobu Cloud, 12 months of cellular and free shipping.

There are no limits on how many devices you can earn.

Please remember it is vital that you log in to your Indiegogo account before sharing, otherwise we will be unable to track your referrals.


FAQ


When will you begin shipping the Purobu Probe?

Our goal is to begin shipping before August 2015.

Do you ship internationally and how much does it cost?

We ship internationally and we don't charge you for shipping.

Will the probe work from anywhere in the world?

Yes, providing the probe can pick up a cellular signal or connect to a WiFi network.

What cellular networks does the probe support?

The probe is unlocked and will accept a standard size SIM from any network that uses SIM cards (GSM networks such as AT&T and T-Mobile in the USA).

How much cellular data does the SIM card include?

It's unlimited. You can use the probe on the cellular network as much as you like in the 40 countries listed. However, you will not be able to put the SIM card in any other device as it has been configured to only work with Purobu.

I don't live in one of the 40 countries, can I still use cellular?

Yes, but not with the included SIM card, which will only work in the 40 countries listed. You will need to acquire a SIM card from a local network.

Are those pictures of the actual probe?

No, they are 3D renderings. But they are a true representation of what the probe will look like. We plan to keep to the rendered design as much as possible.

story:
Risks and challenges

Materials have been secured, manufacturers have been chosen, and designs are finalized. It's just a matter of fulfilling MOQs. We've allotted an extra 3 weeks cushion into the project deadline for potential unforeseen circumstances.

You will be able to choose your size(s) and design(s) towards the end of January, after all the payments are processed. We will sending out survey approximately two weeks after the project deadline.

Materials have been secured, manufacturers have been chosen, and designs are finalized. It's just a matter of fulfilling MOQs. We've allotted an extra 3 weeks cushion into the project deadline for potential unforeseen circumstances.You will be able to choose your size(s) and design(s) towards the end of January, after all the payments are processed. We will sending out survey approximately two weeks after the project deadline.

story:
The Magazine

A slim and stylish fashion, art and culture publication, Ligature features some stunning photography and art.

It is excellently produced, and takes a look at the exquisitely strange yet beautiful worldwide.

Originally started as an online magazine, Ligature has made a transition to print. Past issues have featured work from a range of talented contributors, from Vasilisa Forbes, Ei Kaneko, Nico Perez and Asako Narahashi.

The new issue we are looking to produce has taken influence from the stunning aesthetics from the 70s. Featuring beautifully styled photography spreads, interviews with exciting designers, original poetry and a developed interest in design and architecture. 

We pride ourselves on complete creative freedom, with no restraints from advertisers; making ligature a genuine creative platform.

We want you to experience the magazine in print, in order to consume the beauty of our content as it deserves. We need your support.

The Details

Name: Ligature

Frequency: Biannual
Price: £8
Format: Perfect bound, high quality paper

Testimonials/Reviews

http://www.prettypaperthings.com/?paged=3
http://www.openingceremony.us/entry.asp?pid=8955

Jennifer Inglis of Style Crusader said: "I absolutely love the layout and the content." 

Shini of Park & Cube said: "I'm really loving the aesthetics of it all...an all-round good like this is a rare find. " 

John of Fashion Copious said: "very beautiful..."

Risks and Challenges 

In order to pay homage to the beautiful work inside our pages, the pages must be beautiful themselves. This means high printing costs.

We have also experienced high demand for pre orders, so need to ensure that orders are fulfilled; currently we do not have enough copies.

As we are not funded by advertisers, we are not relying on their revenues to make the magazine happen. It’s funded by the readers, for the readers.

We need your help to get our third issue printed!

Links

http://www.ligaturemagazine.co.uk
https://twitter.com/Ligature_
http://instagram.com/ligaturemagazine

Thanks!

story:
My name is Matt Roberts, founder of Musashi Designs, and I would like to briefly describe my goals for funding and tell you a little about myself.  I am a stay at home dad with two children, one with special needs.  I work part-time outside of the home, but my real passion is creating new designs for the Musashi Designs brand.  I have a degree in Advertising and Promotion from Western Michigan University.  

My main goal for funding is to launch my own website and online store.  Currently, I am selling t-shirts, skateboard decks, and hats at www.zazzle.com/musashi_designs.  In order to be more creative, innovative, profitable, etc. I need to get my own website and online store.  Any extra funding I receive would go towards advertising, sponsorships and software upgrades.  Currently, 10% of all profit is donated to charity, and I would continue that practice in the future.  My goal is to turn this dream into a full time business, and I will work tirelessly to do so.  

 

Please check us out at www.facebook.com/musashidesigns  and on twitter @MusashiDesigns.

 

Thank you for your consideration.

story:
Bref résumé

 

bonjour je suis vanessa ausset jeune mere au foyer de 29 ans j ai deux enfant un de 5 ans et un de 18 mois j aime l informatique l economie et la politique 

mon projet est de crée un site hard discount sur les vêtements invendu des grandes surface mais aussi des marques afin que tout le monde puissent bénèficier de vêtement neuf a petit prix pour toute la famille ce projet me tien enormement a coeur car je souhaite que malgré la crise financiére et économique chaque personne chaque parent puissent se faire plaisir sans le sentir durement sur le budget personnel

les contributions vont nous aider a demarrer a financé le projet de "lavanshop.com" mais egalement a nous faire une publicité en plus de celle que nous avons sur les reseaux sociaux

 

Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

 

il nous faudrait récolté 2700 euros pour les palettes de  vêtement

100 euros pour la creation du site internet

400 euros pour la restauration du local

300 euro pour la chat de vehicule de livraison

les fond récolté si nous n avons pas totalement le financement seront toujours acquis pour l entreprise car cela permettrais de commencer par commander 1ou2 palettes de vêtement afin de pouvoir quand meme commencer notre activité

L'impact

 

ce projet peut etre trés précieux pour vous invetisseur car vous pouvez profité de réduction énorme sur des vêtements déjà accessiblea toute bourse.

lorsque que j ai travaillé au secour populaire de ma ville nous avons recu des donation de vêtement neuf de grande surface que l on as put vendre a prix trés bas pour une population dans le besoin 

 

D'autres façons d'aider

 

pour toutepublicité n hésistez pas a donné le liens d indiegogo correspondant a notre projet afin que tout le monde profite des avantage que nous proposons

les fond récolté si nous n avons pas totalement le financement seront toujours acquis pour l entreprise car cela permettrais de commencer par commander 1ou2 palettes de vêtement afin de pouvoir quand meme commencer notre activité


L'impact
 
ce projet peut etre trés précieux pour vous invetisseur car vous pouvez profité de réduction énorme sur des vêtements déjà accessiblea toute bourse.
lorsque que j ai travaillé au secour populaire de ma ville nous avons recu des donation de vêtement neuf de grande surface que l on as put vendre a prix trés bas pour une population dans le besoin 
 


D'autres façons d'aider
 
pour toutepublicité n hésistez pas a donné le liens d indiegogo correspondant a notre projet afin que tout le monde profite des avantage que nous proposons

story:
We need your help by sharing this project with your social media!!!  We will use the funds raised to manufacture  so we can bring the V Wallet to market at a reasonable price.  We have already been fully funded on Kickstarter and now we are taking additional pre orders offering them for the same price.  These will have a MSRP of 39.99-49.99.  We are offering them here for over half that price.  Please ask any questions you may have about this project in the comment section and we will answer them as soon as we can.  For more money clips and wallets visit ProtectedCards.com

 

Story

 

 

It all started when my mother in law had her credit card information stolen while at an art fair in Kansas City, MO (not a large city, thieves are everywhere).  She did not lose her card or have it stolen by the thief.  They simply acquired the name, credit card numbers and expiration date with a RFID scanner.  These can be purchased for under 50 dollars online and now most smart phones can also receive this information with a free app.  Since then we started the Protected Cards Brand so others can stop this from happening for a reasonable price with different products.

 

 

 

Overview

 

The V Wallet is a super slim minimalist RFID blocking wallet that can fit in your front pocket. Because of its minimalist design the V wallet will change how you carry your cards and cash. The V wallet is made with exquisite top grade genuine pebble leather. It has 8 card holding pockets and a center "V" pocket for cash (each side has 4 card holders). 

Comes with or without a clear ID slot (ID slot V wallet has 4 card holding pockets on one side, 1 ID window pocket on the other side and a center "V" pocket for cash). 

Currently offered in Black and Camel color but will offer in other colors if the stretch goals are reached. 

 

 

Introducing Protected Cards RFID Blocking V Wallet

 

 

The V wallet by Protected Cards offers the same functionality and space as a traditional wallet but without the bulky design.  Shown in the picture above with 4 cards on each side and 15 bills.

Constructed with Exquisite Genuine Cowhide Pebble Leather

All of the V Wallets pockets are RFID Blocking to prevent credit card skimming


 

Minimalist V Wallets has 8 Card Slots (4 on each side, both sides are identical)

The V Wallet opens like a V in the middle to hold cash

The V Wallet is tested with up to 16 cards and 15 bills and 2 keys

 

Size: 4 1/2 x 3 3/8 x 1/8 inches

Weight: ONLY 1.3oz

 

Color: Black or Camel
Protected Cards Embossed on the Front of the V Wallet
Each V Wallet will come with a Protected Cards dust bag

V Wallet with ID Window

 

 

 

 

V Wallets with ID window have 4 Card Slots on one side and 1 ID Window on the other side

V Wallet with ID window also opens like a V in the middle to hold cash

V Wallet with ID window tested with 10 cards, 1 ID, and 15 bills

Size: 4 1/4 x 3 1/4 x 1/8 inches

Weight: ONLY 1oz

Stretch Goals

We will offer different colors for each stretch goal reached

If the campaign reaches $4,000 then we will offer a Blue color.  If the campaign reaches $6000 then we will offer a Wine Red color.  If the campaign reaches $8000 then we will offer a Cream color.  If the campaign reaches $10,000 we will offer a pink color.  Each stretch goal will be available in both the V wallet and V wallet with ID window.

 

Distribution

If anyone would like to distribute our V Wallets please send us a message and we will send you the details

 

TIMELINE

End June: Lauch Indiegogo Campaign

July: Indiegogo Campaign Ends

End July: Survey and Finalize before Production

August: Start Production

September: Quality Control

October: Shipments to Backers

Watch this video to see how easy it is for your credit card info to be stolen by nearby devices.

 

RFID Protection: The Secret to Keeping Your Data Safe!

Identity Theft is at All Time High! Unless properly shielded, your card-based data is readily available when any active reader is in range!

This RFID Blocking Card Protects Your Smart Cards from unwanted capture of data from contactless cards issued by banks, governments and other institutions such as:

* Credit or Debit (for example: MC PayPass, VISA PayWave, AMEX expresspay, INTERAC Flash, etc.)

* Enhanced driver's license, Hunting and fishing license

* Access / security control, Employee / School ID

* Health insurance, Medical ID

* Gift, Membership, Library

* Transit / Park pass

Protects against access by NFC-equipped Smartphones

Disclaimer: No RFID protection is 100% effective in all circumstances due to the constant changing in technology.

Social Media

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/protectedcards/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ProtectedCards

Follow us on Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/protectedcards/

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/protectedcards/

Subscribe to our YouTube channel:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwbR0vZ4zScyxf1KbUnE4VQ

Risks & Challenges

 

The only Risk or Challenge would be the time these will take to produce. Since we are not the manufactures of this product there may be some time differences than what we lay out in the process. We have been doing tons of research for a good factory to produce these wallets. We hope that there will be no issues with production. If for any reason we can not full fill our orders in the time that we determined we will absolutely keep all backer updated along the way.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that everyone can't make a contribution but that doesn't mean that you can't help:

  • Please get the word out about this product and share with all your friends and family by using the Indiegogo share tools are are on the top of this page

story:
Why Swinplet


Unique features:

  • You don't have to take cards out for reader swiping. 
  • You need only ONE HAND for reader swiping.
  • Create your unique signature move for paying. 
  • You can pay faster after a few times of practice. More speed, less hurry!!
  • OMG you pay sooooo fast!! 

Just swing, swipe. Cards stay inside all the time.


There is tons of pressure on you if you don't pay fast enough

We all feel the guy behind is pushing us, while we are paying, especially when we have a million items in our cart. 

Life is hard already, Swinplet is here to help.

And Swinplet is the solution!


Let's go slim

Slim wallet is comfortable and slick, it's a minimalist life style, simple, easy, and right on point.


More space

Many wallets has instant swipe function for 1 or 2 cards, so that you don't have to take your card out. But let's face it, we have more than just 1 most-used cards. We have debit cards, credit cards, card for work, card for gym.....Wouldn't it be better if you can apply instant swipe to all those cards? Never has to take your cards out for swiping! One hand motion for everything! That's Swinplet!  

Story about us else where:

http://www.berkeleysg.com/hardware-community/crowdfunding-spotlight/swinplet-wallet/


Swinplet Family

Swinplet Simple:

Swinplet Leather:

Swinplet Europe:


choice of color: 

We offer light, dark brown and black for leather wallet, more samples will be available soon

Swinplet personal:

We offer name engraving on your Swinplet to make it unique and personal. Please leave what you want to print on your wallet in the survey once the project is funded! :) 


Our very first Swinplet 1.0 :)

and story is far from finished :)

Plus, we offer additional service to our rewards:

1. RFID protection:

Aluminum foil RFID protection for Swinplet. For this special add on feature, please add 3 more dollars and leave us a message, thank you so much!

2. More card slots:

Each wallet come with 4 slots and one back pocket. Perfect for 5 cards and some cash. We can add one more slot for no additional charge, but if you want more slots, we charge 1 more dollars for each additional pocket.

3. Gift package

If you are purchasing Swinplet as a gift, we would love to provide a nicer package for you, and include a nice thank you card to demonstrate our special thank to you. Please add 5 more dollars and leave us a message, thank you so much!

Looking forward to hear from you, and together we can make swinplet even better!

story:
Hello everyone.

My name is Hila and I`m from Tel Aviv, Israel.

I first started my infatuation with the body at the age of 7 when I enrolled to Ballet class for the first time. 

Since the age of 7 and up to this point I explored the body and its many aspects.  This through dance, Pilates, anatomy, Auyrveda, massages etc.

Today  I`m exploring the body from a new angle, while becoming a fashion designer. 

Due to my mother`s brave struggle with breast cancer and the process that she has gone through I decided to produce a clothing collection that gives an answer to most of the needs that arise while struggling with the disease.

But first, I have to study fashion design in order to make it right.

Recently I got accepted to the IED, one of the leading academies for design studies in Europe. Sadly I cannot pay the tuition fee, and this is where I need your help.

 

All the funding from this campaign will cover the tuition fee and basic cost of living.

Of course I won’t rely just on your generous contribution. I will work as much as possible, but more excess time means more space for me to work on my final goal- creating a special collection for breast cancer fighters.

As a ballet dancer I’ve learned that devotion is above all.

I won`t rest until I`ll reach my goal. This project is my mission in life.

 

In order to continue the circle of donation I will contribute 5% from the total income to the NBCF. 

Also, I will give a one-piece item specially designed by me to show my sincere gratitude for your contribution.

The final goal, after I graduate, will be to produce a clothing line for women who fight breast cancer.

The long and hard process of healing includes many limitations and many needs that should be considered.

For example, the intolerance of the skin to sun due to chemotherapy and radiation, the sensitivity of the skin to synthetic fabrics, the loss of privacy due to medical exams, but most importantly, the feeling that their femininity was taken away from them.

Another important aspect that people tend to forget is what happens to these women after recovering from the disease.

Most of these women quit their jobs and invest all of their lives in fighting, in surviving.

After recovering they often find themselves without a working place and without direction in life.

As such, my vision is to allow these women to find their place back in society, by creating more job positions for them such as dressmaking, marketing, advertising and all that is necessary in order to produce the clothing line, and in doing so, to bring them back to a creative and productive path while helping other women who are dealing with the disease.

I believe in fare trade, in fair employment terms, in high quality of every product and reasonable prices since it may occur to any woman at any stage in her life.

Recently I have started to work at the offices of curediva.com, an internet site that will launch very soon. This site provides support for women who fight breast cancer from the moment they receive a diagnosis and all the way through the healing process. 

This is where I was first exposed to how the whole process is important for them also this is where I first heard of the necessity for proper clothing and occupation after recovering.

 

I will appreciate every donation you can give me, but if u can’t – It’s ok.

Sharing is Caring – spread the word –On your  Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin and ect`…

Thank you

Hila.

story:
Women are known to consider heel shoes to be more important than a simple accessory. Wearing heel shoes all day long involves compromises. In the past, new technologies have revolutionized sports shoes by considerably increasing their efficiency but one question remains: what about heel shoes? As a sophisticated woman, you juggle with many hats in your everyday life and we believe you expect more from your shoes.

Our team carried out extensive research to design a removable heel shoe. Alegory now allows you to change the style of your shoes to suit your mood and your needs by switching the height, color and design of the heel at any time.











Quality is one of the main concerns of our company. From the choice of raw materials to manufacturing, Alegory develops all its processes around the absoluterequirement of quality.

We select our leather in the best Italian tannery and are very proud of our eighty-year-old traditional French factory. Our shoes received the “Made in France” label, as a reward for their high quality.


 

Auréa and Jessica are high-quality finished heels: one cut pump with 5 stiches per centimeter and a leather sole with an injected rubber pad.






To give you a taste of things to come ...




We would like to thank you and the community of fans for allowing us to succeed in the footwear industry.

By bringing this project to IndieGoGo and directly to you, we can cut distributors and retailers, as well as additional marketing expenses. Therefore we can offer you up to 50% discount on the selling price.





At end of campaign, we will send out a link to ALL backers to enable you to submit the style, the color and the size selection.





You can contact us on : +33 9 61 38 35 64  Or contact@alegory.com

How can I choose the size, the colors and the style of my Alegory pair of shoes ? 

At the end of the crowdfunding campaign, we will send you a link to access a page containing a form to be filled out, through which you will be able to choose the sizes, the colors, and the style of your removable heel shoes.

You can already visit our website www.alegory.com to view our collection and discover our products, our concept and our design.


What will Alegory do with the money raised?

We will first start to produce the molds for the heels and develop the tooling. We will also place orders with our raw material suppliers. In order to ensure the best quality of the molds and the production process, our lead time is two months. Then, we will launch the manufacturing of the shoes and the heels in our qualified French plants.


When will I receive my pair of Alegory shoes?

Our manufacturing partners are very excited to start the first Alegory production. As soon as our campaign ends, the different components of the shoes will be manufactured.
Hoping to collect your choices in 20 days after the campaign, our team plans to deliver the first order of Alegory shoes at the end of September 2014 and the second order during October 2014. We will do everything in our power for you to receive the shoes as soon as possible.



How do I know my size?

Quality and comfort are our main priorities. To that end, you will find Alegory shoes in half sizes based on French measurements. One half size represents 3.3 millimeters: you will therefore get a perfectly suited pair of shoes, acting as a second skin. (French Sizes from 36 to 41.5 )  

You will find a foot scale to be printed in full size enabling you to check your size. This measurement will allow you to discover your size in the international shoe size conversion charts.

In case you hesitate between two sizes, or if you have a skinny foot, we would recommend you to choose the smaller size. In case you have a regular or wide foot, we would recommend you to choose the closest size.


What happens if I don't like my Alegory pair of shoes?

This situation is unlikely to happen, but strange things happen sometimes. If you are not satisfied with your Alegory pair of shoes, please contact us at http://www.alegory.com/contact/ and we will do our best to exchange or a issue a credit note, depending on our product availabilities. 

Only products that have not been worn, returned in perfect condition and in the original packaging will be subject to exchange. We suggest that you try your shoes inside and on a clean surface.


What can I do if I don't want to take my Alegory shoes off because they’re so comfortable?

Please do not panic, you are not the only one in this situation. No one will judge you. The only solution is to make sure you have enough pairs of Alegory heels, in order to be able to change your style whenever you want.

We recommend that you have at least two different designs, heights and colors of heels. You can find more than a thousand possibilities of assortment. Ladies, the choice is going to be hard! 


Thank you very much for taking the time to check out and support  our Indiegogo campaign! We would hugely appreciate if you could share it with your friends.

Greg and Lidia.



Thanks to our partners :

discover your size in the international shoe size conversion charts.
In case you hesitate between two sizes, or if you
have a skinny foot, we would recommend you to choose the smaller size. In
case you have a regular or wide foot, we would recommend you to choose the
closest size.
What happens if I don't like my Alegory pair of shoes?
This situation is unlikely to happen, but strange
things happen sometimes. If you are not satisfied with your Alegory pair of
shoes, please contact us at http://www.alegory.com/contact/ and we will do our best to exchange or a
issue a credit note, depending on our product availabilities. 
Only products that have not been worn, returned in
perfect condition and in the original packaging will be subject to exchange. We
suggest that you try your shoes inside and on a clean surface.

What can I do if I don't want to take my Alegory
shoes off because they’re so comfortable?
Please do not panic, you are not the only one in
this situation. No one will judge you. The only solution is to make sure you
have enough pairs of Alegory heels, in order to be able to change your style
whenever you want.
We recommend that you have at least two different
designs, heights and colors of heels. You can find more than a thousand
possibilities of assortment. Ladies, the choice is going to be hard! 
Thank you very much for taking the time to check out and support  our Indiegogo campaign! We would hugely appreciate if you could share it with your friends.Greg and Lidia.Thanks to our partners :

story:
burnt. is back by overwhelming demand! 

WOOD is definitely proving to be GOOD!

Click here to see the original burnt. campaign that thanks to our fans raised an amazing 

$17,800

Why burnt. 2.0? 

We were overwhelmed by requests to extend our campaign and wanted to provide an outlet for new and existing fans to buy and stay in touch while we build our ecommerce site at getburnt.ca and work on a truly unique pair of West Coast sunnies! - be sure to like us on FACEBOOK and follow us on INSTAGRAM we rely on your love!

Watch for

  • unique multipack perks with extra woody good savings
  • and...... at the mid way point of the campaign..... well you'll see


Chesterman - Our classic bamboo frames, handmade and named after our favourite surf beach. Light, tight and a clean, classic fit available in blonde (natural) or carbonized (our favourite). Oh, and they FLOAT. Perfect for the beach or the boat.

For the spec techies: Chestermans are sized at 53-18-145.

Cowichan - Handmade dark hardwood frames. Slightly larger, they carry a trendy, modern profile that Steph and Krystal love but still look great on Mike's dad. Available in the full range of our polarized lens colours and shown here in Clayoqout green. Don't drop these ones in the lake, you won't get 'em back. We learned the hard way that hardwood doesn't float. 

A wider fuller profile at 54-22-140.

Sombrio - Just a little off the beaten path. A little trendy, a little classic, another local surf spot. Same size and shape as our Cowichan frames but with the distinctive wood grain of wood. Another handmade hardwood frame, you'll want to keep these ones out of the water unless you want to dive for them. Here with classic black lenses, or choose your favourite of our polarized lenses from below.

54 22-140 if you're counting. 

Chesterman - The oh so natural blonde version of our favourite style. 

Visit getburnt.ca for a look at our complete lineup. 

Save Now Before Campaign 2.0 is Over!

Our wicked windshields...7 layers of POLARIZED UV 400 awesomeness! Why are you still paying huge dollars for plastic frames and a brand name? Our polarized lenses will keep you from squinting just as well as any $200 pair of the same ol' same ol'. Be different wear wood!

What colour will you choose? Glacier blue, Clayoquot green, Classic black or burnt. orange?

Made of 100 % recycled cardboard each box is hand stamped, making them as unique as the contents within.

Located on Vancouver Island on Canada's west coast, burnt. is based in one of the few locations in the world where you can surf and snowboard in the same day. Inspired by the landscape around us, we have big ideas for the future. From closed loop bamboo rayon clothing designed with emerging artists (watch for socks - James has a thing for socks) to bamboo horticulture on Vancouver Island, we're dreaming big. Come with us. 

meet the entire burnt. crew here

wear wood, get burnt.

story:
You can use it as a kind of DIY watch and development board which can be connect to extended equipments. Whats more, customers can use it to DIY a unique smart watch easily with your own imagination!


Hardware:

The wristwatch is made of Silicone material which does no harm to skin, more comfortable. And different color of the wristwatch for choosing.


It's with Multi interfaces (IIC、SPI、ADC2、ADC3) to connect more modules.


It's a DIY smart watch which can improve your soldering ability while enjoy the happiness of making products. what's more, you can add someone's name and send it to him as a special gift.



It has the SPI download interface which can connect to the downloader to download program. You even can remold it to develop your own products.


It uses the IIC interface between the PCB and the 0.96〞OLED. Besides, it uses the U8glib driver which is more convenient and faster.


It uses the polymer lithium batteries to provide 3.3V to 5.0V wide voltage supply.We’ll not provide the backer with battery, as it’s prohibited by international shipping agency. Thank you for your understanding!

Software:

It's based on Arduino which is faster and more convenient.

It has the convenient API, so you can develop a smart watch easily.

It has the the reserved selection menu which it’s easy to add other code to the program.


The written program of this ICWatch is based on the powerful U8glib of the Arduino, so it is easy to be transplanted.


Operation:
You can fulfill the different functions and adjust the parameters with two programmable buttons on the PCB. What's more, you can define the functions after pressing the buttons.


Heart Rate sensor modules:


Temperature sensor modules:


Light sensor modules:


Touch key modules:


Soil sensor modules:


If you buy multiple products, we will be giving you some of the very seful, interesting sensor. It's cool!


Why we choose Crowdfunding？

We hope you can support us, then we can produce it and share it with the supporters.

Besides, it encourages us to develop more creative products. Thanks for all of you, thanks for Indiegogo!

If you want to know more, please visit our website

story: Sahai Jewelry is a unique and affordable brand created to make people feel special inside and out. When I was younger people called me fat and ugly and I didn't feel special at all so one day my mom bought me beads and my parents showed me how to make simple pieces of jewelry. When I would wear it kids really liked my jewelry and I always got complemented on it. I started feeling more confident and happy about myself so as time went on my skill and talent grew. I started creating jewelry to make myself feel better and now I want to share my jewelry with other people so that they can feel better about themselves as well. I need your help to share my talent and vision with the world. All of my pieces are crafted with the customer in mind. There is a piece of jewelry for everyone.

story:
What is this project about?

www.packagefromportland.com | @packagefrompdx | Package from Portland

My name is Megan Bigelow and I'm the founder of Package from Portland, a quarterly subscription package of Portland, Oregon made dry grocery items. As a result of large grocery stores, we have become incredibly distant from truly connecting with the food shopping experience, leading to a non-existent relationship with the people whose hard work went into the creation of the goods. Through this business, I plan to connect the world with the best dry grocery goods of Portland and the people behind them! Join me on this path to deliver simple, good things!


How will the funds be used?


To connect people with the expansive amount of great items produced in Portland, Oregon, shipping logistics are key. Funds raised in this campaign will be used to purchase wholesale items in bulk, shipping boxes, packaging and print materials. Everything needed to get Package No. 1 out for folks to enjoy! 

If the goal is not met, the funds will be used to partially cover the costs. Any amount helps!


What's in each package?


Timeline


Frequently Asked Questions

What is inside of each package?

Inside each package is 4-6 dry grocery items that are a part of a theme. Think "Picnic at Peninsula Park" or "Rainy Day Under a Blanket." These are full-sized products of Portland-made goods, embodying the culture, taste and aura of Portland.

Will subscribers know what they are getting each quarter?

Subscribers will only know they are getting a product from the Featured Artisan each quarter and will not know about the other items in the package OR the theme of the package.

Can I purchase products individually?

No, this is a subscription package service only, no goods are available for individual purchase.

What is the difference between the one-time and quarterly options?

One-time: A one-time option in which you pay for one shipment of the package.

Quarterly: An auto-renewing option in which you pay once every three months and receive a package once every three months. A new package begins shipping in December, March, June and September.

When will I be charged?

You are charged upon placing the order and again at each renewal period (see "What is the difference between the one-time and quarterly?" above)

Can it be purchased as a gift?

YES! The option is available when selecting the product.

Do you ship internationally?

No, unfortunately, at this time, we are unable to ship internationally. Check back soon for updates!

Is there a commitment?

While each subscription type will auto-renew on the same day every three months of the original sign-up, the subscriber can always cancel before the next billing cycle by logging in via the upper-right menu bar.


Risks & Challenges

Launching Package from Portland would be a dream come true! Despite having come far enough to share a cohesive idea, we know we still have challenges ahead, even if we are fortunate enough to get funded! Should anything unexpected arise, we will be timely and transparent about informing all of our backers.

While we've attempted to consider everything that could come our way, we realize it isn't practical to plan for everything. Here are some potential challenges we may have to navigate:

Delays in printed materials (product lists, boxes): We use the highest quality printed materials to give our subscribers the best experience. These products usually arrive to us in a timely fashion, though always have the possibility of being delayed.

Supplier delays: As the retailer, we do not produce the goods that we include in each package. This means that we rely on the Portland-based artisans to fulfill orders as we need them. It is always a possibility that they may be delayed due to a variety of factors. If such a delay occurs, we will consider alternative suppliers that offer products of equal quality and value.

Shipping delays: This project is run by a small group of people who will be manually fulfilling orders. While we plan to work incredibly hard to ensure all orders are fulfilled and shipped by the estimated delivery date, we realize something could get in the way.

Customer Service delays: For the same reasons as "Shipping delays" there is currently only a small group of people who will be responding to customer inquiries. As such, there may be delays in the response. However, we will be prompt at setting expectations should this situation arise.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you like what we are doing though are unable to back up, talk about us!

Twitter: @packagefromPDX

Instagram: Package from Portland

Facebook: Package from Portland
