story:
PRESS RELEASE

English, Simplified Chinese (简体中文), Traditional Chinese (繁體中文)


For viewers in some region having problem seeing the above YouTube video, the contents is here: Powerpoint (简体中文), Youku Video (简体中文). NavSpark 点名时间上中文說明: http://dwz.cn/navspark_demohour


WHAT IS IT?

NavSpark is a small, powerful, breadboard-friendly, 32bit development board that is Arduino compatible, with a world class GPS receiver as on-board peripheral, and under $15. 

There is also NavSpark-BD, a variant model having world-class GPS/Beidou receiver as on-board peripheral, that enables you to adopt new GPS/Beidou satellite navigation technology when Broadcom Qualcomm just recently came out with solution supporting Beidou to their tier-1 smartphone customers like Apple and Samsung.

NavSpark puts leading edge satellite navigation technology in the hands of the makers.

...

Up until now, adding GPS to an Arduino requires additional GPS shield, which adds cost and size. NavSpark has GPS built-in, so there is no need for an additional GPS shield. And it's cheap enough to leave in any project.

This little NavSpark board packs big features: 100MHz 32bit RISC/FPU, 1024KByte Flash, 212KByte RAM, high-performance GPS, many peripherals and I/O pins. With 32bit processing power, number crunching capability, and very large memory, NavSpark takes your projects to a whole new level.


THE STORY

We have been developing GPS related products for some years. The GPS chipset nowadays are quite powerful. Seeing many small development boards on the market with limited memory space and low computation power, we believe a small low-cost 32bit development board using our new more powerful Venus 8 chip, integrating GPS library into Arduino IDE, offering at near 8-bitter price and with GPS functionality, may serve as an useful and attractive building block for the maker community. 

The Venus 8 chip is built with enough MIPS and memory to process signal from combination of 34 GPS, GLONASS, Beidou, and Galileo satellites in parallel simultaneously. It is the reason why it has more memory and computation MIPS than most popular low-cost embedded microcontrollers on the market.

Unsure if there will actually be sufficient interest in small low-cost development board built from powerful satellite positioning processor chip (like GPU used in non-graphic applications), this Indiegogo campaign is our approach to find out. 

If you like the idea and find it could be useful for your applications, please support this campaign to let us know. With sufficient interest, NavSpark will go into production and be made available.  


The NavSpark is essentially an easy to use, breadboard-friendly version of our Venus838FLPx GPS module with GPS library SDK integrated into customized Arduino IDE.


ARDUINO COMPATIBLE

NavSpark is designed to run Wiring, the same simple code as the Arduino platform. There is no need to learn any new programming language or environment. Your standard Arduino sketches run on NavSpark.


TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION:

GENERAL SPECS

·  Support Arduino IDE (custom integration of Wiring libraries, Windows & Linux)

·  GPS on board

·  Breadboard compatible

·  38mm x 18mm size


HARDWARE SPECS

·  100MHz 32bit LEON3 Sparc-V8 + IEEE-754 Compliant FPU

·  1024KB Flash Memory + 212KB RAM

·  ~80uA/MHz @ 3.3V

·  Powered and programmed by mini USB connector

·  1 full duplex asynchronous UART

·  1 asynchronous UART transmit

·  2 SPI with master/slave mode configurable

·  1 I2C

·  1 24bit PWM

·  17 digital I/O pins (shared with above functional pins)

·  Atomic clock synchronized P1PPS time reference with +/-10nsec accuracy

DESIGN FILE AVAILABILITY

NavSpark hardware design files (schematic, board design, and bill of materials) will be released and made available to users. Source code of the customized Arduino IDE will also be made available; the GPS / Beidou / GLONASS navigation kernel library integrated will remain in library file format. Users are free to extend, adapt and redistribute the hardware and software for any projects, commercial or non-commercial. 


POTENTIAL APPLICATION EXAMPLE

Data Logger: Log the position, velocity, time information to an external SPI Flash; later read out the logged data to find out where it has been. With UAV, R/C plane, or paragliding, you can replay the flight path. For marathon running or skiing sporting event, each contestant’s performance behavior can be analyzed. It might also help answer question of where the dog has gone during the day…

Outdoor GPS Clock: When gotten position fix, the date and time is always accurate, in sync with the UTC or GMT time. One never needs to manually adjust time once properly programmed, even when turn on after power loss.

Time reference: After getting GPS fix, the P1PPS 1Hz pulse is synchronized to atomic clock within +/-10nsec. Date and time in the NMEA sentence corresponds to occurrence of the rising edge of just occurred P1PPS pulse. Thus for under $20 you have a precision time reference nearly as good as atomic clock to +/-10nsec! For hardware in different locations that need to be time synchronized in operation, this provides a low cost method to achieve it.

Below is a data logger back track device using something equivalent to NavSpark without extra microcontroller. Instead of Venus 822, previous generation 0.13um Venus621 chip is used inside; it has 60MHz 32bit RISC, no FPU, 512KB Flash, 96KB RAM.

http://www.znex.de/

http://wandermagazin.de/downloads/wander/88-93_Service_Praxistest_163.pdf

Above is a long term 3 ~ 6 months test by a famous German hiker magazine. Competing against 3 big and expensive GPS devices, Garmin Etrex 30, Magellan Explorist 610 and Falk Ibex 40. Eventually Garmin Etrex 30 and Venus621-based miniHomer convinced jury and received test seals; published in March/April 2012 edition.

NavSpark uses latest generation low power 55nm Venus 822 chip; could design into more complex devices such as fitness GPS watch like applications.

NavSpark provides accurate position, velocity, and time for applications in need of this information. Even if used without GPS, NavSpark’s 100MHz RISC/FPU + 1MByte Flash + 212Kbyte RAM + UART + SPI + I2C + GPIO hardware has less restrictive use than a typical 8bit development board.


DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE


HARDWARE DEVELOPMENTS

NavSpark is a shrink down version of the bigger Venus 822 development board. With Venus 822 board already working, the design of NavSpark hardware is rather straight forward.


SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENTS

We are currently customizing the Arduino IDE to work with the Sparc-V8 compiler and Venus 822 hardware; it is expected to be finished before end of January, 2014.


MANUFACTURING

If the NavSpark funding campaign is successful, we will:

Place order for BOM to manufacture NavSpark on Feb 7, 2014

Send BOM to factory for production, March 17, 2014

Ship out NavSpark, March 27, 2014


PROJECT HISTORY (Updated When New Application Developments Available)

The 55nm Venus 8 returned in May of 2013. It has been packaged into small 5mm x 5mm QFN40 package, with very limited I/O, for standard global navigation satellite positioning module applications. 

The 7mm x 7mm QF56 packaged Venus 822 has more I/O pins, suitable for small global navigation satellite positioning application development. The earlier model of Venus 822 development board for internal use is much larger in size as shown below:


For NavSpark, optimizing the circuitry and moving some components to the back-side, we reduce the size to 38mm x 18mm. Below is the 1st hand-made NavSpark prototype:


NavSpark prototype receiving GPS signal:


NavSpark-GL prototype:


NavSpark-GL prototype receiving GPS+GLONASS signal:


NavSpark-BD prototype receiving GPS+Beidou signal:


THANKS TO OUR SUPPORTERS

Thank you for taking time to find out what NavSpark is. We hope you're excited about NavSpark and will back our project for us to make it available for the maker community.


PERKS

5 major types:

NavSpark: with GPS receiver, max 10Hz update rate

NavSpark-GL: with GPS/GLONASS receiver, max 10Hz update rate

NavSpark-BD: with GPS/Beidou receiver, max 10Hz update rate

NS-RAW: carrier phase raw measurement GPS receiver, max 5Hz update rate, RTKLIB supported S1315F-RAW in the form of plug-and-play NavSpark

NS-Sparc: NavSpark without GPS, for use as very low cost development board


USD$15   Early Bird 1pcs Set (with Antenna)

Choose this if you never used GPS in your project before and want to give it a try. You’ll receive 1 NavSpark and 1 active antenna* at early bird special price.


USD$17   Early Bird 1pcs Beidou Set (with Antenna)**

Choose this if you never used satellite navigation in your project before and want to give GPS/Beidou a try. You’ll receive 1 NavSpark-BD and 1 active antenna* at early bird special price.


USD$17   Early Bird 1pcs GLONASS Set (with Antenna)**

Choose this if you never used satellite navigation in your project before and want to give GPS/GLONASS a try. You’ll receive 1 NavSpark-GL and 1 active antenna* at early bird special price.


USD$29   Early Bird 2pcs Set (with Antenna)

Choose this if you feel the NavSpark processing power and memory capacity alone might come in handy and worth checking out. You’ll receive 2 NavSpark and 2 active antennas* at early bird special price.


USD$33   Early Bird 2pcs Beidou Set (with Antenna)**

Choose this if you feel the NavSpark processing power & memory capacity alone might come in handy and worth checking out, and like to try out with GPS/Beidou technology. You’ll receive 2 NavSpark-BD and 2 active antennas* at early bird special price.


USD$33   Early Bird 2pcs GLONASS Set (with Antenna)**

Choose this if you feel the NavSpark processing power & memory capacity alone might come in handy and worth checking out, and like to try out with GPS/GLONASS technology. You’ll receive 2 NavSpark-GL and 2 active antennas* at early bird special price.


USD$35   Regular 2pcs Set (with Antenna)

Choose this after Early Bird Sets are gone. You’ll receive 2 NavSpark and 2 active antenna* at Indiegogo promotional price.


USD$39   Regular 2pcs Beidou Set (with Antenna)**

Choose this after Early Bird Beidou Sets are gone. You’ll receive 2 NavSpark-BD and 2 active antenna* at Indiegogo promotional price.


USD$39   Regular 2pcs GLONASS Set (with Antenna)**

Choose this after Early Bird GLONASS Sets are gone. You’ll receive 2 NavSpark-GL and 2 active antenna* at Indiegogo promotional price.


USD$50   NS-RAW 2pcs Set (with Antenna)

Due to numerous requests asking availability of carrier phase raw measurement output capability, we decided to add an additional perk, NS-RAW, a 5Hz capable S1315F-RAW (RTKLIB compatible) carrier phase raw measurement GPS receiver module with USB interface in the same form factor as NavSpark. NS-RAW is to be used as it is without Arduino programability, due to some technical issue yet to overcome and we prefer not to over-promise. You’ll receive 2 NS-RAW and 2 active antenna* at Indiegogo promotional price.


USD$220   NS-Sparc 21pcs Set (FedEx Shipping included, no Antenna)

Several people asking if we could provide very low cost development board no more than $10, simply for using Venus822's powerful 100MHz 32bit RISC/FPU + 1MByte Flash + 212KByte RAM + other peripherals resources without using GPS/GNSS. The NS-Sparc is our answer. You’ll receive 21 NS-Sparc at Indiegogo promotional price, FedEx shipping is included. We’ll combine all your other perks and ship together along with this one. If you already chosen $20 FedEx perk previously, drop us a private comment letting us know which of the NavSpark, NavSpark-GL, or NavSpark-BD 1pcs Set Perk you like to swap. Below is a handmade prototype showing what NS-Spark will look like without GPS/GNSS. All I/O functions in NavSpark remains the same, just lack of 1PPS function that needs GPS/GNSS.


Note *: The active antenna receives GPS / GLONASS / Beidou signals. 1”x1” ceramic patch internal active antenna, 10cm length, U.FL connector. 

Note **: Yes! NavSpark-GL and Nav-Spark-BD are for those of you wondering "My iPhone and Galaxy phone has GPS/GLONASS. Why isn't there GPS/GLONASS for my Arduino projects?"  NavSpark-BD allows you to jump ahead of your iPhone and Galaxy phone and early adopt GPS/Beidou technology!


SHIPPING

All perks has airmail postal shipping fee included, to be shipped from Taiwan. Postal shipping is not trackable. Please additionally choose the $20 FedEx shipping perk if you want your selected perk to be trackable.


RISK and CHALLENGES

We at SkyTraq have years of experience bringing GPS/GNSS chipset and module products to the market, shipped over 7 million pieces to-date globally. We have working prototype of NavSpark, so there should be little chance for surprises later on. That being said, no contract manufacturing could be guaranteed without hiccups or delay beforehand. It could due to other sudden large order shortening originally planned capacity, or delay in receiving ordered materials, and so on. We have sufficient experience to reduce such risk to minimum. If there is a delay that will shift our shipping timeline, we will update you. We'll bend over backwards to get NavSpark to you.


UPDATES 

1. Following current trend and suggestion from our supporter, micro USB connector will be used in NavSpark shipment.

2. If Indiegogo's funders count for the NavSpark campaign surpass 4000 backers, we’ll provide 2 antennas for each NavSpark board instead of 1, as bonus for all. Excessive plug/unplug of the antenna may wear out the U.FL female connector on the antenna side, a 2nd antenna at hand will come in handy.

3. From numerous requests for an micro SD card holder, the concept of an Adapter Board for NavSpark is born. The Adapter Board will have micro SD card holder + through holes for battery connection + Li-Ion battery charger IC, as below link shows. 2 Adapter boards with 2 battery connector cable is provided as $12 perk, postal shipping included. April 10 for combined perk shipment if this perk is picked, due to 5 kinds of boards we need to prepare; we will try to meet March 27 delivery if possible.

http://t.cn/8FVyxQ3

     Select this Adapter Board perk only if you gotten a NavSpark, NavSpark-GL, or NavSpark-BD; otherwise you have no need for this Adapter Board.

4. GPS is designed to work outdoors and can take longer time to get position fix in signal attenuated indoor environment, and might not be able to get position fix if signal becomes too weak. Due to some backers asking if we can provide active antenna with longer cable, making it possible to do GPS testing at some distance from the window (with antenna placed by the window of course) we added an extra $15 perk consisting of (external GPS/GLONASS/Beidou active antenna with 2.5 meter cable and SMA connector) + (15cm SMA-to-U.FL connector cable).

 SMA-to-U.FL connector cable example: http://goo.gl/VAKrwG

internal active antenna example: http://goo.gl/4Iwhht

external active antenna example: http://goo.gl/O0qbue


NavSpark drawing Mandelbrot figure in 48x84 pixel resolution: each point computed and drawn, after completion pause for a while, clear entire screen, pause for a while, then repeat. As the figure appear almost instantly, computation with an FPU is quite fast.



COMMONLY ASKED QUESTIONS (click to view PDF file)

The above PDF contains aggregate of useful Questions & Answers which came up in the Comment page, which might recur, with newest on the top for easier reading by those who occasionally wish to keep track of the discussions on NavSpark.

John Beale, a very supportive backer with no affiliation to NavSpark nor SkyTraq, is very kind to make a compilation of the discussed items into a more structured FAQ to assist later supporters or visitors to the page. This structured FAQ will be easier for first time reading: http://pastebin.com/raw.php?i=1f5iXwiT   Thanks John, much appreciated !
story_txt:
PRESS RELEASEEnglish, Simplified Chinese (简体中文), Traditional Chinese (繁體中文)For viewers in some region having problem seeing the above YouTube video, the contents is here: Powerpoint (简体中文), Youku Video (简体中文). NavSpark
点名时间上中文說明: http://dwz.cn/navspark_demohourWHAT IS IT?
NavSpark is a small, powerful, breadboard-friendly, 32bit development board that is Arduino compatible, with a world class GPS receiver as on-board peripheral, and under $15. There is also NavSpark-BD, a variant model having world-class GPS/Beidou receiver as on-board peripheral, that enables you to adopt new GPS/Beidou satellite navigation technology when Broadcom Qualcomm just recently came out with solution supporting Beidou to their tier-1 smartphone customers like Apple and Samsung.NavSpark puts leading edge satellite navigation technology in the hands of the makers....Up until now, adding GPS to an
Arduino requires additional GPS shield, which adds cost and size. NavSpark has GPS
built-in, so there is no need for an additional GPS shield. And it's cheap enough
to leave in any project.
This little NavSpark board packs big features: 100MHz 32bit
RISC/FPU, 1024KByte Flash, 212KByte RAM, high-performance GPS, many peripherals and I/O pins. With 32bit processing power,
number crunching capability, and very large memory, NavSpark takes your projects
to a whole new level. THE
STORY
We have been developing GPS related products for some years. The GPS chipset nowadays are quite powerful. Seeing many small development boards on
the market with limited memory space and low computation power, we believe a small low-cost 32bit development board using our new more powerful Venus 8 chip, integrating GPS library into Arduino IDE, offering at near 8-bitter price and with GPS functionality, may serve as an useful and attractive building block for
the maker community. The Venus 8 chip is built with enough MIPS and memory to process signal from combination of 34 GPS, GLONASS, Beidou, and Galileo satellites in parallel simultaneously. It is the reason why it has more memory and computation MIPS than most popular low-cost embedded microcontrollers on the market.Unsure if there will actually be sufficient interest in small low-cost development board built from powerful satellite positioning processor chip (like GPU used in non-graphic applications), this Indiegogo campaign is our approach to find out. If you like the idea and find it could be useful for your applications, please support this campaign to let us know. With sufficient interest, NavSpark will go into production and be made available.  The NavSpark is essentially an easy to use, breadboard-friendly version of our Venus838FLPx GPS module with GPS library SDK integrated into customized Arduino IDE.ARDUINO
COMPATIBLE
NavSpark is designed to run Wiring,
the same simple code as the Arduino platform. There is no need to learn any new
programming language or environment. Your standard Arduino sketches run on NavSpark.
TECHNICAL
SPECIFICATION:
GENERAL
SPECS
·  Support Arduino IDE (custom integration of Wiring
libraries, Windows & Linux)
· 
GPS on board
· 
Breadboard compatible
· 
38mm x 18mm size
HARDWARE
SPECS
· 
100MHz 32bit LEON3 Sparc-V8 + IEEE-754 Compliant FPU
· 
1024KB Flash Memory + 212KB RAM
· 
~80uA/MHz @ 3.3V
·  Powered and programmed by mini USB connector
·  1 full duplex asynchronous UART·  1 asynchronous UART transmit
· 
2 SPI with master/slave mode configurable
· 
1 I2C
· 
1 24bit PWM
· 
17 digital I/O pins (shared with above functional pins)
· 
Atomic clock synchronized P1PPS time reference with +/-10nsec
accuracyDESIGN FILE AVAILABILITYNavSpark hardware design files (schematic, board design, and bill of
materials) will be released and made available to users. Source code of the customized Arduino IDE will also be made available; the GPS / Beidou / GLONASS navigation kernel library integrated will remain in library file format. Users are free to extend, adapt and redistribute the hardware and software for any projects, commercial or non-commercial. POTENTIAL
APPLICATION EXAMPLE
Data Logger: Log the position,
velocity, time information to an external SPI Flash; later read out the
logged data to find out where it has been. With UAV, R/C plane, or paragliding,
you can replay the flight path. For marathon running or skiing sporting event, each
contestant’s performance behavior can be analyzed. It might also help answer question
of where the dog has gone during the day…
Outdoor GPS Clock: When gotten
position fix, the date and time is always accurate, in sync with the UTC or GMT
time. One never needs to manually adjust time once properly programmed, even when
turn on after power loss.
Time reference: After getting GPS
fix, the P1PPS 1Hz pulse is synchronized to atomic clock within +/-10nsec. Date
and time in the NMEA sentence corresponds to occurrence of the rising edge of
just occurred P1PPS pulse. Thus for under $20 you have a precision time
reference nearly as good as atomic clock to +/-10nsec! For hardware in
different locations that need to be time synchronized in operation, this provides
a low cost method to achieve it.
Below is a data logger back track
device using something equivalent to NavSpark without extra microcontroller.
Instead of Venus 822, previous generation 0.13um Venus621 chip is used inside;
it has 60MHz 32bit RISC, no FPU, 512KB Flash, 96KB RAM.
http://www.znex.de/http://wandermagazin.de/downloads/wander/88-93_Service_Praxistest_163.pdfAbove is a long term 3 ~ 6 months
test by a famous German hiker magazine. Competing against 3 big and expensive
GPS devices, Garmin Etrex 30, Magellan Explorist 610 and Falk Ibex 40.
Eventually Garmin Etrex 30 and Venus621-based miniHomer convinced jury and received test
seals; published in March/April 2012 edition.
NavSpark uses latest generation low power 55nm
Venus 822 chip; could design into more complex devices such as fitness GPS watch
like applications.
NavSpark provides accurate
position, velocity, and time for applications in need of this information. Even if used without GPS,
NavSpark’s 100MHz RISC/FPU + 1MByte Flash + 212Kbyte RAM + UART + SPI + I2C +
GPIO hardware has less restrictive use than a typical 8bit development board.DEVELOPMENT
TIMELINEHARDWARE
DEVELOPMENTS
NavSpark is a shrink down version of the bigger Venus 822 development board. With Venus 822 board already working, the design of NavSpark hardware is rather straight forward.
SOFTWARE
DEVELOPMENTS
We are currently customizing the Arduino
IDE to work with the Sparc-V8 compiler and Venus 822 hardware; it is expected to be finished before end
of January, 2014.
MANUFACTURING
If the NavSpark funding campaign is
successful, we will:
Place order for BOM to
manufacture NavSpark on Feb 7, 2014
Send BOM to factory for production, March 17, 2014
Ship out NavSpark, March 27, 2014PROJECT
HISTORY (Updated When New Application Developments Available)
The 55nm Venus 8 returned in May of 2013. It has been packaged into small 5mm x 5mm QFN40 package, with very limited I/O, for standard global navigation satellite positioning module applications. The 7mm x 7mm QF56 packaged Venus 822 has more I/O pins, suitable for small global navigation satellite positioning application development. The earlier model of Venus 822 development
board for internal use is much larger in size as shown below:For NavSpark, optimizing the circuitry and moving some components to the back-side, we reduce the size to 38mm x 18mm. Below is the 1st hand-made NavSpark prototype:
NavSpark prototype receiving GPS signal:NavSpark-GL prototype:NavSpark-GL prototype receiving GPS+GLONASS signal:NavSpark-BD prototype receiving GPS+Beidou signal:THANKS TO OUR SUPPORTERSThank you for taking time to find out what NavSpark is. We hope you're excited about NavSpark and will back our project for us to make it available for the maker community.PERKS5 major types:NavSpark: with GPS receiver, max 10Hz update rateNavSpark-GL: with GPS/GLONASS receiver, max 10Hz update rateNavSpark-BD: with GPS/Beidou receiver, max 10Hz update rateNS-RAW: carrier phase raw measurement GPS receiver, max 5Hz update rate, RTKLIB supported S1315F-RAW in the form of plug-and-play NavSparkNS-Sparc: NavSpark without GPS, for use as very low cost development boardUSD$15   Early Bird 1pcs Set (with Antenna)Choose this if you never used GPS in your project before and want to give it a try. You’ll receive 1 NavSpark and 1 active antenna* at early bird special price.USD$17   Early Bird 1pcs Beidou Set (with Antenna)**Choose this if you never used satellite navigation in your project before and want to give GPS/Beidou a try. You’ll receive 1 NavSpark-BD and 1 active antenna* at early bird special price.USD$17   Early Bird 1pcs GLONASS Set (with Antenna)**Choose this if you never used satellite navigation in your project before and want to give GPS/GLONASS a try. You’ll receive 1 NavSpark-GL and 1 active antenna* at early bird special price.USD$29   Early Bird 2pcs Set (with Antenna)Choose this if you feel the NavSpark processing power and memory capacity alone might come in handy and worth checking out. You’ll receive 2 NavSpark and 2 active antennas* at early bird special price.USD$33   Early Bird 2pcs Beidou Set (with Antenna)**Choose this if you feel the NavSpark processing power & memory capacity alone might come in handy and worth checking out, and like to try out with GPS/Beidou technology. You’ll receive 2 NavSpark-BD and 2 active antennas* at early bird special price.USD$33   Early Bird 2pcs GLONASS Set (with Antenna)**Choose this if you feel the NavSpark processing power & memory capacity alone might come in handy and worth checking out, and like to try out with GPS/GLONASS technology. You’ll receive 2 NavSpark-GL and 2 active antennas* at early bird special price.USD$35   Regular 2pcs Set (with Antenna)Choose this after Early Bird Sets are gone. You’ll receive 2 NavSpark and 2 active antenna* at Indiegogo promotional price.USD$39   Regular 2pcs Beidou Set (with Antenna)**Choose this after Early Bird Beidou Sets are gone. You’ll receive 2 NavSpark-BD and 2 active antenna* at Indiegogo promotional price.USD$39   Regular 2pcs GLONASS Set (with Antenna)**Choose this after Early Bird GLONASS Sets are gone. You’ll receive 2 NavSpark-GL and 2 active antenna* at Indiegogo promotional price.USD$50   NS-RAW 2pcs Set (with Antenna)Due to numerous requests asking availability of carrier phase raw measurement output capability, we decided to add an additional perk, NS-RAW, a 5Hz capable S1315F-RAW (RTKLIB compatible) carrier phase raw measurement GPS receiver module with USB interface in the same form factor as NavSpark. (FedEx Shipping included, no Antenna)

resources without using GPS/GNSS. The NS-Sparc is our answer. You’ll receive 21 NS-Sparc

story:
About Make Fashion

The Make Fashion initiative is a collaboration of great minds who want to explore and demonstrate the convergence fashion and technology.

Creativity and innovation are our guiding principles. We are inspired by wearable technology as both function and fashion: from awe-inspiring responsive runway dresses to practical medical and scientific wearables.

Our runway gala in Calgary, Alberta is our largest annual event, where we pair fashion designers and artists with engineers and tech enthusiasts. The combination of skills and ideas creates stunning results and groundbreaking fusions of light, fashion and performance. See for yourself with the summary of our sold-out 2013 gala here.

The 2014 Gala

We are currently fundraising for our 2014 gala. We are aiming to be even bigger and better in our upcoming year. The gala is scheduled for March 1st.

Our 2014 gala has a lineup of eleven artists including internationally renowned artists Erina Kashihara and Dr. Patricia Flanagan. See our lineup of 2014 artists here.

Your funds will help pay for our artists' time, materials, and to bring in international artists for the event.

The Impact

Your contribution will help:

  • Pay our talented designers and tech enthusiasts for eleven 80+ hour projects.
  • Research innovation in wearable electronics.
  • Gain recognition for Calgary, Alberta as an international leader in the wearable electronics space.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute financially we are also looking for support in the areas of:

  • Promotion of our event, fundraiser, and indiegogo campaign.
  • In-kind sponsorship of materials, event support, and and silent auction items.
  • Volunteering for the make fashion gala and fundraising events.

Learn more about makefashion at makefashion.ca

story:
Our story:

After a successful career in the beauty industry, I began daydreaming of what’s to come. My passion to create and design beautiful jewelry took over piece by piece, and Vi Mondi was born.

Disenchanted with the quality of jewelry I had collected during the years, coupled by the desire to make women feel amazing, I vowed to make fashion forward pieces using only the best materials and craftsmanship.  Each collection is hand made, durable, tarnish resistant, scratch resistant, and non irritating. With family being most important, each piece is a namesake and dedicated to a special family member in my life.  

Furthermore, giving back is also near and dear to me. Therefore 10% of all proceeds from each piece sold will benefit the With Hope Foundation, a non-profit who is dedicated to suicide prevention through improving mental health support services and education in our schools and throughout our community.

I hope you appreciate my vision, and thank you for making my dream come true.

The Collection:

Layered:

1.)Krystal; 24",30" 2.)Berna; 18",20",24"  3.)Tete; 18",20",24" 4.)Jasmine 18",20",24" 5.)Amanda; 18",20",24",30"

Pendants:

1.)Leeshie; 24",30"  2.) Mary; 24" ,30”  3.) Raquel; 24",30” 

4.) Desta; 30",36” 5.) Kitty 24", 30"

Stone Wrapped Pendants:


1.)Audrey; 30”, 36" 2.)Andy; 30", 36"

Benefits of Vi Mondi Jewelry:

Vi Mondi uses only the highest quality products to create a beautiful and unique piece of jewelry that will last a lifetime. Each piece uses 14k gold fill chains and findings. We use Swarovski crystal beads, and quality stones and rocks. As well, you are guaranteed that each piece is made in the USA, and is made to order.

  • Durable

  • Tarnish Resistant

  • Scratch Resistant

  • Made In USA

  • Non-Irritating
Giving back: Vi Mondi donates a portion of each item sold to Non-Profit Organizations that help at risk youth. 

Our Process:

Step 1: We take our time and are exceptionally attentive to detail in creating each beautiful handmade piece.

Step 2: Once a piece has been completed, it is then displayed to ensure the highest of quality and unique design.  A flawless piece. 

Step 3: After completion and thorough inspection, we then hand wrap your fine jewelry in our beautiful packaging and ship directly to you.

Step 4: Once received,  it is yours to adorn to make any outfit feel as unique and special, as the woman wearing it.

Why Indiegogo?

By raising funds on Indiegogo it will help us meet our next steps for the business. Those steps involve purchasing materials for the jewelry pieces, building capital for this venture, and broadening my expertise in order to expand our jewelry line to include bracelets and rings.

Rewards Choosing:

Following the conclusion of the Indiegogo Campaign we will be sending a survey to verify which necklace you would like to receive, shipping, and other item specific details.

story:
We love the particular…

We love real leather…

We love “the way we used to do things”…

We love Italian craftsmanship…

These four points led us to create goods for the present with an eye to the past. We want to create products that give feelings, we leave to others the cold synthetic, it’s not our world, we want the charm of nature, we want to catch your eyes.

We are Wolecraft... all our goods are designed around the world and handmade in Italy...

Our products are fulfilled of what we call S.A.M. factor: they must be Stylish, Affordable and Modular.

And here below our latest product:

The most organized way to carry.

Byron is a customizable carryall designed to satisfy the needs of a diverse range of lifestyles and professions thanks to magnetic spines that accommodate modular Inserts. Byron includes the Insert of your choice, designed for unique storage needs. The interior of the Byron includes organization for tablet, phone, pens, glasses, cards, cash, notebook, small items, open compartments, and cords.

Clean and minimal lines. The finest materials. The best craftsmanship.

The right price without any intermediate passage.

From us to you.

This is what we believe in.

Our Leather

We use only full grain vegetable tanned leather it's the most expensive leather as it is made from the top layer of the cow hide. It does not have a synthetic leather coating (as usual in cheaper leathers). It retains all of the texture of the original hide and is therefore flexible and more durable.

This also means that each piece of leather is unique as unique will be every our single product we'll deliver to you.

Vegetable tanning is an artisan tradition and deeply rooted for generations from our tuscan leather tannery. Our leathers come exclusively from a tannery that belongs to "The Genuine Italian Vegetable-Tanned Leather Consortium" founded in 1994 by eleven Tuscan tanneries.

Through this consortium we can give you the best vegetable tanned leather.

Nearly forty days are actually needed to transform raw hides into unique vegetable-tanned leathers. All the cowhides we use are a by-product of the food industry. Vegetable-tanned leather absorbs the traces of our living, it matures, gets softer and darker depending on your lifestyle and how you use your product. The natural ageing does not compromise its resistance and gives it a vintage look with warm colour shades showing evidence of being a natural product.

We love it and we think you will too.

Our Wool Felt

We source the different types of wool we use in our products from all over Europe.

100% wool, whether it's woven or felt.

It gives protection with a soft touch.

There are two different Inserts you can choose.

The Travel Insert and the Everyday Insert.

Every Insert can be used separately from the main body. Take off your insert, fold it and fix it with the elastic band on the side. In 10 seconds you have a smaller carryall at your service.

Everyday Insert

  • Measures: 22 cm H x 17 cm W | 8,66" H x 6,69" W
  • Made in vegetable tanned leather and 100% wool felt
  • 3 magnetic snaps allow to change the Insert easily and fast, they are 100% safe with your electronic devices and will have zero negative affects on your gear
  • Large pouch with YKK Excella zip closure
  • Elastic band that allows the Insert to be used separately from the Byron
  • Multiuse leather strip with metal snap
  • Small pouch for your passport, cards, cash or notes
  • Interchangeable between the Byron and the Byron Pro



Travel Insert

  • Measures: 22 cm H x 17 cm W | 8,66" H x 6,69" W
  • Made in vegetable tanned leather and 100% wool felt
  • 3 magnetic snaps allow to change the Insert easily and fast, they are 100% safe with your electronic devices and will have zero negative affects on your gear
  • Elastic band that allows the Insert to be used separately from the Byron
  • Large pouch with YKK Excella zip closure
  • Diagonal cut with seams that transform the right side of the Insert in a big pouch useful to store all the small intems you need during a trip
  • Interchangeable between the Byron and the Byron Pro


Byron with Travel Insert or Everyday Insert

Classic (light brown) / Cigar (dark brown) / River (petrol)

  • Early Bird Byron with Everyday Insert or Travel Insert: 162$. Save 130$ (future retail price 292$).
  • Kickstarter special price Byron with Everyday Insert or Travel Insert: 175$. Save 117$ (future retail price 292$).

Competitors price: more than 300$...

  • Measures: 28,5 cm H x 21,5 cm W | 11,22" H x 8,5" W
  • Unique Italian vegetable tanned leather
  • 100% wool felt lining
  • YKK Excella zip closure
  • 3 magnets to fix Travel or Everyday Insert
  • Pouch for the phone
  • 3 slots for cards
  • Straps with metal snaps for cords, earphones, etc.
  • Distinctive handmade stitch under the logo
  • Can fit: Apple iPad Air 2, Apple iPad Pro 9,7", Apple iPad Mini, Amazon Fire, Kindle E-Reader, Nexus 9, Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 & 10.5 etc…




Byron Pro with Travel Insert or Everyday Insert

Classic (light brown) / Cigar (dark brown) / River (petrol)

  • Early Bird Byron Pro with Everyday Insert or Travel Insert: 190$. Save 151$ (future retail price 341$).
  • Kickstarter special price Byron with Everyday Insert or Travel Insert: 205$. Save 136$ (future retail price 341$).

Competitors price: more than 370$...

  • Measures: 34 cm H x 25 cm W | 13,38" H x 9,85" W
  • Premium Italian vegetable tanned leather
  • 100% wool felt lining
  • YKK Excella zip closure
  • 3 magnets to fix Travel or Everyday Insert
  • Pouch for phone
  • 6 solts for cards
  • Straps with metal snaps for cords, earphones, etc.
  • Distinctive handmade stitch under the logo
  • Can fit: iPad Pro 12,9", MacBook, MacBook Air 11", Surface 3, Asus Transformer, HP Stream 11, Lenovo Mix 2, Acer Aspire Switch, etc.


THANK YOU!!

We already produce leather goods as you can check in our website.
Now we are on Kickstarter with our latest product.
The only possibility to maintain affordable prices with high quality standards is to enter in a scale economy. It would be impossible without reaching the minimum amount of the campaign.
This is a warranty for us and all of you.

story:
UNCHAINED is a non-profit organization that uses fashion to tell the story of a human trafficking survivor, by combining symbolic garments and empowering narration.

A team of 30 passionate students and teachers are working hard to bring this fashion show to the New Albany High School Students in late April.

Due to the cost of the show, we need your help!

Any donations would be greatly appreciated.

The community event will be held on Monday, April 21st at 7:30 pm in the McCoy Performing Arts Center

Please make separate donations if more than one ticket is desired- the name will be on will call at the event.

Donations of $75 or more will receive a free community event ticket and recognition in the program.

Donations of $45 will receive an adult ticket

Donations of $25 will receive a student or senior ticket

Tax ID Number: 20-3752969

Thank You For Your Donation!

www.unchainedfashionshow.com

story:
Hello! I see you've got excellent tastes in Tee-Shirts. I, too, am a connoisseur of fine chest coverings. 

My name is Tony Mays. I run a little Tee-Shirt company called TEEvil Genius. After 4 years of making someone else rich (CafePress,) I'm ready to branch out. I want to outfit the entire world with awesome nerdy / pop culture Tee-Shirts at a reasonable price. 

Nowadays it's hard to find high quality shirts with equally high quality designs for a reasonable price. While there are many incredible artists and designers out in the wild, most charge waaaaay too much. $24+? That's just ridiculous. I want to see people embracing their geekery without spending an arm and a leg. And that's where you come in, amazing, beautiful and wonderful potential investor! Together we can change the world! Onward to victory!




I recently ran a Kickstarter campaign, and while the outpouring of support was amazing, we didn't reach the goal, and no one got their shirts. This is where Indiegogo comes in! Whether the campaign is fully funded or not, you wonderful people will still get your sweet shirts! If you backed the Kickstarter, feel free to pledge again! I assure you, you will get your product this time!

Every penny raised will go towards moving TEEvil Genius away from Print On Demand services. What does this mean for my customers? Cheaper shirts, faster printing, and faster shipping! It's win-win for everybody! This also allows me to personally handle each and every order, and maybe even throw in some sweet extras. Who doesn't like sweet extras?!

Any extra funding I receive through Indiegogo will result in extra rewards, lower reward costs and funding my money-powered solar death ray. 

So please, if you enjoy nerdy things, like Tee Shirts, previously backed the Kickstarter, or just want to help your fellow man, think about sharing, commenting, or pledging! Every little bit helps! Thanks!

story:
Hello,

My name is Denise, aka as Dee. I am the owner of a very small company named Designer phans By Dee Inc. I started this company a few years after I lost my Mother unexpectedly in November 2002. I started designing these fans as an inspiration from A higher power. This was my therapy to help me through the most darkest days of my life. It has taken me this long to really launch my business as I desire to in memory of my beloved mother.

Our patented lace and hand-held fans are handcrafted by trained individuals using the highest quality of lace and other designer materials such as sequins, ribbon, pearls, crystals and other unique applique that differentiate them from any other phan in the market place. We specialize in memorial, wedding, home decor, Valentine's Day, Christmas and other holidays which are designed with our lace fans.

 We have a phan for everyone, and every occasion imaginable, which include women, men and children's phans. We know that our phans will supply your every need. Our target audiences are Churches, Social groups, causes such as Breast Cancer Awareness, Diabetes, Sororities, schools and businesses in which we will use their logos and emblems to identify who they are. Our phans will make wonderful fundraisers for those who desire to increase their budgets. We also plan to donate a percentage to causes such as Breast Cancer Awareness, Aids Foundation and others.


We need $15,000 dollars to launch our business. These funds will go toward advertising, paying  individuals who work with us, supplies and also Davidson Invention who is working with us to mass produce our fans and get them out in the market place. We do not have any other funding sources and if we do not meet our goals we will use the monies that we do have to pursue our dreams. We will not give up until we make this happen. We will give away free gift cards as a way to drive traffic to our website, offer  discounts and wholesale prices to companies that wish to purchase our products in bulk.


You can also help us by getting the word out by getting the word out about our phans, a little tweet here, a little tweet there, a little tweet everywhere, to your family friends, businesses, churches and whoever else you feel could use our product.

Sincerely,

Denise Lott-Wilks/Founder-Ceo

story:
Short Summary

Tori Famuyiwa possesses an undeniable passion for fashion, art and design. This trait is derived from his natural sense of beauty and the ability to apply his art form to any canvas. This zest drove him to create Toriola. Some of his fusion couture designs have been featured in Blomingdale's, Africa Fashion Week, Essence Magazine, Munaluchi Bridal Magazine and other choice fashion publications. The results of his creations are exemplified by a smart combination of Afro-chic style and contemporary elegance.

Toriola is a fresh, sophisticated and edgy fashion brand inspired by cultural influences around the world – Africa, in particular. By the blending of cultural notes such as beading, stoning and vibrant colors and fabrics, the Toriola story is woven through these varied mediums. This story is one of simplicity, cohesiveness and sophistication; a brand identified by complexity and style – created through the psychology of fashion. Those who adorn Toriola are young at heart and self confident. They are well read, world travelers, independent and have a unique and individual sense of style with a small edge of understated rebellion. This is the essence of Toriola.

This campaign will allow Toriola to expand our merchandise and create a presence in small stores and boutiques. This will take our company to a new level and create exposure that we've never been able to achieve on our own.

What We Need & What You Get

Our campaign has a financial goal of $15,000. What will that get us? Quite a bit! Toriola will be able to:

  • Purchase fabrics – we use vibrant, unique fabrics that express the psychology of Toriola's signature couture collections. Check them out on our website.
  • Develop professional patterns and initial samples of Toriola's various collections – this will be used for initial production. Up to this point Tori has been making all Toriola merchandise by hand. That's right, by hand! Let's save his fingers and help move Toriola into the production stage.
  • Enter into small scale production – Toriola is targeting an expansion that will allow our merchandise to be made available in select small stores and boutiques. Production costs are high and we need your help to create availability for the masses – people just like you.
  • Participate in fashion and trade shows – a signature of any clothing brand, fashion and trade show participation is key to achieve broad brand exposure. We intend to showcase our current and future collections in targeted shows to increase the buying potential of small stores and boutiques.
  • Create editorials and look books – we need to produce numerous, high quality editorials and look books in order to pitch Toriola to stores and boutiques.

What are we offering you in return for helping us? You'll love this: We're giving you some direct interaction with Tori and some custom Toriola clothing, depending on your contribution. See our perks for details!

Oh, and even if we don't reach our goal, we'll put all funds raised toward the aforementioned goals. Your funding is going to make a huge impact on Toriola and our success! Become a part of our brand!

The Impact

Your contribution will help get Toriola out into the world and hopefully make an impact on the fashion industry. Being a one-man show is extremely difficult, particularly when your goal is to expand beyond your means. Doing all of the cutting, patterns and sewing to make the clothing, then doing all of the styling, model casting and developing of fashion shows is daunting for one person – this just isn't sustainable to achieve fashion success. We want Toriola to get noticed, not just in the press, but to be worn by the masses – by you. It isn't often that homegrown brands garner the attention they deserve. We want Toriola's edginess, sophistication and Afrocentricity to take the fashion world by storm! And to think, this could be done with your help! 

We've never done a crowdfunding campaign before, but we truly understand the value of people like you. Join us on this journey and track our progress either here or follow Toriola on our website and social media sites. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you absolutely cannot donate funds, please do us a favor and help us in another way by sharing this campaign with your family and friends. Indiegogo share tools make it incredibly easy!

Thank you so much for helping this designer's dream come true! Now, let's do this!

story:
our product

Meet the next generation of wearable computing device, meet NECKST. 

Neckst is a smart necklace that is well designed and easy to use. The idea was born, out of understanding that the SmartPhones as a big part of every day life. We have developed our prototype to work with android devices,and it will only get better.

Our product can be worn on your shirt, fitted to your car, and much more, just take a look in our gallery.

Honestly, it could save lives:

We designed Neckst to suit everyone, in whatever form.


Have you heard about our unique app?

How can it work in whichever language you choose, you ask?

The default language is English. 
Currently, the app is available to Android users. We exploring the option to connect to IOS users as well.

Neckst can do variety of things: 


And you better know that:


Why you? and why INDIEGOGO?

We have overcome many difficulties, we have changed the product many times, and finally we managed to get to the "Raising Money" step, so that the product could be improved, we need your help. If you want to donate and get this product: Awesome. else, you can always share this campaign. 

AND THE RESULT: 



Next Steps: 


As you can see, quite a bit of work left, but do not worry!  We'll have the rest dealt with quickly and seriously, ready to start the Neckst revolution. 

Meet the team

Android develops, software/electronics engineers, product designers, graphic designers  and great people with a vision.
contact mail: 
support@neckst.org
story_txt:
our product 
Meet the next generation of wearable
computing device, meet NECKST. 
Neckst is a smart necklace that is
well designed and easy to use. The idea was born, out of understanding that the SmartPhones as a big part of every day life. We have developed our prototype to work with android devices,and it will only get better.

Our product can be worn on your shirt, fitted to your car, and much more, just take a look in our gallery.
Honestly, it could save lives:



We designed Neckst to suit everyone, in whatever form.


   Have you heard about our unique app?
How can it work in whichever language you choose, you ask?


The default language is English. 
Currently, the app is available to Android users. We exploring the option to connect to IOS users as well.



Neckst can do variety of things: 




    And you better know that:



 
Why you? and why INDIEGOGO?
We have overcome many difficulties, we have changed the product many times, and finally we managed to get to the "Raising Money" step, so that the product could be improved, we need your help. If you want to donate and get this product: Awesome. else, you can always share this campaign. 



AND THE RESULT: 





    Next Steps: 



  As you can see, quite a bit of work left, but do not worry!  We'll have the rest dealt with quickly and seriously, ready to start the Neckst revolution. 
Meet the team

Android develops, software/electronics engineers, product designers, graphic designers  and great people with a vision.

story:
This time we develop a high technique tourbillon watch, the movement with fine polishing and offering an affordable price for everyone. It is not a dream ! 

If you choose the option of name engraving, please leave your requested words and send e-mail to tourbizolla@gmail.com

For all watch seekers, they own different categories of the mechanical watches. When looking for or targeting more high grading timepieces, they are the mechanical tourbillons. The basic starter prices of the Swiss tourbillon ask for USD38,000, for more high end level easier to go to USD130,000, some are unbelievable expensive to millions. Shocking ! 

The professional persons such as doctor, lawyer, etc and the millionaires love to own, sometimes to wear tourbillon watches, simple to say, they are charming, really eyes catching. Love it! But hate myself I am not the team of professionals and the millionaires.

Why our tourbillon watch could be sold in that affordable price, not because of the low costs of movement, low costs of the cases and other watch parts, the facts are explained belows.

If we send our watch to the street shop for selling, the price will be extremely high because of the above calculation, therefore our price shown in Kickstarter will never been seen in the street shops. Clear !

A tourbillon is an addition to the mechanics of a watch escapement. Developed around 1795 and patented by the French-Swiss watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet on June 26, 1801, a tourbillon aims to counter the effects of gravity by mounting the escapement and balance wheel in a rotating cage, to negate the effect of gravity when the timepiece (thus the escapement) is stuck in a certain position. By continuously rotating the entire balance wheel/escapement assembly at a slow rate (typically about one revolution per minute), the tourbillon averages out positional errors.

Originally an attempt to improve accuracy, tourbillons are still included in some expensive modern watches as a novelty and demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity. The mechanism is usually exposed on the watch's face to show it off.

What will be the shock of buying at USD891 ?

Your lovers/parents or your best friends receiving a gift from you, open it, first page on the eyes a piano wooden box as picture, keeping open it, a wonderful watch, looking close, what a real moving tourbillon watch, oh,oh, big surprise ! To put the watch onto the hand to see how it look like! What? my name on the body of the watch. Can't believe it ! Really can't believe it!

Can image 2 small tears would be fallen down onto the face very soon.

Surprise!

Genuine Crocodile Leather

As the tourbillon watch is vaulable, the basic genuine  leather is not a choice, instead with genuine crocodile leather strap, our watch will be looking bright and awesome. They are absolutely perfect matching!

Our watches have a warranty for a period of 3 years from the date of purchase. This warranty covers manufacturing defects related to the movement.

Shipping is free of charge worldwide as thank you from us and All watch is sent by FedEx

Why we use FedEx

As the tourbillon watch is valuable, we'll appoint FedEx to arrange the shipments, to ensure all backers living in different countries to receive the watches in a short period of time. From the tracking numbers, all backers could check the parcels status and make sure the watches are in good condition when they'll sign the documents delivered by the crew of FedEx.

P.S.

The S.F. express will be used for local delivery.

http://jc-watches.com

https://www.facebook.com/JC-watchescom-495945534268504/?ref=bookmarks

 

Risks and challenges

We have already found and worker with very reputable watch factory,
the communication with factory had been smooth and fast
to ensure that every watch is created to standard and delivered in time,
we will be maintaining constant contact with the factory during the entire
process of production.

story:
Rhium is a unique line of performance clothing eager to boost your athleticism by bringing you high quality threads. Our brand was created with the purpose of providing you with well-fitted apparel, versatile for both performance and causal wear. We not only aim to bring you the best athletic clothing, but also aspire to help people prosper as athletes. 


In an over-saturated market, we understand there are many brands that focus on athletic apparel, but what they lack, is the unique purpose of our brand. Our commitment to quality and attention to detail in our products is only the beginning. 

We not only want to be an inspiration for the athletes of this generation, but those of the next. It's never too late to start the journey, set the standard, and lead the way. 


Introducing our Bold Rhium Snapback! 

-Green Underbill -8 Rows Stitches -Quality Firm Flat Bill Hat -MORE TO COME!!!

                                      

-T-SHIRTS-

Our T-Shirts are made out of fabric containing, polyester, cotton, and spandex, to provide a blend that will feel and look great!  We have teamed up with skilled manufacturers to bring you apparel, primarily focused on:

Fit - Fitted to provide an adequate length for all ranges of motion. 

Fabric - Latest in performance fabrics that are breathable, and moisture-controlled. 

Color - Keeps the life of its color, even throughout washes.

Performance - Durable for training, as well as for everyday wear.


     


We plan to produce these threads locally so that we can closely oversee each process, in addition to supporting other local businesses. However, in order to make that happen, our goal is to raise at least $5,000 to cover manufacturing expenses. These expenses include things like:

  • fabric
  • pattern making
  • cut and sew
  • and printing.

We're looking for your help to launch our first array of clothing. Anything above our goal will go towards building and expanding our brand, including a women's line.

                

Every contribution will bring us one step closer into full-production. We appreciate every contribution!


We expect hurdles along the way, but we believe they will be limited as we reach our pledged goal.


If you'd like to support Rhium in more ways than a donation, help us spread the word! Share our campaign with your family and friends through word-of-mouth and social media.

DREAM BIG. GROW STRONG. GO FOR GOLD

story:
ATA in the News:

HPD officer launches tactical clothing line

Waiting list growing for 'tactical chic' pants

Clothes made to conceal handguns
 
Houston police officer launches 'tactical clothing' line
 
New pants let you hide a gun in style

ATA VIDEOS:

 

 

Details and Features:


Color Options

Battle Denim Pants

Battle Khaki Shorts

Available Sizes

Waist:  28, 30, 32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 42, 44, 46, 48

Length:  30, 32, 34, 36

 

Underguard™ Weapon Holster

 


 

Underguard™ Accessory Holster

 

Our Story

American Tactical Apparel is committed to leading the covert carry industry through innovation, design, quality and patriotism. There is NO BETTER WAY to secretly carry your pistol and equipment. These pants are engineered for battle and for everyday operating. American Tactical Apparel is designed for warriors, by warriors. We build high-quality tactical pants that are tough as nails and 100% made in the USA!

If lowest price is your biggest motivator, than please look elsewhere... at American Tactical Apparel you WILL NOT find cheaply made pants manufactured in a sweat shop in some foreign country.

American warriors, fighting and dying in Chinese-made pants... that’s a load of crap!

We believe that America did not become the greatest nation on Earth by selling out to other countries. Sure, it costs us more, but we will not sell out. If you want a great pair of pants made right here in the USA, it's going to cost you more money, but you get a carry system that gives you comfort, concealment and access like never before. American Tactical Apparel is more than a great pair of pants... it's a great system of covert carry never before available! We've got you covered, order yours today!

 

 

1.     We Hire Wounded Veterans

American Tactical Apparel will hire wounded Veterans to help in the manufacturing and administration of our business. We believe in having warriors make products for other warriors….in America. It's a beautiful concept!

2.     100% American Made

We need to get Americans working again! We need to make products in this Country! We need our American warriors to wear pants made in America, not China!  American Tactical Appeal uses American made material created by only American labor located in Texas.

 

Your Contribution

With your help American Tactical Apparel will be able to quickly expand to a larger manufacturing facility, increasing our production to the current demand levels. Our production will increase and we will hire more Americans and continue to grow.

Your Perk

We want to reward you a with a “Live Strong” autographed poster by Brian Hoffner and 20% off American Tactical Apparel products forever.

 

 Seen here, Battle Khaki Pants with Underguard Weapon Holster, Underguard Accessory Holster and the Brown Premium Cowhide Belt, all part of the American Tactical Apparel Covert Carry System

While some rewards are instantaneous, others will take time, and vary by contribution. We will mail our products to recipients who contribute $10, $25, $50, $75, $200, $300, or $500 by November. If your name is featured in a PRNewswire press release, note that we'll send it after we reach our goal in August. Please contact us directly if you want to contribute at any level more than $2,000.

Goal Breakdown

Here's what $570,000 looks like for our small business.

Updated Manufacturing Facility Equipment ($250,000)

  • Sewing machines            $35,000
  • Pocket Machines             $65,000
  • Belt Loop Machines        $65,000
  • Blotter                          $55,000
  • Button Hole Machines    $30,000

Product Order    ($150,000.00)

  • 500 Battle Khaki Pants
  • 500 Battle Denim Jeans
  • 500 Battle Khaki Shorts

Indiegogo Cut @ 9% ($45,000)

Taxes @ 25% ($125, 000)*

Total ($570,000.00)

Why We Are American Made!

Currently, we have American warriors fighting and dying in Chinese made pants! We find serious issues with that concept.  The US economy is in serious turmoil and unemployment is at record highs with no relief in sight. So, American Tactical Apparel is manufacturing in America using 100% American made materials in the US.  American Tactical Apparel is hiring Americans and helping to build back the American economy one pair of pants at a time. Join us in this simple, yet novel concept.

                                            LIVE STRONG POSTER

Who We Are

We are Americans that want to see quality products manufactured in the US again. We are Military Veterans with 30 years of service in law enforcement. We are hiring wounded warriors first in all job openings.

 

Share Our Story

Low on cash because your job was sent “off shore”? That's okay! You can help us by sharing our story with all of your friends. Let’s get manufacturing in America again ASAP!

  • Tweet Us @ATA_Apparel
  • Facebook us at https://www.facebook.com/AmericanTacticalApparel
  • Check out our web site http://www.americantacticalapparel.com

We find serious issues with that concept.  The US economy is in serious turmoil and unemployment is at record highs with no relief in sight. So, American Tactical Apparel is manufacturing in America using 100% American made materials in the US.  American Tactical Apparel is hiring Americans and helping to build back the American economy one pair of pants at a time. Join us in this simple, yet novel concept.

                                            LIVE STRONG POSTER

Who We Are
We are Americans that want to see quality products manufactured in the US again. We are Military Veterans with 30 years of service in law enforcement. We are hiring wounded warriors first in all job openings.

Tweet Us @ATA_Apparel

Facebook us at https://www.facebook.com/AmericanTacticalApparel

Check out our web site http://www.americantacticalapparel.com

story:
Short Summary

Hello everyone,

My name is Sheila Denanyoh and I am the designer/ founder behind the up and coming label, ILL-LA-LA DESIGNS.  ILL-LA-LA DESIGNS was recently selected to participate in the highly acclaimed Africa Fashion Week New York this summer (2012) and in order to participate we need your help to raise $2,100. I recently graduated from college last Decemer and due to the major finanancing that comes with creating a collection (our fall collection), we could use all the financial help we can get to participate in this show.

I am originally from Ghana but reside in Ohio. I discovered my love for fashion designing at a young age while living with my grandaunt and aunt who were both seamstresses, but took initiative to turn what was simply a hobby to a venture when I was 18. My fascination with color is always made apparent in my designs as I believe it is important to feel alive in the clothes one wears. As part of feeling alive I want my passion to be purposeful, bringing joy to not only myself but to others. Through my love for designing I have given back to my community via the Looks for Books project and continue to make decisions that impact the continent of Africa and my native land positively.  As a graduate from the Kent State University with degrees in International Relations and African Studies, I continue to use life experiences and lessons as a model for growth and success.

Being in Africa Fashion Week New York will give the label an awesome platform for increased growth. Please help take the dream even further.


The Impact

ILL-LA-LA DESIGNS is an ethical clothing line seeking to make a difference through the Looks for Books project (an educational project), and supporting local artisans in and outside Africa. Therefore helping us not only ends with our well being but the well being of many others that will benefit from our socially resposible way of thinking. (Check out our website for details on our project).

 

What We Need & What You Get

For this campaign the goal is to raise $2,100. $1540 would go toward the event charges and the remaining $560 would go toward travel and living expences to and while in New York for the week. 

So please donate; every contribution is appreciated and we hope that what we can give in return is reward enough.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help us spread the word by forwarding this link to friends or family that would be interested in contributing to this cause.

Do check out our website for more about us: http://www.illlaladesigns.com

Thank you :)

story:
Hey there. I'm Kate and I've been running Missfit Clothing for around 3 years now. I started creating my own clothing line at the age of 14, after teaching myself the basics of sewing, as a way of earning some extra pocket money.

Fast forward 8 years, and Missfit Clothing was born. It stayed as a side project, running along side my full time job until 6 months ago, when I took a giant leap, quit my job and began working for myself full time. We only live once, and I now LOVE what I do.

Missfit has been growing steadily since it began, but all the profits that I make get put into living costs and back into supplies that I need. This is where your contributions come into play!

The money that is raised here will put towards expanding my range to include more accessories, a new jewellery range and also towards getting the website developed to a professional level, cause in all honesty, I'm useless when it comes to web design! However, the main bulk will put into stocking the supplies I need in order to make waiting times a lot less as currently I need to buy the fabric needed as the order is placed. I would love to be able to get orders made and shipped in a couple of days, and this funding will massivly help that process.

If my target isn't reached, all money will be refunded back to you :)

Take a look at my perks for your donations! Lots of goodies to be had!

If you're unable to make a donation, not to worry! You can always get the word out about the campaign by using the share tools, or by checking out my facebook page and getting the word out: www.facebook.com/missfitclothingco

Thankyou for showing an interest in Missfit Clothing!

Kate x

story:
The Original Good Wallet Co.
Designers/creators of awesome looking slim wallets. We are on a mission to support 'good' causes around the World!

 

Key Features:

  • High quality elastics

  • Genuine leather pocket

  • Fits 1-10 cards comfortably

  • Slim design for back or front pocket

  • Skateistan receives $5 from each wallet

 

You get to choose from 12 custom elastic color ways


 

 

We added a leather pocket on the back for holding any cash you may want to carry

 

OUR MISSION

We want to do our part to support deserving organizations and charities around the World and that is why we are donating $5 from every Good Wallet sold. Skateistan is our 'good' organization for the Month of May and we plan to continuing to work with them far into the future.

They are an incredible international organization working with children and youth in Afghanistan, Cambodia and Pakistan. They are using skateboarding as a tool to provide educational programming and an opportunity for change. With your help, we will be able to fund this project and raise at least $5,000 for Skateistan

 

THE FUTURE

We want to set up The Origninal Good Wallet Co for future success. Your contributions will allow us to purchase future materials so we can continue making these wallets with new custom designs and patterns. We also want to keep working directly with Skateistan and other "good" organizations that need our support

 

THANK YOU!

For taking the time to be part of the GOOD Wallet Story! Contact us outside of this campaign through our website thegoodwallet.com Follow us on instagram and twitter at the handle: @goodwallets

 

 

FAQ

How do I choose my elastic/leather colorways?

A: we are sending out email survey to determine how each of you want to customize your very own "good" wallet. You should see the survey within 3 business days.

How will you keep backers up to date?

A: We plan on keeping you guys informed on what we are doing in regards to production and designing now and once the campaign is over. If you have any questions feel free to add to the comment section or email us at info@thegoodwallet.com  

How much is shipping?

If you live in the USA or Canada shipping is completely free with purchase of any "perk". All other Countries please add $5 onto your contribution at checkout for International shipping.

When will I recieve my good wallet?

A: We are just as excited to make these wallets as you are to recieve them. We have organized all materials, suppliers and manufacturers to get the job done with quality and speed. You WILL recieve your wallet by June 30th, 2013. ***Home Run perk will be shipped prior to July 31st.
story_txt:
The Original Good Wallet Co.Designers/creators of awesome looking slim wallets. We are on a mission to support 'good' causes around the World!

 
Key Features:


High quality elastics


Genuine leather pocket


Fits 1-10 cards comfortably


Slim design for back or front pocket


Skateistan receives $5 from each wallet



 
You get to choose from 12 custom elastic color ways

 
 
We added a leather pocket on the back for holding any cash you may want to carry

story:
ABOUT ISABEL SK!

My name is Isabel Simpson-Kirsch and I began designing clothes in the fourth grade. My dream was always to go to Parsons School of Design in New York City and pursue my passion for designing and making clothing. After winning a CFDA/Teen Vogue scholarship in high school, I began my studies at Parsons. In May 2013, my senior thesis collection at Parsons took off! I was featured in the Parsons Senior Show and my collection was purchased by the wave making downtown SoHo store VFILES. Since then I've been designing new collections, releasing my second collection at Nashville Fashion Week, and collaborating with artists and establishments around Nashville. 

Indiegogo is the next phase of ISABEL SK. With secured overhead funding, we will continue creating, growing and supporting our community!

      

                                 

  • The person wearing ISABEL SK clothing is looking for something new while appreciating traditional sportswear silhouettes. These clothes are edgy and new because of their subject matter, yet endlessly wearable because of their simple, yet interesting construction.

  • After years of working as an artist and in the fashion industry, I have developed a distinct aesthetic. My love for designing fresh, graphic prints sets my collections apart and makes them exciting. Signature aspects of my clothing are original photorealistic digital fabric prints and basic activewear silhouettes done in sportswear fabrics. I design wearable clothes that make a bold statement while retaining their creativity and beauty.  

           

THE GREATER MISSION

A major part of the mission at ISABEL SK is encouraging artists and designers in our community to collaborate and create. Supporting ISABEL SK is not just supporting an individual brand, it is enabling us to move forward with our goal to bring Nashville creatives together with a space made up of studios, galleries, performance space and community classes. Sharing our craft and passion with others is a driving force at ISABEL SK; we want to be able to give back as much as we are given.

                                 

Clothes by ISABEL SK photo by Brett Warren for Native Magazine.

WHY YOU?

  • Your funding is crucial to our growth and sustainability!

  • When we reach our goal we’ll purchase materials and cover production costs for the upcoming new collection.

  • 75% of ISABEL SK collections are handmade on machines in the ISABEL SK studio with custom created and printed fabrics.

  • Our immediate goals are to purchase new machines and finish the next ISABEL SK collection. New resources are critical to the growth and success of the brand. We need new equipment to expand and diversify our products, fabrics, styles and materials. Some of what we need includes a new walking foot sewing machine, a serger, more fabrics, materials and a larger studio space.

  • ISABEL SK has been invited to participate in over 6 fashion shows worldwide since 2013. Traveling to these prestigious shows will grow our brand and generate further awarenes of our greater art and design community.  

  • Isabel would like to host community outreach programs in the arts from her own studio.
Our past success has proven that there is immense interest in our brand. People are constantly asking for more! The challenges we face can be overcome by help from our contributors. We receive daily emails, social media requests and inquiries and we’re currently unable to keep up. We need funding for overhead to meet demand.

                 


WHAT YOU GET FOR HELPING US OUT!

        REFLECTIVE CAMO BAG PERK on LEFT. ISABEL SK drawstring bags 

WHY US?

Beyond the production of our new collection and our own brand’s growth, this campaign will help us engage the Nashville fashion, music and art communities to encourage collaboration across different scenes and spread awareness of what’s already happening.

We want to establish ISABEL SK in a way that enables us to bring the city together. Creating a strong foundation for our company will allow us to follow through on our goal of creating a connected arts community in Nashville in a way we haven’t seen yet.

In the long run we aim to provide a venue for artists, designers, musicians  - anyone who wants to be involved - to come together and bounce ideas off each other. Bands can collaborate with other bands, artists and designers on album art, merchandise and more. Artists can have a place to create and display their work alongside designers creating and developing projects of their own. A hub like this could be invaluable in a city where so many talented people have so many good ideas, and we want to help make it happen.  


Jacket in top photos Dress in bottom photos by ISABEL SK pics by Franey Miller for Cake Mag. 


The point is, we care! We care about quality and creating cutting edge clothing. About supporting our greater arts, fashion and music community and providing a supportive space for creativity to flourish. With your help, we can make all of this happen.

Don’t forget the perks! Support this campaign and you’ll get something great in return.


            CLICK HERE TO CHECK OUT ALL THE PRESS COVERAGE WE'VE HAD! 

                    

                                     

                                                Top and Skirt by ISABEL SK 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you LOVE what you see but are unable to help with funding we still want you in our corner! Please POST and SHARE this campaign with the most awesome people in your life! 

Join our email list!

ISABELSK.COM

Instagram: @isabel.sk

Twitter: @rewindthatbackk

story:
INTRODUCING AWARE & ACTIVE APPAREL

     My name is Damian "Dame" Cephas, I'm a former athlete, coach and visionary.  Aware & Active Apparel Company is aiming to lead the charge in broadening people's idea of cancer awareness.  Cancer awareness should be year round not just one month out of the year.  If we are going to cure cancer we need to change our thinking, change our way of life and change our style. 

 

     Your donation will help launch this Cancer Awareness T-shirt company. A percentage ($5 from each purchase ) of each T-shirt sold will be donated to various charities that help fight all types of cancer. As the founder of Aware & Active , my passion to help cure cancer will be in each of the T-shirts . Please be Aware & Active in the fight to cure cancer and help make the dream of curing cancer a reality and donate. https://www.facebook.com/awareandactive

 

( Please note this not the full collection , just a few selections for your viewing pleasure . We have  12  T-shirts ready to launch , not including Donor only exclusives )

 


 


The Hope

 

     We have set a funding goal of $4,500 . At that level, we'll have enough money to place an order with our manufacturer and fill our first orders . As well as handling marketing and legal fees.


     As we see it Cancer awareness should be year round! All cancers are equally important and we won't rest until YOU feel the same way.

 

     Ultimately our goal is to evolve into a gobal lifestyle brand that's consistently raises Cancer awareness.  As we grow we want to increase awareness.  This means releasing new ideas, creating viral content, and organizing volunteer and donation efforts to continue our mission to change the world . https://www.facebook.com/awareandactive

 

 


The Challenge

     Aside from helping us become a global brand and helping us raise constant awareness, YOU are the power of this movement . In order to build momentum we need YOU to tell your friends , family , co workers etc. The easiest way to do that is social media . Post on Facebook , Twitter  and Instagram .

 

     As a independent designer with new tools like Indiegogo , we can directly partner with our supporters and future supporters alike. YOU can lead the charge for change in the world. The change starts today.....right now! https://www.facebook.com/awareandactive

 


 

The Thanks

 

     Whether you are able to support us and give at this point or not. We still appreciate you and want you to join our community https://www.facebook.com/awareandactive . Also thank you in advance to all our supporters for making our dream come true and believing in the vision .Thank you Indiegogo for providing a platform like this to allow us to live our dream.

 

*Any questions or  inquiry please email me

Awareandactivenow@gmail.com
