story:
Determined and driven by an incredible resolution to never give up, the man of Swiss origin immigrated to the United States where he had a successful career as a racing driver. In 1911 he founded the 'Chevrolet Motor Car Company of Michigan'.

The conviction, strength and passion of the man, who was ahead of his time in many domains, drives us to pay a tribute to him, by imitating his inventiveness in our own domain: watchmaking.

His slogan 'Never Give Up' inspires us in each of our projects to always take on new challenges.

 

Driven both by this inventive spirit and our desire to pay a tribute once again to Louis Chevrolet, our designers have created, within the Frontenac Collection, a new range with a unique concept and with a patent, developed by our engineers: the flying date.

 

Since innovations never come alone, this most original concept also makes it possible to read in low light or at night or, thanks to the application of luminous material (SLN C1) on the date indicator, the circular digital calendar as well as the hands and indexes.

In order to create this unique date indication, our watchmakers adapt the original movements used on these timepieces, be it the robust ETA 2824/2 automatic or the Ronda 515 quartz movement.

Once they have passed through our workshop, these engines are ready to accommodate our flying date.

Get a special discount while supporting us on the futur retail price of the watches.

These 4 models stand out by the deep reflections of the galvanic dial, the lightness of the skeleton hands as well as the luminous material finely applied on the whole dial (indexes, calendar, reflector & hands). The robust housing is made of 316L stainless steel and is water-resistant down to 50 metres. The crystal is made of high-resistance anti-reflective sapphire glass on both sides.

These timepieces are equipped with a reliable Swiss movement: the automatic calibre ETA 282/2, visible from the back.

The perforated leather strap is inspired by the old racing driver's gloves, which provides a genuine comfort on the wrist.

 

Get a 30% discount while supporting us on the futur retail price of the watches.

These 5 models with a sportier design are decorated with a honeycomb pattern similar to the front calender of the Camaro.

As on the automatic version, we find the skeleton and the luminous material finely applied on the entire dial (indexes, calendar, reflector & hands). The sturdy case is made of 316L stainless steel and is water-resistant down to 50 metres. The high-resistance sapphire crystal is anti-reflective on both sides.

These timepieces are equipped with a reliable Swiss movement, the Ronda calibre R515. The bottom crystal is decorated with a honeycomb pattern.

The nylon strap has two coloured stripes, giving the watch an ever sportier design.

Your watch is supplied with a leather strap and a nylon strap. No tool is needed to switch them, thanks to the lug bars. 

Our watches come with a pin buckle. You have the possibility to complete your order with a folding buckle (stainless steel) that is faster and easier to put on your wrist. For this, would you please pay and additional CHF 35.00 as you choose your watch so that we can identify your wish.

Proud of our know-how, we offer you quality and innovative watches at affordable prices. We are among the pioneers in Switzerland to sell our watches exclusively via the Internet so as to avoid intermediary fees and guarantee you the fairest price.

We are proud to propose our automatic version in Swiss Made label and the quartz one in Swiss Movement. 

Our passionate team works relentlessly to offer you ever more innovative and quality watches.

Déterminé et emplit d'une incroyable force le poussant à ne jamais rien lâcher, l'homme d'origine Suisse immigra aux Etats-Unis où il eu une carrière de pilote de courses automobile remplie de succès. Il fonda en 1911 l'entreprise de voiture "Chevrolet Motor Car Company of Michigan"

La conviction, la force et le désir de cet homme, en avance sur son temps dans bien des domaines, nous pousse à lui rendre hommage en étant tout autant inventifs que lui dans notre domaine: l'horlogerie.

Son slogan: "Ne renonce jamais" (Never give up), nous inspire dans chacun de nos projets pour toujours relever de nouveaux défis.

Fort de cet esprit innovant et de notre volonté de rendre une fois de plus hommage à Louis Chevrolet, nos designers ont imaginé, au sein de la collection Frontenac, une nouvelle gamme au concept unique avec un brevet développé par nos ingénieurs: la date volante.

Une innovation ne venant jamais seule, ce concept des plus original permet également d'avoir une lecture parfaite de nuit ou par faible luminosité. Grâce à l'apposition de matière lumineuse (SLN C1) sur l’indicateur de date, le calendrier numérique circulaire ainsi que les aiguilles et les indexes.

Afin de parvenir à cette indication de date inédite, nos horlogers adaptent les mouvements originaux utilisés sur ces garde-temps, qu'il s'agisse du robuste mouvement automatique ETA 2824/2 ou du quartz Ronda 515. Une fois passés par nos ateliers, ces moteurs sont prêts à accueillir notre date volante.

Profitez d'un rabais spécial en nous supportant par rapport au futur prix de vente des montres.

Ces 4 modèles se démarquent par les reflets profonds du cadran galvanique, la légèreté des aiguilles squelettes, ainsi que la matière lumineuse finement apposée sur l'ensemble du cadran (indexes, calendrier, réflecteur & aiguilles). Le boîtier robuste est en acier inoxydable 316L étanche 50 mètres. La glace est en saphir antireflet deux faces à haute résistance.

Ces garde-temps sont équipés d'un mouvement suisse fiable, le calibre automatique ETA 2824/2 visible depuis l'arrière.

Le bracelet en cuir perforé est inspiré des anciens gants de pilotes automobiles, et apporte un grand confort de la montre au porté.

Profitez d'un rabais de 30% en nous supportant par rapport au futur prix de vente des montres.

Ces 5 modèles au design plus sportif sont décorés d'un nid d’abeille rappelant les calandres des Camaro.

On y retrouve, comme sur la version automatique, les aiguilles squelettes, ainsi que la matière lumineuse finement apposée sur l'ensemble du cadran (indexes, calendrier, réflecteur & aiguilles). Le boîtier robuste est en acier inoxydable 316L étanche 50 mètres. La glace est en saphir antireflet deux faces à haute résistance.

Ces garde-temps sont équipés d'un mouvement suisse fiable, le calibre quartz Ronda R515. La glace de fond est également décorée avec un nid d'abeille.

Le bracelet en nylon arbore deux bandes de couleur, lui conférant un esprit des plus sportif

Votre montre est fournie avec un bracelet cuir et un bracelet nylon. Aucun outil n'est nécessaire pour les intervertir.

Nos modèles sont livrés avec une boucle ardillon. Vous avez la possibilité de compléter votre commande avec une boucle déployante (couleur acier) plus rapide et aisée à mettre au poignet (uniquement compatible avec le bracelet cuir). Pour cela, veuillez payer  CHF 35.00 supplémentaires lorsque vous choisissez votre montre afin que nous puissions identifier votre souhait.

Fiers de notre savoir-faire, nous vous proposons des montres de qualité, innovantes, à des prix attractifs. Nous avons été parmi les pionniers en Suisse de la vente exclusivement par internet, afin de vous garantir le prix le plus juste et d'éviter les frais d'intermédiaires.

Nous sommes fiers de vous proposer nos versions automatiques en label Swiss Made et les versions quartz en Swiss Movement.

 Notre équipe de passionnés, oeuvre sans relâche pour vous proposer des montres toujours plus innovantes et de qualité.

Il fonda en 1911 l'entreprise de voiture "Chevrolet Motor Car Company of Michigan"La conviction, la force et le désir de cet homme, en avance sur son temps dans bien des domaines, nous pousse à lui rendre hommage en étant tout autant inventifs que lui dans notre domaine: l'horlogerie.Son slogan: "Ne renonce jamais" (Never give up), nous inspire dans chacun de nos projets pour toujours relever de nouveaux défis.Fort de cet esprit innovant et de notre volonté de rendre une fois de plus hommage à Louis Chevrolet, nos designers ont imaginé, au sein de la collection Frontenac, une nouvelle gamme au concept unique avec un brevet développé par nos ingénieurs: la date volante.Une innovation ne venant jamais seule, ce concept des plus original permet également d'avoir une lecture parfaite de nuit ou par faible luminosité. Grâce à l'apposition de matière lumineuse (SLN C1) sur l’indicateur de date, le calendrier numérique circulaire ainsi que les aiguilles et les indexes.Afin de parvenir à cette indication de date inédite, nos horlogers adaptent les mouvements originaux utilisés sur ces garde-temps, qu'il s'agisse du robuste mouvement automatique ETA 2824/2 ou du quartz Ronda 515. Une fois passés par nos ateliers, ces moteurs sont prêts à accueillir notre date volante.Profitez d'un rabais spécial en nous supportant par rapport au futur prix de vente des montres.Ces 4 modèles se démarquent par les reflets profonds du cadran galvanique, la légèreté des aiguilles squelettes, ainsi que la matière lumineuse finement apposée sur l'ensemble du cadran (indexes, calendrier, réflecteur & aiguilles). Le boîtier robuste est en acier inoxydable 316L étanche 50 mètres. La glace est en saphir antireflet deux faces à haute résistance.Ces garde-temps sont équipés d'un mouvement suisse fiable, le calibre automatique ETA 2824/2 visible depuis l'arrière.Le bracelet en cuir perforé est inspiré des anciens gants de pilotes automobiles, et apporte un grand confort de la montre au porté.Profitez d'un rabais de 30% en nous supportant par rapport au futur prix de vente des montres.Ces 5 modèles au design plus sportif sont décorés d'un nid d’abeille rappelant les calandres des Camaro.On y retrouve, comme sur la version automatique, les aiguilles squelettes, ainsi que la matière lumineuse finement apposée sur l'ensemble du cadran (indexes, calendrier, réflecteur & aiguilles). Le boîtier robuste est en acier inoxydable 316L étanche 50 mètres. La glace est en saphir antireflet deux faces à haute résistance.Ces garde-temps sont équipés d'un mouvement suisse fiable, le calibre quartz Ronda R515. La glace de fond est également décorée avec un nid d'abeille.Le bracelet en nylon arbore deux bandes de couleur, lui conférant un esprit des plus sportifVotre montre est fournie avec un bracelet cuir et un bracelet nylon. Aucun outil n'est nécessaire pour les intervertir.Nos modèles sont livrés avec une boucle ardillon. Vous avez la possibilité de compléter votre commande avec une boucle déployante (couleur acier) plus rapide et aisée à mettre au poignet (uniquement compatible avec le bracelet cuir). Pour cela, veuillez payer  CHF 35.00 supplémentaires lorsque vous choisissez votre montre afin que nous puissions identifier votre souhait.Fiers de notre savoir-faire, nous vous proposons des montres de qualité, innovantes, à des prix attractifs. Nous avons été parmi les pionniers en Suisse de la vente exclusivement par internet, afin de vous garantir le prix le plus juste et d'éviter les frais d'intermédiaires.Nous sommes fiers de vous proposer nos versions automatiques en label Swiss Made et les versions quartz en Swiss Movement. Notre équipe de passionnés, oeuvre sans relâche pour vous proposer des montres toujours plus innovantes et de qualité.

story:
The VIEW by Caliper Timepieces

Inspired by technical instruments from the mid 20th century, the VIEW is an automatic watch with unique transparent graphic elements.

The Caliper VIEW was successfully funded in March 2016.  Production is now complete and watches are available for immediate shipping!

Caliper Timepieces harken back to the era of precision instrumentation - when the inner mechanics of our most important tools and devices were crafted for accuracy, dependability and longevity. Caliper Timepieces are a tribute to all that came before the planned obsolescence of the consumer age. 

They don't just mark time - they express values.

The Caliper View is a precision-crafted mechanical timepiece with a self-winding movement that highlights the intricate inner details through glass surfaces on both the front and back.

The Caliper View features a high quality case, milled from surgical-grade, 316L steel, and sapphire scratch-resistant glass on the front and back.

The movement is the Japanese-made Miyota 82S0. It is purely mechanical, requires no battery and will wind automatically when worn (it can also be wound conventionally).

The View’s glass face is perhaps its most distinctive design feature, highlighting the movement from the front and back. It also allowed us to offer a choice of two graphic designs over the movement. The didactic version labels key components of the inner workings. The dot-screen version creates a visual separation between the face and the works.

The graphic elements, glass watch face and the reflective nature of the movement cause the appearance of the View to vary in different light conditions. To appreciate the visual variety, take a look at our Instagram page. 

 

As Seen In:

Gracious Watch, Singapore

"Just when you thought timepieces can’t get any cooler, here comes the good-looking and functional Caliper View Watches. These are not like your ordinary watches. They are absolutely stunning with their glass dial giving you the perfect view of its complications inside. Learn more about the beauty of the Caliper View watches below."

 - Jeremiah Say, Gracious Watch

Wrist Watch Review, United States

"The Caliper View watch offers a tightly designed modern automatic watch that should make every architect and engineer cry. This is a new watch company taking its namesake from the tools used to measure distances between two sides of an object. I got to wear the prototypes to see how they measure up. Read on for my impressions!"

 - Ken Nichols, Wrist Watch Review

Microbrand Watch World, New Zealand

"Caliper Timepieces have done an excellent job catering to the desire to watch the intricacy of a mechanical movement in action with their first offering, the aptly named Caliper View." Read More >>

- Nick Warner, Microbrand Watch World

Kempt (getkempt.com)

"So if you’re itching to get in on the ground floor, this Tuesday we’ve rounded up the best watches currently seeking funding on Kickstarter..." Read More >>

- Kempt Staff, Kempt

Ivy Time

"I would hope true watch enthusiasts can appreciate the craftsmanship and general approach Caliper is taking." Read More >>

- Kyle Webster, Ivy Time

 

Perks

We are offering a few models at a discount of $50 for Indiegogo members. Pick your perk on the right. 

 

 

 

The 38mm diameter case looks good on all wrist sizes

 

Technical Data

  • Case milled from 316L steel 
  • Sapphire scratch resistant glass 
  • Glass on back of case 
  • Glass watch face with graphic elements
  • Case diameter 38mm
  • Case thickness 12.5mm
  • Water resistant to 10 ATM (100m) 
  • Miyota 82S0 movement 
  • Manual and self-winding 
  • 21 Jewels 
  • 21,600 vibrations per hour 
  • 40+ hours of running time

The didactic glass watch face

 

 

The dot-screen glass watch face

Project Plan

We've raised enough capital through crowdfunding to finance a full production run. Watches have been shipped to all our early backers and we have inventory ready to go out.

Before shipping to you we test and inspect every watch. Here a watch timing machine is used to ensure that the mechanical movement is operating correctly and meets the design specifications.

Case thickness 12.5mm
Water resistant to 10 ATM (100m) 
Miyota 82S0 movement 
Manual and self-winding 
21 Jewels 
21,600 vibrations per hour 
40+ hours of running time


The didactic glass watch face
 
 

The dot-screen glass watch face
Project Plan
We've raised enough capital through crowdfunding to finance a full production run. Watches have been shipped to all our early backers and we have inventory ready to go out.


Before shipping to you we test and inspect every watch. Here a watch timing machine is used to ensure that the mechanical movement is operating correctly and meets the design specifications.

story:
Short Summary

I have been playing soccer since I was 4 years old and have had the opportunity to play on over 4 continents from Asia, to South America, to Europe, and all over North America and the Caribbean. 

I have a passion for soccer and for soccer cleats.  I have worn nearly every brand of cleat that is out there and have a clear understanding as to how a cleat should feel and what a player needs in a cleat. 

The unique thing about Just Play Cleats is that there are no brands or logos on any of the cleats.  The quality is comparable to all the top brands at lower prices.  Ultimately, players are on the field to play soccer, not for the brand or logo. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to cover the production and shipping for the cleats we need your help!  It is very expensive to ship and produce in large order quantities, which is what we will need to do.

We will rely on ourselves for the majority, but need at least $5,300 to help make this all happen.  This will go towards the production as well as the shipment of the cleats.

If we are unable to reach our goal then unfortunately we will not be able to produce the cleats and get them to the public and to those less fortunate around the world.

 

The Impact

Your contributions will not only help to make these cleats available to the market, but more importantly will be helping those less fortunate throughout the world.

We have direct ties to Africa through the non profit organization Footsteps for Africa that was started by my older brother Austin.  He has made 3 trips to Africa to deliver both shirts and shoes to those less fortunate and delivers everything himself and films the process so that donators can see exactly where everything goes.

If we reach our goal, we will be able to provide many pairs of cleats for the many soccer players all over the world who do not have the means to play.

Not only will you dinstringuish yourself by wearing cleats without a brand or logo, but you will be making a positive difference in the world.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are not a soccer player you still can donate and give the cleats away to family, friends, and any soccer players in your community that do not have cleats.

  • You can share this campaign with all you know to help us reach our goal
  • You can contact us via www.JustPlayCleats.com and donate any used cleats that you or others are not using.
  • We cannot thank you enough for your willingness to contribute.

story:
Polish Cosmetics is a handcrafted line of luxurious, 100% vegan, demi-pressed eyeshadows infused with nourishing organic botanical oils. We take raw materials and blend and mix them into unique eyeshadows that contain no animal parts or extracts, and no fillers, silicones, parabens or dyes. Then, we press them into jars using an ingenious new process to create an amazing product that combines the versatility of pressed eyeshadow with the simplicity of cream eyeshadow for a long-lasting, easy to use product.

We aspire to recapture the avant-garde glamour of Art Deco and blend it with the ethereal sensuality of Art Nouveau so that your natural beauty can shine even brighter.

When I started Polish Cosmetics, I wrote a business plan with a mission: Create luxurious, natural, vegan, pressed eyeshadows. At the time, though a couple of admirable companies fulfilled some of these criteria, I couldn’t find any that met all of them. On top of that, I wanted my customers to feel the joy I did when I found a special new eyeshadow at Sephora- that “Oooh!” moment.

Our eyeshadows would be complex, beautiful, and would make people smile. They would have to be the highest quality possible, and would need to feel amazing. I wanted them to be pressed in some form, but have the possibility for experimentation. And, of course, they had to be vegan, and as natural and organic as possible.

We considered every aspect of our product and packaging from our customers perspective. We do not use fillers, or repackaged mica, and this step alone meant we spent over a year perfecting our base. Since many people are allergic to Bismuth Oxychloride, or irritated by talc, we renounced both, and when it came to which oils we'd use, we chose the most moisturizing and universally appreciated. The eyeshadow shades are also all formulated to work well as eyeliners when dampened (I recommend using eyedrops instead of water for increased cohesion, binding, longevity, and pigmentation).

For packaging, we decided the jars and bottom labels had to be translucent so you could see what colors the eyeshadows were when stored upside down. Then we topped it off with a sealed filter for your convenience.

I've always loved the distinctive modernity of Art Deco, as well as the curving loveliness and elegance of Art Nouveau. So while thinking of design ideas that would work for a luxurious cosmetic company, I thought mixing the two would give just the right amount of exuberance and femininity. Alphonse Mucha, Georges Barbier, Erte, Gustav Klimt and Tamara de Lempicka were all significant influences, and happen to be some of my favorite artists as well. Polish Cosmetics is for the modern woman who appreciates the beauty of the past, while looking forward to the future.

Demi-Pressed is the term we coined to describe our eyeshadows. They are pressed into jars with a softer force, using our secret process, than is typically used for regular pressed eyeshadows in pans. This creates several advantages. Pressing into jars, instead of pans, allows you extra room to use your makeup the way YOU want to. You can use it with a brush, like a standard pressed eyeshadow, but in a jar you won't end up brushing half of it out of the container. Or you can use your fingers, like you would for a cream eyeshadow. It's even formulated so that it will break up more evenly if you'd prefer to turn it into a loose eyeshadow. 

We do highly recommend using an eyeshadow primer or base with our (and all) eyeshadows, as it significantly improves longevity and pigmentation, and decreases fall out. If you use a brush with our eyeshadows, we also recommend "patting" on the eyeshadow, like I do in the video at 1:12, then lightly blending, instead of using broad swipes.

Our products are PETA certified vegan- they contain no animal ingredients, extracts or derivatives. That means no: beeswax, carmine/cochineal, pearl, silk, lanolin or anything else  We are also certified members of PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies (Cruelty-Free) program, which guarantees that we will never test on animals- and we're proud to declare that we never have.  

We are also certified by Leaping Bunny and the Coalition for Consumer Information on Cosmetics (CCIC). Leaping Bunny's program is stricter than PETA's and requires us to obtain certification that our suppliers do not test on animals, and that neither do we. At the moment, we cannot afford their licensing fee, but we ARE a fully certified/ approved company, and will soon be listed in their Compassionate Shopping Guide.

Carmine is an extract from the Cochineal Beetle. The beetles are ground up and mixed with a solution, then the extract is used a dye. Almost all major cosmetics companies (including those who make a big deal of being cruelty-free) use this in the majority of all pink, purple and red makeup. I first heard about the use of carmine/ cochineal in cosmetics a few years ago. My first reaction was simply pure disgust, but the more I thought about it, the more upset I got. Some people would say “They’re just beetles,” but it seemed so unnecessary that I couldn’t forget it. I stopped buying anything with carmine in it then, and when I was ready to start Polish Cosmetics, it was already a given that it would be vegan and cruelty-free. We would be better than the standards, would never test on animals, nor use suppliers who do, and we’d never use any type of animal extract whatsoever.

Our eyeshadows are as natural as they come. We use primarily minerals, organic oils, and micas for our creations. We do not use dyes of any kind, bismuth (which many people find allergenic), parabens, talc, petrochemicals or silicones. Though we use no preservatives, our eyeshadows have an indefinite shelf life, so they'll last until you hit the bottom.

Polish Cosmetics is a Pledged Member of the Campaign for Safe Cosmetics.

As we are not yet officially selling our products, we are currently ineligible to join the Enviornmental Working Group (EWG) Skin Deep Cosmetic Database. This also makes us currently ineligible to join the FDA's Voluntary Cosmetic Registration Program (VCRP), though we plan to join both groups as soon as we are able. We are committed to full transparency, and providing any information that may help you make better purchasing decisions. 

Ingredients: Mica, Capric Triglyceride (Organic Coconut Oil), Silica, Zinc Stearate, Titanium Dioxide, Magnesium Myristate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Organic Jojoba Oil), Isopropyl Alcohol. May Contain: Iron Oxides, Ultramarines, Manganese Violet, Chromium Oxide Green.

The contributions we receive from this campaign will go towards three key areas: building a glamorous, secure website for online sales at www.polishco.com, trademarking our brand, and ordering more supplies. With these components in place, we believe we'll be able to sucessfully launch our brand.

As our way of thanking you for your enthusiastic pre-launch support, we've got amazing perks! 

Pick one (or grab all) of our exclusive indiegogo eyeshadows shades. Or, if your dream has always been to have an eyeshadow created and named just for you, select our Haute Couture package and we'll make it happen, and we'll include the indiegogo exclusives along with our regular line, pictured above.

Sunbeam is a yellow sand color with moderate yellow-orange sparkles. Vintage Posies is a lovely medium purple with moderate sparkle that is much more subtle than it appears in the picture (that is, not as bright or glittery). Matchstick Liner is a medium/dark gray with a hint of brown and high shimmer, not glitter.  

We will be shipping orders throughout the campaign, and expect to have all perks on their way by the end of May 2013.

On the name: I love makeup because it’s beautiful, freeing, exciting, and transformative. That’s why I chose the name Polish- it’s the ability to change and improve yourself; to refine yourself, and become elegant. It’s a final touch, that pulls everything together, and makes you walk down the street with your head held a little higher.

Questions? Please email us with any questions you may have and we'll be happy to help you.

Thank you so much for taking the time to look at our page. Please contribute to my dream of launching Polish Cosmetics and enjoy our products. If you're unable to contribute at this time, please help us spread the word about this campaign, whether by email, Facebook, or in person. Everything helps!

And always, let your natural beauty shine.

We are committed to full transparency, and providing any information that may help you make better purchasing decisions. 
Ingredients: Mica, Capric Triglyceride (Organic Coconut Oil), Silica, Zinc Stearate, Titanium Dioxide, Magnesium Myristate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Organic Jojoba Oil), Isopropyl Alcohol. May Contain: Iron Oxides, Ultramarines, Manganese Violet, Chromium Oxide Green.


The contributions we receive from this campaign will go towards three key areas: building a glamorous, secure website for online sales at www.polishco.com, trademarking our brand, and ordering more supplies. With these components in place, we believe we'll be able to sucessfully launch our brand.
As our way of thanking you for your enthusiastic pre-launch support, we've got amazing perks! 
Pick one (or grab all) of our exclusive indiegogo eyeshadows shades. Or, if your dream has always been to have an eyeshadow created and named just for you, select our Haute Couture package and we'll make it happen, and we'll include the indiegogo exclusives along with our regular line, pictured above.

Sunbeam is a yellow sand color with moderate yellow-orange sparkles. Vintage Posies is a lovely medium purple with moderate sparkle that is much more subtle than it appears in the picture (that is, not as bright or glittery). Matchstick Liner is a medium/dark gray with a hint of brown and high shimmer, not glitter.  
We will be shipping orders throughout the campaign, and expect to have all perks on their way by the end of May 2013.

On the name: I love makeup because it’s beautiful, freeing, exciting, and transformative. That’s why I chose the name Polish- it’s the ability to change and improve yourself; to refine yourself, and become elegant. It’s a final touch, that pulls everything together, and makes you walk down the street with your head held a little higher.
Questions? Please email us with any questions you may have and we'll be happy to help you.
Thank you so much for taking the time to look at our page. Please contribute to my dream of launching Polish Cosmetics and enjoy our products. If you're unable to contribute at this time, please help us spread the word about this campaign, whether by email, Facebook, or in person. Everything helps!
And always, let your natural beauty shine.

story:
The Silk Dynasty 1500 Strong Shirt

A shirt to commemorate the Silk Dynasty at twitch.tv/JadeSilk reaching 1500 followers!

The Design

Below you can see pictures of Jade sporting the new design.  All 1500 followers are featured, forming the word DYNASTY.  The phrase "The Silk Dynasty Fifteen Hundred Strong" also appears in red; each word is featured on a different letter.  The final "Y" of DYNASTY has the channel name - twitch.tv/JadeSilk.

 

The Shirt

The design will be printed on a soft-style New Level 3600 shirt.  This shirt is incredibly soft and is available in XS-4XL sizes (depending on color - all colors are available in XS-3XL).  See color options below. 

Available Colors:

Size specifications:

Only Heather Gray and White are available in 4XL.  All other sizes are available for all color options.

Still not sure?  Type in 3600 on the search bar here: http://www.onehourtees.com/products.php This will allow you to view the colors on a model.  Note that not all colors viewed at this site are available for this design.

 

The Impact

With your support, we can continue to get better equipment and new games for the stream!  All income from this campaign will go toward improving the stream.

story:
The Tayogo AMP (Amphibious Music Phones) 

A waterproof bluetooth headset with a built in mp3(stores up to 8GB) and FM player. 

INTRO

For more than a year, we’ve been developing the AMP so you can take your music in and out of the water with comfort and convenience.

With its own internal 8GB system, you can amplify your workouts by listening to music you choose.

Manage your playlists using our proprietary app that can be found on both the Apple and Android store.

or Connect Tayogo AMP to your mobile phone and feed in(via bluetooth) your iTunes, Spotify, or other music Apps as well as answer phone calls. 

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

We're interested in spending money on the product development, not on advertising.  WITH YOUR SUPPORT, we can pass those SAVINGS on to you! We also want to continue to develop the product, and indiegogo will allow us to connect to YOU, our audience so we can have an active dialogue and update you on our latest developments.

FEATURES:

Waterproof:

Sweat or swim as much as you want!  Because our patented designed headphones meet a superior IPX 8 waterproofing standard which means it can continuously remain submerged under water up to 3 meters for up to 5 hours. 

Comfort:

The AMP is completely coated in a soft, skin-like silicone.

Compact 3-part design:

A built in USB connector plugs directly into your computer to charge or download files easily.  No need to carry around an additional cord!  

 

 Please see the demo on our Tayogo AMP's design:

What is Included:

Tayogo AMP *1
USB extending Cable *1
Common ear  buds *3
In-ear buds*2
Wing shaped buds *1
Instruction Manual *1

We have 3 colors available now:

Order more colors to mix and get more funs:

OUR iOS and ANDROID APP: A FIRST

Our proprietary app, allows you to manage all the music on your 8 GB system.  Create playlists and organize your songs in the order you want them to play! No headache for how to choose your favorite from your stored over thousand songs.

 It even tracks your steps!

The AMP has an activity tracker, so you can count your daily steps, distance, and calorie burn.

WHEN WILL I RECEIVE MY TAYOGO AMP?

March 2017.  Yes that's right, we've been actively testing the AMP, and it's almost ready to ship.  So you'll have the headphones in your hands soon after our campaign so you can start using them right away!

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS:

Waterproofing: IPX 8: Can be submerged at a depth of up to 3 meters (or 10 feet) for up to 5 hours

Bluetooth Range:  up to 30 feet (or 10 meters)

Memory: 8GB

Battery life: Up to 7 hours （Vary for Mp3 Playing, Bluetooth or FM)

FM Range: 60-108MHZ

Mp3 format:  MP3, WMA, WAV, APE, FLAC

Charging: 5V 1A.

Risks and challenges

We're a small company, but we've been in the electronics business for over 10 years now and we're not going anywhere. We don't have huge budgets, but we have passion and love what we do. We'll try our best to deliver an amazing product at an affordable price.

If you are looking for a pair of headphones to swim with, or exercise with so you can listen to music at an affordable price, definitely buy our product. We think you'll be pleased.

But, this device will not solve all your problems. There will be times you may want plug in headphones. While it does answer calls and handles them well, it's also not for somebody who does a lot of talking on the phone. There are headsets specifically designed for that purpose and we want you to choose those products if that is what you are looking for. 

The headsets should also be handled with care. They are waterproof and fairly durable, but not bulletproof. We'll let you know when we release a kevlar version...(just kidding). We hope you'll enjoy our product, and thanks again for your support.

They are waterproof and fairly durable, but not bulletproof. We'll let you know when we release a kevlar version...(just kidding). We hope you'll enjoy our product, and thanks again for your support.

story:
中文官網說明｜中文贊助教學 

 

Combining the passions of speed and precision mechanism that are irresistible to men, the JSK Series stands out like a restless soul that longs for the road.

 

Wrench Tool Key Fob, Rubber Watch Strap, International 2 Year Warranty Card.

 

With over 20 years of experience in watch making, elegantsis draws inspiration from JSK Moto’s classical creations: Chocolate Slider, Ivory Comet, Cobalt Storm, and Rhodium Omega, gives life to the JX65AS-JSK series and is committed to delivering beyond.

We know the thrill and pleasure to ride a motorcycle and to wear a fine watch. The JX65AS-JSK series is our tribute to you, the passionate and restless at heart.

 

elegantsis is experienced in the art of timepiece production and in joining forces with the award-winning custom motorcycle design company, JSK Moto, we bring together the common values of craftsmanship, strength and style.

 

JSK Moto is driven to customizing motorcycle designs for superior experience because like restless souls, they will not settle for the status quo. The JS65A-JSK Series is born from this attitude and combines the character and mechanical elements of the custom motorcycles into the watch design. 

 

Through the hands of the skilled watchmakers, the rigorous spirit of engineering and mechanics of custom motorcycle design is meticulously built into the fine details of each JS65A-JSK timepiece.

 

Seize the moment to answer the calling of the road geared with the JS65A-JSK timepiece, made to power your ride as you experience the thrill and pleasure of the wind blowing past.

 

Unleash your soul and ride free with the JS65A-JSK, experience the speed and race against the sweeping second hand on the watch face.

 

In designing and making the JX65A-JSK collection, the team invested a lot of time and effort to ensure the creations lived up to our uncompromising high standards. The manufacturing processes, as well as the materials and technology used, are those adopted by luxury watches. all metallic parts though small and complicated, are meticulously machined and crafted to blend in with the customized concept of the biker theme. 

The perseverance to do well is not just a promise from elegantsis, but also a culture.
story_txt:
中文官網說明｜中文贊助教學  Combining the passions of speed and precision mechanism that are irresistible to men, the JSK Series stands out like a restless soul that longs for the road. Rhodium Omega and Cobalt Storm inherit the spirit of JSK Moto, with laser etching of the logo on the transparent gear wheel-like caseback design and tri-color racing stripe stitchings on the leather straps. One off production of 500 pieces worldwide. Created for the like-minded souls, each timepiece is engraved with a unique serial number.
Multi-Tool, Rubber Watch Strap, Wrench Tool Key Fob, Double-Headed Watch Repair Spring Bar Tool, Extra Watch Strap Spring Bar x 2 (in storage container), International 2 Year Warranty Card.
The journey on your bike takes you everywhere, through the wild, through deserts, and through dirt roads. Under the scorching sun, the wind brings dust to your face and under the midnight stars, your engine roars on. Let The Classics Collection remind you of the journeys taken and that its time to hit the road again!Wrench Tool Key Fob, Rubber Watch Strap, International 2 Year Warranty Card.  

Highlights: Swiss automatic movement, and Sapphire watch screen. Transparent laser etching of JSK Logo on case back, Each timepiece comes safeguarded in the specially designed protective military-grade hard case with exclusive warranty card for 2 year world service guarantee. 

Highlights: Swiss automatic movement and Sapphire watch screen. Each timepiece comes safeguarded in the specially designed protective military-grade hard case with exclusive warranty card for 2 year world service guarantee.

You will make the choice of watch variation after the campaign ends through a survey sent out to you!
 
With over 20 years of experience in watch making, elegantsis draws inspiration from JSK Moto’s classical creations: Chocolate Slider, Ivory Comet, Cobalt Storm, and Rhodium Omega, gives life to the JX65AS-JSK series and is committed to delivering beyond.We know the thrill and pleasure to ride a motorcycle and to wear a fine watch. The JX65AS-JSK series is our tribute to you, the passionate and restless at heart. elegantsis is experienced in the art of timepiece production and in joining forces with the award-winning custom motorcycle design company, JSK Moto, we bring together the common values of craftsmanship, strength and style. JSK Moto is driven to customizing motorcycle designs for superior experience because like restless souls, they will not settle for the status quo. The JS65A-JSK Series is born from this attitude and combines the character and mechanical elements of the custom motorcycles into the watch design.  Through the hands of the skilled watchmakers, the rigorous spirit of engineering and mechanics of custom motorcycle design is meticulously built into the fine details of each JS65A-JSK timepiece. Seize the moment to answer the calling of the road geared with the JS65A-JSK timepiece, made to power your ride as you experience the thrill and pleasure of the wind blowing past. Unleash your soul and ride free with the JS65A-JSK, experience the speed and race against the sweeping second hand on the watch face. elegantsis has harnessed the skill and technology, with 20 years of experience, to design and produce luxury timepieces at a reasonable price. Working on the JX65AS-JSK series gives us the chance to share our passion and pride with a larger creative community and also showcase our capabilities and dedication to watchmaking. 
 In designing and making the JX65A-JSK collection, the team invested a lot of time and effort to ensure the creations lived up to our uncompromising high standards. The manufacturing processes, as well as the materials and technology used, are those adopted by luxury watches. all metallic parts though small and complicated, are meticulously machined and crafted to blend in with the customized concept of the biker theme. The perseverance to do well is not just a promise from elegantsis, but also a culture.

story:
What are Antonio Marquez handbags?

I started my brand back in 2013 designing luxury leather handbags. The purpose was to create a timeless accessory that any woman would want to wear on her shoulder. We use the most beautiful, soft leathers form France and construct them to ensure the bags are light. They are structured in a way to fit around 24 hours, whether its a night out, coffee with friends or a day at the office. Each bag fulfils what women want in a handbag created in a stylish contemporary design. The bags are handmade in Paris to a beautiful finish. 


Why does Antonio Marquez Handbags need your help?

So far this has been a self funded company, now the original bags have been finalised; which have been popular in private orders I would like to start selling to stockists and develop more designs. With the funds raised with indegogo, I would be able to have more handbags made so I could begin to expand to stockists and expand the collections.

What is the future of Antonio Marquez Handbags?

With your support the company will reach a stable position so we can continue the progress of developing the first designers high-end tech bag and introduce it into the market.  


FAQ's


Where did Antonio Marquez study?

Antonio Marquez was raised in Southern California, and in his mid teens moved to Mexico where he got a BA in Fashion Design at the Institute of Fashion Design in Guadalajara. He then went on to move to London where he studied at Central St Martins  and London College of Fashion. After graduating he then worked with Ozwald Boatang in Savile Row before founding his own company.

What materials does Antonio Marquez use?

Antonio Marquez uses the softest lambskins (also used by Chanel and Hermes) buffalo and calf skins. The hardware is made in Italy and his bespoke clasps are made and designed exclusively by Antonio Marquez.

Do they come in different colours?

The bag colours depend mostly on the season. Antonio Marquez's signature colour is black. However if there is a request for a bespoke colour way this is also possibly. 

What types of bags does Antonio Marquez have?

Paris Bag - Cross side bag. Suitable for Six Hours.
Steph Bag - Large tote bag. Suitable for Eight Hours. 
Cardholders - Suitable for everyday use.
Antonio Marquez unisex rucksack to be released. 

Is there anything new Antonio Marquez is working on?

Yes. Antonio is currently working on collaborating  with wearable tech brands to create the first luxury tech handbag. 

Why should we invest in Antonio Marquez?

The antonio Marquez brand looks to create the new 'timeless' investment fashion piece that keeps alive the heritage of handmade fashion items in these times of advanced technology. The materials used for the bags are of the highest quality to ensure they will be durable yet soft. Antonio Marquez also looks to support artisans rather than replacing them with machines. If you give your support to Antonio Marquez bags you are also supporting keeping alive the tradition of handmade craftsmanship in the luxury sector.

Thank you for taking the time to look at the Antonio Marquez bags Indegogo page. If you like what you've seen and are looking forward to see what happens next for Antonio Marquez please support the brand. Thank you. 

CONTACT
E: amfashionstudios@gmail.com
T: +44(0) 7526167880

story:
After misplacing my passport during my travels just to find it in the middle of the heap with the rest of my luggage, I set out to find a passport case to make it easier to locate and access. We searched for what's currently on the market, and were generally frustrated with their inherent limitations-- they were either too bulky which made it hard to carry, or they were too small with merely anything to add but a passport sleeve. Spurred by our frustrations and inspired by our travels, we set out to create the ultimate travel wallet that packs functionality without compromising on bulk. After several design iterations, we are excited to introduce a sleek minimalist travel wallet that carries the essentials, so you can effectively focus on what matters most: enjoying your journey.

 "For every minute spent organizing, an hour is earned". 

                                                                                       -Anon

You will have your passport typically valid for 10 years. You don't want to mix it with your used clothes nor would you want to expose it to foreign substances. A passport's paper book can easily be ruined in a span of minutes. Please protect it. Seriously.

ALL SET.

 

Never be left without a pen again! You need to fill up your Customs forms and other travel documents, not to mention sign autographs since you're a rockstar. Please be prepared.

With two card compartments, you can easily store your bank cards, ID cards, license and more.

Yes, you're going to need international currency. In all likelihood, you'd also need to print that important document-- be it your visa, hotel reservation, and other booking. I know, I know, it's the 21st century. But hey, your smartphone can eventually run out of battery, not to mention some establishments still require physical documents printed out.  

Fits in your front and back pocket.

Chances are, you'd want to leave your passport and other valuables in your bag on your night out in Buenos Aires or wherever in the world your adventure takes you. However, its compact size enables you to equally carry it on the go in your front and back pocket should the need arise.

Dimensions: 

(i) Length: 18.0 cm; (ii) Width: 11.5 cm; (iii) Height: 1.5 cm

story:
Even if we do not reach our goal, you will get your clothes with no delay!
We are already ready to ship your products out and will start as soon as the campaign is over :D

_____________

 

Leonardo Da Vinci believed that art and science were two disciplines meant to go hand in hand.

With Da Vinci’s idea as a state of mind, Fantini of Denmark have created untypical clothes by combining French/Italian design, the luxurious feel, the breathability of pure cotton and a technology that makes the clothes not only comfortable to wear, but also both liquid-repellent and self-cleaning, representing a giant leap in design and technology!

 

 

We combined the best features that one can possibly wear in order to achieve perfection.

 

- Scroll for more info and rewards -

 

 

REWARDS

A SLICE OF THE FUTURE AT A FRACTION OF THE PRICE

Delivery guaranteed!

We have now done a crowdfunding in the past and we know what to do. Furthermore, everything is ready to go, and we only need your help to create our first batch and meet minimum order quantities.

 

SHIPPING

We guarantee that we will deliver, as we have done a crowdfunding campaign in the past and now know for sure how long it can take. Furthermore, we have everything ready to be engaged, so we only have to press the green button to get it started.

Shipping charges (VAT + Duties) to EU and the US are paid by us – for the rest, we pay the VAT, but we would need an extra $10 to be sent to you.

VAT/Duties PAID for EU and US!

 

WE ARE CREATING THE FUTURE OF CLOTHING – SUPPORT US TODAY AND BE A PART OF IT!

 

 

Why do you only have to pay such a low price?

 

SIZES

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP?

We believe in our product and this is key to success, but we do not have enough resources to run our products, because we have chosen a harder way. We have chosen to have a high quality product, to be sure that we used all the possible resources to make it happen: a unique Swiss technology that we use to make our clothes water-repellent and stain-repellent. We worked hard in order to have to reach Italian quality label that we can ensure our customers to have luxury Italian product at very reasonable price.

What is more, our brand brings Scandinavian heritage which provides a minimal look.

As you see, we have already done a lot to offer our consumer the best version of our product. And because of that, we need YOUR help to keep us moving toward even bigger goals.

 

 

OUR STORY

First in the world liquid-repellent, luxury clothing. We are using a unique technology to make elegant apparel liquid and stain resistant.

Italian design combined with Swiss technology and Scandinavian heritage keeps you classy and dry, no matter what you are doing.

Fantini of Denmark is the first brand in the world to make high-quality clothes liquid-repellent by the help of technology. This technology is from a Swiss company counting 3000 employees having worked on it during the last 5 years to make the best products possible. In order to deliver the best quality in every aspect, each of our textiles go through more than 70 ISO tests and are Bluesigned® approved.

 

OUR TECHNOLOGY

Fantini is revolutionizing the world of clothing while offering high levels of quality, value and service. Although our products are made in modern environments, we carefully monitor each aspect; from fabrics to the finished article, enabling us to ensure it meets the high standards you, the customer, have come to expect.
You might be asking yourself how we can make clothes repel liquids so well – Fantini is delighted to tell you how. Because of the high standards that we give ourselves, we have pushed the boundaries of quality in order to give our customers the best that is obtainable.

The most advanced Swiss technology used in the Fantini products is developed in order to allow its apparel to be hydrophobic and breathable while keeping the softness and flexibility of the used textiles. These textiles are specially selected 100% cotton from the best mills in the world in order to ensure a premium quality and touch.

We made sure that the production of our attire is as efficient as possible. The process starts in Italy where the carefully chosen factory produces 100% cotton textile. Later on, the material is coated with nanotechnology that goes around every textile thread and gives the features to the material. Since we are following these steps our clothes can be washed around 40 times without losing its functionality. After this happens we advise our customers to warm up the clothes to 40° in order to reclaim the liquid-repelling function.

All of our textiles are treated with a Swiss technology that renders every piece of hydrophobic or liquid-repellent.

 

 

OUR IMPACT

 

ENVIRONMENT

Fantini is committed to a standard of excellence in every aspect of our business, including legal, ethical and responsible conduct in all of our operations. We expect these same commitments to be shared by all factories, subcontractors, suppliers and agents who are affiliated with the manufacture of Fantini’s suppliers.

In addition, suppliers are also expected to share our commitment to quality and to maintaining the practices necessary to meet our quality standards.

WATER

As a natural extension of that responsibility, we are committed to reducing our water footprint throughout our supply chain, protecting our oceans, increasing water availability for global communities and partnering with our consumers on water conservation.

ENERGY AND EMISSION

Energy efficiency is a key component of our environmental program. Reducing the energy we use in our supply chain both helps the environment and saves us money. Our main energy use is electricity, in lighting, heating and office equipment. Employees are encouraged to turn off lights when not required, to keep rooms at a reasonable temperature when appropriate clothing is being worn (after all, we are a clothing company), not to use the air conditioning unless it’s really necessary and to turn off office equipment rather than leave it on standby.

WASTE

The majority of our waste is packaging. We endeavour to minimize the use of packaging materials at product design stage but must ensure that products are well presented to the end consumer at point of sale. We have a policy of reusing packaging whenever possible, including inbound packaging reused to ship outbound goods, and when that’s not possible, or a box becomes too old to reuse, we recycle. Non-cardboard waste, such as plastics and fluorescent tubes, are also recycled.

We insist on instigating objectives to increase the number of items we ship in each cargo. Much like our reductions in energy consumption, this objective also makes financial sense for the business. Furthermore, Fantini is continually working towards reducing our waste and making more efficient use of the world’s resources.

SUPPLY CHAIN

Fantini products are built to last. We also guarantee our performance products against defects and failure for a reasonable serviceable lifetime. We still offer a repair service and wherever possible we will endeavour to make an existing item fit for purpose again rather than resign it to the bin. In contrast to many of our other initiatives, this may not seem like the best way to grow our business. However the durability of Fantini products reduces our environmental impact and ultimately fuels our reputation.

LOOKING AHEAD

As we continue our voyage, we plan to share our progress and learn from other industry and NGO partners as to how we can best navigate the waters ahead. We know that this is an uncharted path and we must constantly re-evaluate how the way we do business impacts the earth, our oceans and global communities.
story_txt:

  REWARDSA SLICE OF THE FUTURE AT A FRACTION OF THE PRICEDelivery guaranteed!We have now done a crowdfunding in the past and we know what to do. Furthermore, everything is ready to go, and we only need your help to create our first batch and meet minimum order quantities. SHIPPINGWe guarantee that we will deliver, as we have done a crowdfunding campaign in the past and now know for sure how long it can take. Furthermore, we have everything ready to be engaged, so we only have to press the green button to get it started.Shipping charges (VAT + Duties) to EU and the US are paid by us – for the rest, we pay the VAT, but we would need an extra $10 to be sent to you.VAT/Duties PAID for EU and US! WE ARE CREATING THE FUTURE OF CLOTHING – SUPPORT US TODAY AND BE A PART OF IT!  Why do you only have to pay such a low price? SIZESWHY WE NEED YOUR HELP?We believe in our product and this is key to success, but we do not have enough resources to run our products, because we have chosen a harder way. We have chosen to have a high quality product, to be sure that we used all the possible resources to make it happen: a unique Swiss technology that we use to make our clothes water-repellent and stain-repellent. We worked hard in order to have to reach Italian quality label that we can ensure our customers to have luxury Italian product at very reasonable price.What is more, our brand brings Scandinavian heritage which provides a minimal look.As you see, we have already done a lot to offer our consumer the best version of our product. story:
Short Summary

Here we go again! Last year, fans of Gravity Falls helped raise over $8,000 to bring back the officially licensed Grunkle Stan Fez. The show has since ended but that doesn't mean we have to stop producing merchandise for the show. In fact, there's a host of new merchandise in the works right now!

The company involved with producing these items recently reacquired several key licenses that allow me to order new hats, wallets, and other items. Some of these, like the fez, were previously sold since the show began but either limited in quantity or location. Some, like the Journal 3 wallet pictured in the campaign card, have never been produced before. By helping out, you're making history.

What We Need & What You Get

I'm looking to raise at least $3000 through this campaign to help off-set the costs of the production run. This is only a small fraction of the total cost needed but will help substantially. A minimum of 576 of each headwear item and a minimum of 600 of each wallet must be ordered to be produced. This is your opportunity to get one before anyone else. Here's the breakdown of approximately where your money will go to.

~70% For the production costs of the licensed merchandise
~10% Novelty items (Items like postcards included with each fez)
~10% Shipping Supplies (Boxes, tape, labels)
~10% Fees (Indiegogo & 3rd Party fees)

By supporting this campaign you'll have the option to get the following items

-Officially licensed pine tree Dipper hat, cloth snapback, no trucker mesh
-Officially licensed wallets (barfing gnome, journal 3, and another)
-Officially licensed Waddles themed laplander
-Grunkle Stan Fez (currently already in a second run, expected by June)
-And a few more that will be revealed as the campaign goes on!

All items leftover from the production run after rewards are sent out will be available for sale on Amazon.com.

The Impact

The show has since ended a few months ago but while it was airing, Gravity Falls was one of Disney's highest rated cartoon shows. Fans everywhere who love the show would love even more to help support it by buying officially licensed merchandise approved by Disney. This campaign is to give them all the opportunity to do that.

Risks & Challenges

I've already had one successful campaign and reproduced the fezzes. I've also been working with the company and brought back two licensed t-shirts since. Once payment is submitted to the company, approximately 120 days later, varying based on individual items, the completed merchandise will arrive. Ideally, everything will arrive sometime around September.

Other Ways You Can Help

Just get the word out! Gravity Falls fans are a force to be reckoned with when they work together. Whether it's solving the clues in record time or looking for any scrap of new intel to unravel the final mysteries of the show. You never have to say goodbye to the world Gravity Falls.

story:
Summary

We are selling the shirts at cost of production. No money will be made. This is entirely out of respect for the great man's career.

We were working on a new set of T-shirts over the past few weeks, and since Prince recently gave a few performances at our home near Oakland, CA, we wanted to make one for him. We posted it in some fan group pages too see if people would like it. We got a positive response and we were going to release it next month. 

With the unfortunate tragedy of his untimely passing, we cannot in good conscious profit from a person's death, so we have decided to release it now at the price of production cost.  

What We Need & What You Get

  • All of the money will go into the cost of shirts and screen printing. 
  • Please input  your address.
  • As soon as the campaign is over, I will contact you regarding the gender and size of your shirt.
  • We will then produce and mail out the shirts immediately.

We posted it in some fan group pages too see if people would like it. We got a positive response and we were going to release it next month. 
With the unfortunate tragedy of his untimely passing, we cannot in good conscious profit from a person's death, so we have decided to release it now at the price of production cost.     What We Need & What You Get 
All of the money will go into the cost of shirts and screen printing.  Please input  your address.
As soon as the campaign is over, I will contact you regarding the gender and size of your shirt.
We will then produce and mail out the shirts immediately.

story:
LAPAMANIA

Let your clothing and accesories say thats thing you don't dare.

Deja que tu ropa y accesorios digan lo que tú no te atreves a decir.
  • I'm a creative and on of a kind person looking for express - and sustent -  my self through fashion, art and outrageous and funny objects.
  • Soy una persona única y creativa que busca expresarse - y sustentarse - a través de la moda, el arte y una serie de objetos desubicados y divertidos. 
  • With this minimum contribution you'll help me achieve a new beggining in my life and let me at least try to do something that I love: create.
  • Con este mínimo aporte me ayudarás a alcanzar un nuevo comienzo en mi vida y a permitirme al menos intentar a hacer algo que amo: crear.

This is the Beggining | Este es el Cominezo 

It's simple: We all need a starter .

Es simple: Todos necesitamos empezar.
  • If you give me, I'll give you: Free Stuff from LAPAMANIA, Exclusives and personlized desgins, all the news first for you and of course all my loving.
  • Si tú me das, yo te doy: Cosas gratis de LAPAMANIA, diseños exclusivos y personalizados, todas las novedades en primer lugar y, por supuesto, mi amor eterno. 

Fuck The System | A La Mierda El Sistema 

I don't want to have bitchy bosses anymore, I want to be happy going to work and most of all I want to see the sea while I'm working, girls.
No quiero más jefes basura, quiero ir a trabajar feliz de la vida y principalmente quiero ver el mar mientras trabajo, chicas.
  • LAPAMANIA will make us all laugh, looking good and feeling fine.
  • LAPAMANIA nos va a hacer reir, vernos y sentirnos bien.
50 Shades of Black | 50 Tonos de Negro
Well, not everything is pink coloured in life. So maybe I'll have to deal with exploiters in the fashion industry, polution and non sustainable resources but is my main goal to paid those bitches no mind and leave them behind as soon as I can. 
Bueno, no todo en la vida es color de rosa. Probablemnete tenga que lidiar con explotadores de la industria de la moda, contaminación y recursos no sustentables pero mi objetivo principal es poder evitarlos y dejarlos atrás lo antes posible.
  • Sustainable packaging, Fair trade, Linkage, Responsabile Consumption.
  • Empaquetado reciclable, Comercio justo, Interconectividad, Consumo Responsable. 

Money Won't Save The World | El Dinero No Salvará al Mundo 

If you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Que no puedas contribuir, no significa que no puedas ayudar:
  • Folks,  get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Amigos, tomen la antorcha y hagan ruido sobre mi campaña.

  • Share, like, comment!
  • Comparte, dale ME GUSTA, comenta!

Together We Are More | Juntos Somos Más

Only love will save the World! Thanks a lot, bitches!
Sólo el amor salvará al mundo! Muchas Gracias, malditos!

story:
“Born distinct, made peerless”

– Elegant, Comfortable, and Unique in Every Refined Detail


We are Distinct.
Everyone is born distinct. There are always some parts deep within our hearts that could not be unified by the world. We love to stand out and proudly express ourselves.

    Here is a simple challenge – open your closet and try to find clothing that meets the following criteria: lively designed, finely made, and most importantly, uniquely produced. Pretty hard, right?

    We can always find clothing that is lively designed - we love them. Spirited graphics and lovely shapes always fill us with energy and passion. They make us feel motivated and be ready to challenge and embrace anything in the days ahead.

    But color is not the only part of young dressing style; we demand comfort, quality and uniqueness as well. We want our clothes to be comfortable, with fine materials and smooth cuts. We demand our clothes to be of quality, preserving their colors and shapes through time. We ask our clothes to be unique, rarely seen but always recognized.

    Wouldn't it be brilliant if we combined these criteria we love – color, comfort, quality and uniqueness – all in one fashion collection? A unique fashion collection that is vivaciously designed; carefully made; joyfully fitted; and, most valuably, limited quantity.

    No matter who you are, whether a young college student preferring fashion and relaxation or an older gentleman wishing to feel elegance and young, wouldn't this “Unique” be the best choice for daily life? Perhaps also on a Friday night party or a Saturday morning cruise?

    Yes, definitely.

We are Peerless.
No two people are the same, so are the products from Nichol Alexander - vivacious design, unparalleled quality, and limited quantity.

    We are delivering uniqueness to everyone. We created the very first limited produced fashion collection, not to present exclusiveness and elitism, but to:

- Champion uniqueness;

- Emphasize spirited young life style;

- Express energy and passion;

- Deliver comfort and perfection;

    To champion uniqueness, we stepped up to do what no other fashion brand has ever tried. Instead of mass producing a few designs and flood the market, Nichol Alexander strictly limited the quantity produced for each design under 250 pieces, making every Nichol Alexander truly peerless and valuable.


   To fit the life style of being young, we added different types of clothes into the product collection, like hoodies and shorts. When you wear them, you can feel the spirit of youth dancing through your body.

    To express energy and passion, our clothing selection encompasses a variety of colors and lively images. You can feel the shining passion and energy seep through your skin.

    To deliver comfort, the level of details and careful selection of materials go into every one of our designs. Without sacrificing quality for cost, we provide the finest quality and luxury for everyone, regardless of age.

   

    

    You may find a lot more stories about Nichol Alexander, and, of course, promotions and discounts through the links below. Check out our website and blogs - spread the word!

Use of Fund

    To let all these exciting ideas and dreams come true, we need everyone’s help. The fashion industry is a very costly industry. We need to raise five hundred thousand dollars to cover the cost of designing, manufacturing, storage, distribution, and marketing.

    Your investment not only will help us to "gogo" a new fashion collection, but will also bring a new style of clothing into your closet, filling in the missing pieces of your wardrobe. 

 

Welcome – to Nichol Alexander. www.NicholAlex.com

 

Special update on Feb. 12th, 2013

A letter from our customers and a letter to everyone

Since the announcement of our 13S semester special for students, we are receiving lots of greeting emails everyday. Among those, one email asking about our product prices and uniqueness attracts our special attention.

“Good evening NA, Why would a student pay for Nichol Alexander when he could buy something from mature companies such as Ralph Lauren, Brooks Brothers, Vineyard Vines, etc for the same price or even less? … How Nichol Alexander clothing line prides itself on its “uniqueness”?… These clothes are just not something I would immediately take the risk in purchasing because I saw a flier or an email.  At the right price maybe, but not immediately. ”

We believe many of potential customers, not only students but also others, would raise the same questions, when they first know Nichol Alexander through emails, Facebook pages or other channels:

Why Nichol Alexander’s products are listed at premium prices? How Nichol Alexander’s products are “Unique”?

We realized that replying this letter is also a brilliant chance for us to reach out to our customers and shed some light on the questions and doubts they may share. We hope, by publishing our reply, we are able to help everyone with a better understanding of Nichol Alexander as a brand.

“Good Evening

Thank you very much for your letter.

There has been quite a debate inside Nichol Alexander since its establishment on how should we price our products.

We wanted to build Nichol Alexander to be a high-end brand. Therefore, we designed our products with quality, detail, and profession.

We then wanted to build this brand to be unique, different from RL, CK or any other high-end names. So we decided not to put our designs into mass production and limit our production quantity. To ensure our uniqueness, we make only a little over 200 pieces for each design, including all sizes, which means anyone who wear our clothes should never expect someone near him wearing the same ones.

We also wanted to sell our brand to ourselves, college students. As you mentioned in your previous email, we also agreed that not many college students would pay for a $130 hoodie from a brand they never heard of – that price is simply out of range. Without sacrificing quality and continuing our vision of delivering quality products to college students like you and me, we are constantly offering special discounts to students. Currently, we are giving out special discounts like you have received: $25 for sending an email; $5 for giving us some feedback basing on our posts on “indiegogo”; and $10 for each flyer posted around; a good way to engage our friends and customers and help college students. Through this promotion, anyone can get a free T-shirt for posting one flyer. With a couple more, you can receive a polo shirt. Or, with free credit, $60 does not sound like a bad deal for a great hoodie; moreover, it’s a 200 pieces limited quantity.

With many other factors that went into our price (new startup design, marketing, etc.), this brief explanation only scratched the surface. But we do hope this has shed some light on your question. We sincerely hope you will find the quality you hold in every Nichol Alexander in the same way we do.

Thank you

Best regards,
Nichol Alexander”

FAQ

1. What colors, sizes and cuts will the clothes come in?
You can pick any design, color, sizes offered on our website, as long as they are not sold out.

2. How do I choose my size?
Please follow the size chart provided on our website.



3. Are there any clothes for women?
Currently, we only offer men’s clothes, but we will have collections for women in the short future. Keep an eye on us.

4. Do you ship perks internationally?
Yes, but Free Shipping with in the US.

We are Distinct. Everyone is born distinct. There are always some parts deep within our hearts that could not be unified by the world. We love to stand out and proudly express ourselves.
    Here is a simple challenge – open your closet and try to find clothing that meets the following criteria: lively designed, finely made, and most importantly, uniquely produced. Pretty hard, right?
    We can always find clothing that is lively designed - we love them. Spirited graphics and lovely shapes always fill us with energy and passion. They make us feel motivated and be ready to challenge and embrace anything in the days ahead.
    But color is not the only part of young dressing style; we demand comfort, quality and uniqueness as well. We want our clothes to be comfortable, with fine materials and smooth cuts. We demand our clothes to be of quality, preserving their colors and shapes through time. We ask our clothes to be unique, rarely seen but always recognized.
    Wouldn't it be brilliant if we combined these criteria we love – color, comfort, quality and uniqueness – all in one fashion collection? A unique fashion collection that is vivaciously designed; carefully made; joyfully fitted; and, most valuably, limited quantity.
    No matter who you are, whether a young college student preferring fashion and relaxation or an older gentleman wishing to feel elegance and young, wouldn't this “Unique” be the best choice for daily life? Perhaps also on a Friday night party or a Saturday morning cruise?
    Yes, definitely.
We are Peerless. No two people are the same, so are the products from Nichol Alexander - vivacious design, unparalleled quality, and limited quantity.
    We are delivering uniqueness to everyone. We created the very first limited produced fashion collection, not to present exclusiveness and elitism, but to:
- Champion uniqueness;
- Emphasize spirited young life style;
- Express energy and passion;
- Deliver comfort and perfection;
    To champion uniqueness, we stepped up to do what no other fashion brand has ever tried. Instead of mass producing a few designs and flood the market, Nichol Alexander strictly limited the quantity produced for each design under 250 pieces, making every Nichol Alexander truly peerless and valuable.

   To fit the life style of being young, we added different types of clothes into the product collection, like hoodies and shorts. When you wear them, you can feel the spirit of youth dancing through your body.

    To express energy and passion, our clothing selection encompasses a variety of colors and lively images. You can feel the shining passion and energy seep through your skin.

    To deliver comfort, the level of details and careful selection of materials go into every one of our designs. Without sacrificing quality for cost, we provide the finest quality and luxury for everyone, regardless of age.

   
    
    You may find a lot more stories about Nichol Alexander, and, of course, promotions and discounts through the links below. Check out our website and blogs - spread the word!
Use of Fund
    To let all these exciting ideas and dreams come true, we need everyone’s help. The fashion industry is a very costly industry. We need to raise five hundred thousand dollars to cover the cost of designing, manufacturing, storage, distribution, and marketing.
    Your investment not only will help us to "gogo" a new fashion collection, but will also bring a new style of clothing into your closet, filling in the missing pieces of your wardrobe. 
 
Welcome – to Nichol Alexander. www.NicholAlex.com

 
Special update on Feb. 12th, 2013
A letter from our customers and a letter to everyone
Since the announcement of our 13S semester special for students, we are receiving lots of greeting emails everyday. Among those, one email asking about our product prices and uniqueness attracts our special attention.
“Good evening NA, Why would a student pay for Nichol Alexander when he could buy something from mature companies such as Ralph Lauren, Brooks Brothers, Vineyard Vines, etc for the same price or even less? … How Nichol Alexander clothing line prides itself on its “uniqueness”?… These clothes are just not something I would immediately take the risk in purchasing because I saw a flier or an email.  At the right price maybe, but not immediately. ”
We believe many of potential customers, not only students but also others, would raise the same questions, when they first know Nichol Alexander through emails, Facebook pages or other channels:
Why Nichol Alexander’s products are listed at premium prices? How Nichol Alexander’s products are “Unique”?
We realized that replying this letter is also a brilliant chance for us to reach out to our customers and shed some light on the questions and doubts they may share. We hope, by publishing our reply, we are able to help everyone with a better understanding of Nichol Alexander as a brand.
“Good Evening
Thank you very much for your letter.
There has been quite a debate inside Nichol Alexander since its establishment on how should we price our products.
We wanted to build Nichol Alexander to be a high-end brand. Therefore, we designed our products with quality, detail, and profession.
We then wanted to build this brand to be unique, different from RL, CK or any other high-end names. So we decided not to put our designs into mass production and limit our production quantity. To ensure our uniqueness, we make only a little over 200 pieces for each design, including all sizes, which means anyone who wear our clothes should never expect someone near him wearing the same ones.
We also wanted to sell our brand to ourselves, college students. As you mentioned in your previous email, we also agreed that not many college students would pay for a $130 hoodie from a brand they never heard of – that price is simply out of range. Without sacrificing quality and continuing our vision of delivering quality products to college students like you and me, we are constantly offering special discounts to students. Currently, we are giving out special discounts like you have received: $25 for sending an email; $5 for giving us some feedback basing on our posts on “indiegogo”; and $10 for each flyer posted around; a good way to engage our friends and customers and help college students. Through this promotion, anyone can get a free T-shirt for posting one flyer. With a couple more, you can receive a polo shirt. Or, with free credit, $60 does not sound like a bad deal for a great hoodie; moreover, it’s a 200 pieces limited quantity.
With many other factors that went into our price (new startup design, marketing, etc.), this brief explanation only scratched the surface. But we do hope this has shed some light on your question. We sincerely hope you will find the quality you hold in every Nichol Alexander in the same way we do.
Thank you
Best regards, Nichol Alexander”
FAQ
1. What colors, sizes and cuts will the clothes come in? You can pick any design, color, sizes offered on our website, as long as they are not sold out.
2. How do I choose my size? Please follow the size chart provided on our website.

3. Are there any clothes for women? Currently, we only offer men’s clothes, but we will have collections for women in the short future. Keep an eye on us.
4. Do you ship perks internationally?Yes, but Free Shipping with in the US.

story:
Our original idea was to create a luxury line of credit cards for status minded people- gold, platinum and diamond encrusted cards for the rich and famous. Then we decided that we wanted to rock these cards too, but we were neither rich nor famous. That's when we decided to create an affordable line of luxury credit cards- made mostly of metals.

All of our materials are sourced locally here in Seattle. We cut the cards in-house, laser engrave the name/#'s/images on the front and back of the cards, apply Hi-Coercivity magnetic stripes to the backs and then lock them down with a unique process we created utilizing a hardened clearcoat. 

The two of us have depleted what limited resources we have, but would kill for the following: an upgraded laser engraver that can produce cards at an acceptable output; R&D that includes process of incorporating EMV chip and streamlining magstripe application at more of a mass production level; a beefed up website that wasn't created by one of our little sisters; a professional product photographer.

Our #1 goal is to complete our Visa/MC certifications, which would enable us to provide our cards to Financial Institutions. However, there are many other opportunities: rewards cards, loyalty cards (casinos, Starbucks), private club cards, medical cards, sports season ticket cards, fine dining and other high end gift cards.

A donation would be most helpful, but merely spreading the word of our adventure would be equally important.  We appreciate you taking the time to view our project.  You can always visit us @ www.archoncard.com or email @ bizdev@archoncard.com.  Thanks much!
