story:
Why do I care about Pebble Beach if I don't golf?

I can't afford the course fee, and even if I was a serious golfer, I would have a hard time justifying what they ask. Clearly, Pebble Beach Golf Links doesn't want a peasant like me bringing down the value of their course, and that just makes me want to go even more.  I feel like I need to take advantage of living so close to such a highly-regarded course.

I want to go to Pebble Beach and play golf like serious golfers that can afford to play there.  And I want to document it all.  For you.

What do I need?

The price to play on the Pebble Beach course is $495. Yes you read that correctly. Additionally, I'll need $95 for club rentals, as I do not own my own.


What's in it for you?

Photography is a huge passion of mine and I've been shooting quite seriously for over 10 years.  For the better part of those years I brought my SLR with me everywhere I went, including  work or even a quick trip to the grocery store in case I saw something worth photographing.  Check out my Flickr stream to see my work.

My intent is to document my day on and around Pebble Beach, bringing you (the common man) right there with me.  I'll be like Kenny Hotz photographing the Gulf War, or Lewis Hine with child labor.  Only it will be me, golfing where I don't belong.  I can't believe I just put Kenny Hotz' photography in a sentence with Lewis Hine.  Twice.

Why is this important?

People like you and I shouldn't stand for this tyrannical class separatism preventing me from poorly playing a game I don't know on a course I can't afford!


Risks & Challenges

  • Getting kicked out because I am too slow or bad at golf.
  • I may have to purchase extra balls if I hit way off course into the ocean or something.
  • They have a dress code I'd have to conform to.

Full transparency!  I should mention that I have been to driving ranges and actually played full 18-hole courses about 5 combined times. I am legitimately terrible.


Stretch Goals!

More money will let me free up my hands and give me people to actually photograph.  I have a unique gift, in that I bring down the maturity level of just about everyone I interact with.  Getting me a caddie and friends ensures that I'll have a constant amount of our foolishness and poor golfing to document.

$740 - I will hire a single-bag caddie for the course. Gratuity will be paid out of pocket.  Not being encumbered by carrying clubs around will give me the time and mobility to take more frequent and better pictures.

$1475 - I will bring a friend with no golfing experience along with me, and hire a double-bag caddie. Gratuity will be paid by my friend.  Having a friend gives me a  subject to photograph actively golfing, making for more interesting photos.

$2775 - I will bring 3 non-golfing friends along with me, hire a forecaddie for us, and my friends will split the gratuity.  Having a group of friends gives me multiple subjects to photograph golfing and screwing around, giving me more time and opportunities for even better photos.

$3225 - I will purchase a head-mounted GoPro Hero3+ Silver and record the entire experience in 1080p60.  I have a friend who used to be a former professional television editor that is now studying to become a doctor, and I will beg him to push aside his doctoral studies to edit the trip into something both watchable and enjoyable. This would be the kind of professionalism and quality that is currently only found in the most cutting-edge porn.


Testimonials from actual golfers.  AKA, further reasons this needs to happen.

"This guy just doesn't seem to understand that there is a level of etiquette that needs to be upheld."

"[You] should get a fucking job. Or better yet, don't play pebble beach."

"Pebble Beach happens to to be a bucket list course, similar to an Islamic journey to Mecca (and for some of us the religious aspect is not overstated). Not all courses are like this, nor should they be. If every location was a Mecca, there would be nothing special about Mecca."

"no one in their right mind is going to want to be paired up or playing behind hackers during a $500 round."

"Please send some time researching the etiquette of golf."

"[You are] an asshole."

"What a dick."

"What dumbfucks gave this guy money?"


Thanks for your support!


"Golfball" by Lotus Head is licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0.

story:
Who am they?

If you're reading this at all, you probably already know that Glasgow's Lapsus Linguae were the greatest (ONLY) exponents of piano-constant, neo-classically pro­gres­sive, post-metallic, hard­core max­i­mal­ism, and that the Lapsus Linguae T-Shirt was to the noughties what the Gazza shell-suit was to the 90s. You KNOW theys bringin' out dem  records "Ghosts" and "This Is puberty" soon-styles (see www.lapsuslinguae.co.uk fact fans) But DID YOU KNOW -NOW- you can BUY T-SHIRTS ETC?!*!

FITTED! ** CHUNKY! ** VESTS! ** BAT WINGS!

WHITE! ** BLACK! ** BABY PINK!

 

Authenticating around my own self -

As one quarter of four dicks, Penelope Collegefriend plastered all across my identity ... BUT ... since Lapsus Linguae isn't one them coveted limited company house guys (slow tear trickle down fat face) this campaign is being run on behalf of the *real* band by me ACTUALLY using my (actual) name.  L.E.G.I.T.I.M.A.T.E.

 

What this offer?

Assorted garments printed with a Lapsus Linguae logo.

We're puttin' the fun intae "crowd funding" as a pre-order thingy to ensure we order the right amount of the right kind, whilst simultaeously avoiding plunging our reluctantly stingy Scottish hands into our porridge-and-chip-fat-soaked pockets.

The logo will be pure silver on black items, or silver with a black edge on white and baby pink items. The picture of the white shirt pictured (abovewise) shows you roughly what to expect, though they'll arrive signifcantly MORE SILVERER - the one in the photo was worn by yours truly, so, like its owner, it has endured many gigs, is over the age of seven, and has consequently lost some of its sheen... 

 

Pledgy

If you fund this, you WILL get the garment you ordered: This isn't an "all-or-nuthin" campaign, the only consequence if we fall short of our £500 funding goal is we'll pay Indie Gogo a larger surcharge, but it wont effect you.

 

Pricey

A while back I was bandying my fat mouth all over facebook with implausiblly cheap numbers until VAT and other nasty surcharges slapped some sense into me...I ought therefore, to sheepishly remark that the prices we're asking for include a mark-up, but not a huge one, and that funds raised will go towards helping us to complete and promote the new records   "Ghosts" and "This Is Puberty".

 

Stand around, then deliver

Once the campaign is complete, it'll take;-

  • Up to 10 days for the money to clear.

  • A working day or two to submit the order to the Printers.

  • Approx 5 working days for the printers to turnaround if they're busy

  • Maybe another 10 days to sort mailing out the garments.

So realistically you should have your order in your grubby mitts about a month after the campaign finishes.

 

Sizes and Colours

Please give your preference of size and colour in brackets in the name field of the order form - we'll extract that information and use it to put in an order to the printers and send you the right item(s).

 

Postage costs

There are three levels of "perk" to cover postage and packaging - within UK, within the EU and rest of the world. Please include the appropriate one in your shopping basket. If people want to buy multiple items, or club together to save money, you can probably get 3 light items (small tees or vests of any size) or 2 heavy items (hoodies or XXXL large tees) for the same postage.

 

Final closey

Reading through Indie Gogo's guidelines for a sucessful campaign here, we ought to say the following;-

This is real.

TRUST.

Indie Gogo has share tools.

Thanks!

If people want to buy multiple items, or club together to save money, you can probably get 3 light items (small tees or vests of any size) or 2 heavy items (hoodies or XXXL large tees) for the same postage.
 
Final closey
Reading through Indie Gogo's guidelines for a sucessful campaign here, we ought to say the following;-
This is real.
TRUST.
Indie Gogo has share tools.
Thanks!

story:
We will ask for your color preference and shipping address at the end of the campaign!

Every Contributor will receive a pair of Far Out Sunglasses, even if we do not meet our goal of $4,500


What's up Indiegogo..

We are here to launch our new Snap Series of Far Out Sunglasses.

Not sure about you, but as kids we went through about 3 or 4 pairs of sunglasses a year.  They break too easily, scratch too fast, and we all know they are easy to leave behind.  After a while we just couldn't stand it any longer, and we didn't want to drop another 100$ on a pair of Oakley's or Ray Bans, or head to the local wings and spend 5$ on something that would make us look ridiculous, and wouldn't even protect our eyes.  That's why we created our new snap series .  For the consumer.

Our sunglasses bring together style, durability, and best of all, a low price tag.  We created our hinged arm series so that you can easily snap off your arms and snap them onto a different pair.  This creates an endless number of combinations for any color bathing suit you decide to wear to the beach that day. On top of that all our sunglasses feature polarized lenses and a memory frame plastic that can withstand massive amounts of pressure. Hope you guys enjoy

Snap Series Sunglasses: 

When we get funded, our snap series model will be our signature line, which is why we brought it to you guys on Indiegogo first.  We worked with our manufacturer to bring this simple yet amazingly useful line of sunglasses to life.  We need money to get samples and further the design, colors, and materials we will be using in our snap series. Our final product will contain polarized polycarbonate lenses with a durable, lightweight, memory frame plastic. As a reward for your pledge, you will be able to choose from any of our six colors listed below.


You will be able to match any of our frame colors above with any of our lens colors below, so make sure to keep that in mind when pledging.

Why we need Indiegogo

We are working with a leading manufacturer of frames and lenses which are hand assembled, polished, and packaged to our exact specifications. But we need your help to go from a working prototype to full scale production. Your pledge will go towards the mass production of our shades which is necessary for the factory to turn out the quality we want on a larger scale. If the goal is met and barring any setbacks I expect to be shipping these out to you by April 2014.  Just in time for summer.

REWARDS:

As a reward for your pledge we're going to send you the first production run of our Snap Series Sunglasses.

All reward levels will include a free microfiber pouch along with a Far Out sticker.  Each pledge will also get free shipping everywhere in the United States (Please add 7$ for International Shipments). At the end of the Indiegogo campaign, you will receive a survey so you can specify which colors you would like.

$25 pledge: One pair of our Snap Series Sunglasses in any color + microfiber pouch + sticker

$45 pledge: Two pairs of our Snap Series Sunglasses in any colors + microfiber pouch + sticker

$85 pledge: Four Pairs of our Snap Series Sunglasses in any colors + microfiber pouch + sticker

$115 pledge: 6 Pairs of our Snap Series Sunglasses in any colors + microfiber pouch + sticker


FAQ

1) When can I expect to see my perk packages?

We will ship out all perk packages in April,  just in time for summer.

2) What colors will I be able to chose from If I have pledged?

Once the funding campaign ends, we'll contact you and ask you which colors you'd like.  Black, Pink, Yellow, Tortoise Brown, Aqua, or Clear

3) Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we do ship internationally! 

Check out a few of our Samples Below

scale. If the goal is met and barring any setbacks I expect to be 
shipping these out to you by April 2014.  Just in time for summer.REWARDS:
As a reward for your pledge we're going to send you the first production run of our Snap Series Sunglasses.
All reward levels will include a free 
microfiber pouch along with a Far Out sticker.  Each pledge will also get free shipping everywhere in the United States (Please add 7$ for International Shipments). At the end of the Indiegogo campaign, you will receive a
 survey
so you can specify which colors you would like.
$25 pledge: One pair of
our Snap Series Sunglasses in any color + microfiber pouch + sticker$45 pledge: Two pairs of
our Snap Series Sunglasses in any colors + microfiber pouch + sticker$85 pledge: Four Pairs of
our Snap Series Sunglasses in any colors + microfiber pouch + sticker$115 pledge: 6 Pairs of
our Snap Series Sunglasses in any colors + microfiber pouch + stickerFAQ
1) When can I expect to see my perk packages?
We will ship out all perk packages in April,  just in time for summer.
2) What colors will I be able to chose from If I have pledged? 
Once the funding campaign ends, we'll contact you and ask you which colors you'd like.  Black, Pink, Yellow, Tortoise Brown, Aqua, or Clear
3) Do you ship internationally?
Yes, we do ship internationally!  Check out a few of our Samples Below

story:
SAFETY- RAVEAN HEATED JACKETS

DURABILITY- RAVEAN HEATED JACKETS


RAVEAN C6 HEATED JACKETS SYSTEM

HEATED DOWN JACKETS & HEATED DOWN VESTS

 RAVEAN PRODUCT REVIEWS




HEATED DOWN VEST (5V SYSTEM)

If you’ve ever tried those heavy, bulky heated gloves with batteries on the wrists you’ll be happy to know that Ravean has solved this problem. Simply connect your gloves to the Ravean C6 12V system and just like that they’re part of the heating system. Use your jacket button adjuster to adjust the system to heat your gloves and any other area of your jacket. This is only available in the C6 12V down jacket products.


Heated Pockets

LIGHT-WEIGHT, HEATED GLOVES CONNECTION-
Warm hands without the headaches

*5V BATTERY RUN TIME: High= 2.5 hours, Med= 4.5-5 hours, Low= 7 hours
*12V BATTERY RUN TIME: High= 3.15 hours, Med= 6 hours, Low= 9-10 hours

The 5-year warranty is limited to the heating element itself, not the coat, fabric, or battery. We created the Ravean C6 heating system to stand up to even the toughest elements, including the ones in your washing machine. And to prove our confidence in what we’ve made, every jacket comes with a 5-year warranty on the heating system. If at any time your heating element malfunctions, we’ll simply replace the entire coat, no questions asked. 

The Ravean C6 is made from light, breathable, water-resistant material DWR (Durable Water Repellant) is a special coating added to fabrics at the factory to make them water-resistant.

MORE INFORMATION ON HOW OUR JACKETS WORK

How To Heat, Charge & Control Your Ravean Apparel
https://www.ravean.com/how-to-heat-charge-control-your-ravean-apparel

Check Out What’s Under Our Hood: Ravean Tech Specs
https://www.ravean.com/check-out-whats-under-our-hood-ravean-tech-specs

 

BIG THANKS TO OUR PR & MARKETING FIRMS

SIZING INFORMATION 

HOW TO KNOW YOUR SIZE?

STEP 1:
WOMEN'S MEASURE YOURSELF

Use a measuring tape and keep it horizontal while you’re measuring.

1. Bust: Measure around the fullest part, across bust points.

2. Waist: Measure around the narrowest part (typically the small of your back and where your body bends side to side).

3. Hips: Measure around the fullest part of your hips.

STEP 2: FIND YOUR SIZE Use the chart below to determine your size. If you’re on the borderline between two sizes, order the smaller size for a tighter fit or the larger size for a looser fit. If your measurements for chest and waist correspond to two different suggested sizes, order the size indicated by your chest measurement.

STEP 1:
MEN'S MEASURE YOURSELF

Use a measuring tape and keep it horizontal while you’re measuring.

1. Chest: Measure around the fullest part, across chest points.

2. Waist: Measure around the narrowest part (typically the small of your back and where your body bends side to side).

STEP 2: FIND YOUR SIZE Use the chart below to determine your size. If you’re on the borderline between two sizes, order the smaller size for a tighter fit or the larger size for a looser fit. If your measurements for chest and waist correspond to two different suggested sizes, order the size indicated by your chest measurement.

WHERE TO MEASURE?

Gloves: Size Chart and Tips

There has been many questions on how to size and fit gloves. Ravean’s gloves sizing made its standards to ensure a comfortable fit, but just like snowflakes, no two hands are the same. Below is a size chart and some tips that you can use as guidance

Tips for All Sizes

You may find your Ravean gloves to be initially snug and tight. They are made using a combination of polyester and spandex to create a snug and tight fit. After a few wears. They should be a perfect fit. If you are in between sizes on our size chart, and like your gloves more fitted, go with the smaller option; if you like your gloves looser go with a larger option

GLOVE SIZING

Download a printable size chart here


JACKET SIZING

 

HOODIE SIZING


MORE INFORMATION

FOLLOW US ON:

https://www.instagram.com/raveanlife

https://www.facebook.com/raveanlife

https://www.twitter.com/raveanlife

https://www.ravean.com

EXCHANGE POLICY:

If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the jackets, vests, and hoodies will fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your jacket for any reason, we will allow you to do that, but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering our jackets at highly discounted prices on Kickstarter, we won’t be able to accept returns.

WARRANTY:

Once again the 5-year warranty is specifically for the heating element itself. The manufacturer warranty is as follows:

Manufacturer(s) warrant the heating element against defects as follows:

LABOR: For a period of 12 months from the original date of purchase, if the customer of purchase has (1) applied for the following warranty at https://www.ravean.com/warranty within the first 12 months after purchase (2) customer has provided proof of purchase during warranty application (3) has done so within the first 12 months of purchase, and (4) if manufacturer determines that the equipment is defective subject to the limitations of this warranty, manufacturer will replace or repair at no charge for labor. Manufacturer warrants any such work done against defects in heating element material or heating element workmanship for the remaining portion of the original warranty period.

PARTS: For the period of 5 years from the original date of purchase and subject to the limitations of the warranty, manufacturer will supply at no charge, new or rebuilt replacement parts in exchange so long as (1) the customer has applied for the following warranty at www.ravean.com/warranty within the first 12 months of purchase (2) provides proof of purchase during warranty application (3) has done so within the first 12 months of purchase, and (4) manufacturer must determine the equipment is defective.

It also has patented cycling feature that allows you to get warmer when and where you want it.

Yes! Water Resistance!


The Ravean C6 is made from light, breathable, water-resistant material DWR (Durable Water Repellant) is a special coating added to fabrics at the factory to make them water-resistant.



Extra Features

story:
This campaign is designed to create awesome Barrowmaze gamer t-shirts!

Barrowmaze is a two-part exploration-style megadungeon for Labyrinth Lord and other classic fantasy role-playing games. I self-published Barrowmaze I and ran a successful Indiegogo campaogn to fund the creation of Barrowmaze II with all sorts of cool perks and extras. You can find the megadungeon at rpgnow or contact me directly. You can find links, updates, fan-creations, and freebies at the Barrowmaze website.

The purpose of this new campaign is to create a bunch of cool retro-style gamer tshirts. Note that all the prices INCLUDE shipping to your location in the United States or Canada. I will be happy to work with peeps in the UK and the rest of the world but ask that you let me get a ballpark shipping price for you first.

The campaign is designed such that the more shirts you buy the cheaper the price because the more volume I can bring the t-shirt company the better deal I can get (and then pass that on to you). The t-shirts start at $25 for one shirt (including shipping) and run as low as $19 (including shipping) for six.

You pledge by selecting your amount and indicating your design choice(s) in the comments. The tees are only offered in black (it is Barrowmaze after all!) and what you see is what you'll get.

The company I am working with has already provided a prototype and as soon as the campaign is complete the order will be finalized and placed. As soon as the order is filled, I will being shipping the t-shirts immediately.

You can expect that I'll be communicating regularly and do my best to meet your expectations. I've run a successful campaign before so pledge with confidence.

Why run a t-shirt campaign? I'm doing this campaign because I think gamer t-shirts are fun. I own a bunch (more than I'll admit!) and often wear them in my gaming sessions.

As you can see, I've asked Barrowmaze illustrator Zu Bajie to create a wonderful new design for the campaign called Dragon Wings. It has a heavy metal vibe that I really dig.

The next shirt, available with a red or white print, is an amalgam of Stefan Poag's work with the tagline Barrowmaze: Get Rich or Die Tryin' -- appropriate don't you think? :)

The third, also by Poag, is from the cover of Barrowmaze I with Rule#5 Always look on the ceiling and Rule#8 Finders Keepers highlighted.

The remaining two are by ex-TSR artist Jim Holloway and include his Caryatid Column about to attack a group of oblivious PCs and the ol' zombie tripwire trap that many of us have put to good use over the years :)

Be advised that there is an additional $1.50 for each size above XL. So:

XXL = $1.50
XXL = $3.00
XXXL = $4.50
XXXXL = $6.00
XXXXXL = $7.50 (5XL is the largest)

EDIT: Youth sizes will not be available - it's just too darned expensive. The t-shirts will be screen printed.

This is a realtively short campaign (3 full weeks) so please be sure to take advantage and pass on the campaign across your social networks.

Cheers, Greg

story:
Our Indiegogo InDemand is over.

You can now buy directly via our webshop.

 

We love riding powder. Therefore, we committed to making the best powder ski & snowboard jacket in the world. Made of high performance, eco-friendly materials. Functionally shaped, packed with lots of useful features and made affordable by the most open company in the outerwear industry.

The Open One is available in three colours: green, black and blue

 “It all started about a year ago, after a whole day of hiking up mountains to ride deep powder.” says co-founder Martijn Jegerings. “We decided it was time to shake up the industry. We simply weren’t satisfied with the available outerwear and set a clear goal: Let’s make the best products for powder days affordable."

 

360-view of the Open One

 

We believe that an industry, so greatly dependent on nature, should do everything in its powers to preserve it. Therefore we teamed up with Sympatex, incorporating the only truly eco-friendly material, that is 100% made out of recycled bottles.

 

 

The Open One is a jacket that can easily compete, on terms of design and performance, with the top level products of brands like Patagonia, Arc’teryx, Norrøna and Peak Performance. However, there is one significant difference. The jacket costs only a fraction of its competitors.

The Open One: Fitting is designed for men

Note: Inside of the jacket is still being optimized :) F.e. Material of the front pockets will be changed to mesh and we are tweaking details like the phone pockets, headphone acces, etc. The material looks brighter than the in real.

The Open One is a so called 3-layer jacket. Meaning that it is the perfect outer-shell. Protecting you against heavy snow storms and extreme wind gusts. The 3-layer system is also known as the union system. 

Together with a base-layer (thermo) and mid-layer (soft-shell/down) you can easily adjust how warm you want to feel on the mountain. Note that the Open One does not have any insulation and by picking the right base and mid-layers you can easily wear the same jacket both during the coldest arctic days as well as the sunny spring days.

 

 

The reason we can offer this jacket, starting at €309, is that we have completely gotten rid of the unnecessary expensive steps in the jacket delivery cycle.

By cutting out the middle men the traditional mark-up is radically reduced. Meaning we can offer the same quality for a much better price.

 

 

 

 

We will produce in BSCI accredited facilities, which means that we stand for fair salaries, fair working hours and a safe environment to work in, for the people who do the actual assembly of our product.

We have a strong commitment to our impact on the environment. We will produce as clean as we can, with environmentally friendly materials as much as we can. We will not add useless hangtags and we will use recycled and recyclable materials where we can.

 

 

Martijn Jegerings, a freeskiing digital marketing expert. Has spent the last 5 years travelling between the Swiss pow fields and the office. Former Head of Marketing in the snow apparel industry.

Chris Westen has more than 16 years of experience in the snow apparel industry, with an extensive supply and production network in Asia.

He is a passionate snowboarder, with the drive to get the best the first. Specialist in translating ideas into final products, with focus on innovation. Guiding the development process from sketch to final production.

 

We don’t stop after this campaign. With your help we can really open up the outerwear industry. Because if you have nothing to hide… Why not be open about it? We promise to be:

  • Open for the changes you demand 
  • Open about our production 
  • Open about our pricing 
  • Open about our contribution to a better world.

Times that companies could hide behind expensive campaigns are over. We will be open about everything. Our success as well as our learnings.

Our mission: “We want you to fully enjoy the best days of the season and therefore we make the best products and make them affordable.”

 

 

Questions:

Of course you might still have a question. Just send us a mail at: indiegogo@open-wear.com.

Credits:

Video: Jaap Oudman
Icons: Icons8.com

Risks and challenges

The current design for the Open One has been finalized and the initial prototypes have been built and tested. We’ve already laid out our future production plan and already talked about this with our partner in manufacturing. During designing the initial prototype, we already spent some months working together with our partners.

In all matters we will always keep an open communication to our backers and update you frequently.

FAQ

Where do I have to fill in my size?
After your order you will receive a mail asking you for your desired size.

How is the fitting of this jacket?
The jacket has a normal fit, but only at the bottom part, it's a bit longer than the average jacket. This because you don't want the fresh powder to end up in between your pants and jacket.

Can I also use the jacket for my day-to-day activities?
Yes, of course. The jacket is an outershell, so depending on the layers you choose to wear below. You can easily wear it for your day-to-day activities. Just remember that the jacket was designed to ride powder and therefore has a few features like detachable powder lycra cuffs and the detachable powder skirt, that you usually won't find in a 'normal' jacket.

How warm is this jacket?
The jacket functions as an outershell. Which means it's designed to protect you against snow, rain and wind, while remaining very breathable. By choosing the layers you wear below, you can adjust the desired warmth. The jacket itself does not have any padding/insulation.

What is the weight of the jacket?
We are still optimising the weight. But we expect the jacket to be around 750-850 grams.

This because you don't want the fresh powder to end up in between your pants and jacket.Can I also use the jacket for my day-to-day activities?Yes, of course. The jacket is an outershell, so depending on the layers you choose to wear below. You can easily wear it for your day-to-day activities. Just remember that the jacket was designed to ride powder and therefore has a few features like detachable powder lycra cuffs and the detachable powder skirt, that you usually won't find in a 'normal' jacket.How warm is this jacket?The jacket functions as an outershell. Which means it's designed to protect you against snow, rain and wind, while remaining very breathable. By choosing the layers you wear below, you can adjust the desired warmth. The jacket itself does not have any padding/insulation.What is the weight of the jacket?We are still optimising the weight. But we expect the jacket to be around 750-850 grams.

story:
Is your skin having sponge problems? Making sure that your cosmetics are safe and friendly for your skin is extremely important... but what about your make-up applicator and blender? Could they be the reason why, no matter how careful you are, skin irritation won't just go away?

Skin-Friendly Ice Cream Magic We're proud to introduce you to KELLY CUSH, the world's first double-sided make-up applicator and sponge blender that is made from the same ingredients as ice cream! 

Your Skin Comes First That’s how you feel about it, and that’s what we believe too— which is why we created KELLY CUSH to be as safe as this: it successfully passed the European Union’s REACH Test, which screens out 197 Substances of Very High Concern (SVHC).

KELLY CUSH uses ice cream magic to be a latex-free and non-toxic two-in-one make-up blender that is truly hypo-allergenic, always going easy and being gentle on your skin!

Lightning Bolt or Droplet? Well, depending on what you need, you can use both!

You see, the lighting bolt side of KELLY CUSH has a texture of big pores, which is more recommendable for foundations and suncreens, giving your skin a glossy natural complexion. It's a fine layer with a soft and skin-friendly material that is also perfect when you want to remove facial oil.

Either way, KELLY CUSH works perfectly for blending both dry and wet foundation, sunscreen, blusher, concealer, powders, cream blushes, and other complexion products—you don't need any other sponges! 

You’ll also be amazed to see that KELLY CUSH is a water-activated sponge: it’s 1,97” when it’s dry and, when it’s wet, it grows to 2.52”, with a large rounded shape with the perfect width that a blender should have for quick and easy make-up, foundation and sunscreen applications.

Just Enough Using quality make-up means buying expensive make-up, but, hey, that’s what your skin needs! However, why should you waste your precious make-up with wasteful sponges?

KELLY CUSH absorbs only a minimum make-up quantity: just enough to ensure that the make-up application experience is perfect, non-wasteful, and avoiding over-usage.

 

Make the most of the shape of KELLY CUSH—use its large rounded surface for a quick application and its edge for contour and precision touches.

TESTIMONIALS

 

How to KELLY CUSH Your Skin in 6 Steps

Simply WET, SQUEEZE and BOUNCE your KELLY CUSH on your skin with your make-up product. There’s no expertise required, and you’ll get a flawless airbrushed experience.

The rounded shape of KELLY CUSH is perfect for large surfaces of your face skin and it also allows you to do eye, nose and other contours, along with letting you cover imperfections.

Just use half of the typical amount of make-up you’d use, dab it on to your KELLY CUSH and softly bounce or tap it on your face. That’s how you obtain the airbrush effect that will make you look stunning!

Keep your KELLY CUSH wet while you use it, just like professionals do. When it’s wet, your KELLY CUSH is larger and softer on your skin, and it makes a more efficient use of the make-up you use on it.

SPEC

 

We currently have a fully developed and working prototype of KELLY CUSH, so, with your support, we can manufacture it and bring it to you soon, which is why we invite you to.

Patents / Certification

 

How KELLY CUSH Was Created

Kelly always struggled with nasty skin irritations that always made her feel frustrated. No matter how careful she was with her skin and with the quality of the cosmetics she used, Kelly’s skin never felt as smooth as it should be. As a chemistry graduate, she took that as a challenge because she had a problem for which an answer and a solution were needed.

story: Zum 15.10 Veröffentlichen wir unsere Kampagne auch auf STARTNEXT, um deutschen Unterstützern mehr Zahlungsmöglichkeiten zur Verfügung zu stellen. Vielen Dank!
story_txt: Zum 15.10 Veröffentlichen wir unsere Kampagne auch auf STARTNEXT, um deutschen Unterstützern mehr Zahlungsmöglichkeiten zur Verfügung zu stellen. Vielen Dank!

story:
Our vision is to create an entry level luxury brand that can last for generations to come.
We integrate the knowledge and experience we have gained from working with other high-end iconic brands into our products.
The aspiration is to fill a void for our clientele where we can cater to an all-inclusive customer experience, during the whole customer life-cycle: before and while owning a Pedral watch. 

The after-sale service we've implemented mimics what is expected from many high-end brands, unheard of in this price category. 


The design of the dial is all about proportions and finding the balance. 
The Okapi dial is carefully designed to create a discreet, luxurious but edgy look.
The dial comes in a variety of carefully selected colors, meticulously chosen to add character, giving each piece its own symbiotic identity with the logo positioned at the 3 o’clock marker.

The collection features polished, hand applied time markers that give every timepiece their own characteristic feature. 

In addition, the sapphire glass is not simply cut and stamped, it is carved and grinded into a unique form, again giving a unique identity to each timepiece.

The watch hands have been specially customized to match the logo details on the crown and case back. 
The approach is to give our clients a refined way to catch the time easily, while giving a distinctive look without distracting features. 
The hands are a trademark feature that will be continued on future collections.

Many people purchase their watches based on aesthetic appeal and fashion trends.
By uniting the discretion and minimalism of Swedish design, while being inspired by the great icons of the 70’s, we have made our own interpretation as if the Okapi was made during this iconic period to create something bold and unique. 

The Okapi collection is our first release to the market.
The series projects through its bold outlook to challenge the conventional shape of most timepieces, regardless of price bracket or tier.

The design is sleek, eye-catching and stylish, a gender-neutral piece that is comfortable on the wrist. 

Simply stated: a bold minimalist's dream. 

Every Watch comes with an Italian calf leather strap and one additional Milanese mesh strap that matches the watch case.

Below you´ll find the collection and color combinations we offer for this campaign (you can choose if you want a Quartz or an Automatic version)

The Okapi Quartz is powered by a Swiss Made Ronda 1069,
The movement is considered a high-end quartz movement.
The Ronda 1069 uses 6 jewels as bearings. (These jewels are small but important components in your watch that reduce friction between metal parts).

Arthur - Stainless 316L Steel with blue dial


Carmen - Stainless 316L Steel with grey dial

Elsa - Yellow Gold with green dial​

Jonas - Rose Gold with black dial

 Viktoria - Black plated with black dial

 

Specifications: Okapi Quartz
Case Size: 38mm x 8,2mm  
Dial: Sunburst with hand-applied polished markers 
Crystal: Sapphire with double layer anti reflective coating  
Strap: Full grain Italian calf leather + One additional Milanese mesh strap  
Movement: Swiss Made Ronda 1069
Lug Width: 20mm 
Water Resistance: Waterproof up to 5 ATM

 

The Okapi Kinetic is powered  by Miyota movements.The movement manufacturer is one of Japan's oldest watchmakers and have been producing movements since 1918. 

Our collection uses the reliable movements from their Cal.8245 which means the watch is powered by the kinetic energy generated from the movements of your arm.
By choosing the Miyota movements we can provide quality automatic watches at an unbeatable price.  

 

Specifications: Okapi Kinetic
Case Size: 38mm x 11mm 
Dial: Two Layer sunburst with hand-applied polished markers 
Crystal: Sapphire with double layer anti reflective coating 
Strap: Full grain Italian calf leather + One additional Milanese mesh strap 
Case back: Screw down with a mineral glass window to show the movement
Movement: Automatic Miyota 8245 
Lug Width: 20mm 
Water Resistance: Waterproof up to 5 ATM

We give all of our Indiegogo backers and pledgers the possibility to pre-register and be a part of an exclusive group that will receive early access and special offers as an essential part of our design and manufacturing processes for future collections.

About Us!

We are two childhood friends from Stockholm with a great passion for design and watches with the objective to start our own  small design studio, with the main focus on minimalist contemporary Scandinavian design and the belief that things should be made to last.

Our vision is to create and design entry level luxury products that can last for generations to come.
We integrate the knowledge and experience we have gained from working with design and other high-end iconic brands into our products.
The aspiration is to fill a void for our clientele where we can cater to an all-inclusive customer experience, during the whole customer life-cycle: before and while owning a Pedral watch. 

The after-sale service we've implemented mimics what is expected from many high-end brands, unheard of in this price category. 

Social Media

Make sure to follow and support our social media outlets as well. 
Especially on Instagram where we frequently post new pictures as often as we can.
Instagram is also where you will find more inspiration on how to combine different watches with different straps for different outfits.

Risks & Challenges.

The factory we work with is a reputable watch factory with a solid background of creating good quality watches for many brands.

The communication with the factory has been fast and smooth to say at least. 
We’re happy to say that they are as focused on quality and perfection as we are.

We have reduced the risk of manufacturing delays in the best way possible by good communication and solid prototype work. Of course one can never be fully certain when it comes to manufacturing and the estimated delivery time is only an estimation.

We have set a delivery time to late March/mid April 2019 because we really believe we can keep that timeline and will do everything in our power to do so.

 To ensure stress levels remain low for you as a contributors and us who deliver, we’ve done all the prototyping and changes back-and-forth already. We gave the green light for this campaign only when we were absolutely satisfied with the results.
That, along with high quality equipment and hard-earned experience, will ensure as smooth of a ride onward as possible.

To further guarantee that every watch is created to our high standards we will keep a constant contact with our factory and we will have quality controls both at the factory and in Sweden before shipping the watches to our Backers.

Nevertheless we will keep you, our backers, up to date during every step of the production process and we will always be as transparent as possible if any obstacles should appear.

We hope this will be a smooth process for us and for you.

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. 
Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one.
We're sorry that we can't put a magic stamp on our packages to help them get through faster.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help us reach our goal:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign on your social media, telling people why you love the Okapi
  • Post on your favourite watch forums (www.watchuseek.com / www.klocksnack.se / www.reddit.com/r/watches/ and a lot more), 
  • Sharing the Okapi with other watch lovers, tell your watch loving friends about the Okapi, 
  • Tell your non-watch lovings friends who really do need to start wearing a watch from Pedral ;-)  
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Rotate the inner ring to discover the true value inside.

DIACS Kunst introduces its first ring, TurnRing. Appreciate its absolutely unique design, as TurnRing expresses beauty unseen ever before.

DIACS Kunst’s TurnRing helps express your true appeal as the ring’s unique design subtly shows the world its inner beauty.

 

Introducing TurnRing

I: The Intricate Metal Design work

  • In consideration of its material, the design incorporates 2 rings that move freely of each other, and through a scientific design approach, there’s no worry of the inner ring falling out on its own, but they can be separated from each other with little effort.

II: The Expression of Subtle Beauty

  • While on the finger, the outer ring moves freely to subtly show the inner ring’s DIACS design, as well as express the wearer’s subtle tastes in style.

III: Different Color Arrangements for Differing Expressions of Style

  • The TurnRing comes in 3 different colors. As it is designed to be separated easily, the inner and outer rings can be interchanged to cater and express differing tastes in fashion.

 

  • For our 1st campaign, we provide 1 color combination (INRING: silver, OUTRING: black) and 2 types of OUTRING. 

IV: The Inner Ring Along is Enough

  • And for those days you wish to no longer hide yourself and want to express yourself to the world, the inner ring alone can help you do just that. There’s no need to purchase the other rings. TurnRing alone can help you express the many you

 

OUR TIMELINE

DIACS Size info.

DIACS provides its ring: TurnRing with the size of 17, 18, 19, 20. 

For the ones who needs a size converter, please refer to the info. below, 

 

About DIACS Kunst

DIACS Kunst derives from “DIACS” for electronic circuitry, merged with the German word for “art.” By combining industrial design with fashion, our designs express masculine images in new conceptual men’s fashion, as we attempt to tear down the barriers between the two through creativity and diversity. DIACS Kunst promises to stay true to individuality, adding refined uniqueness to your look.

Risks & Challenges

Initial Sample:  

We have already built several samples by ourselves and will arrange our manufacturer to build it for us in a timely manner once the Indiegogo campaign is successful. There's a small chance we may have to extend our sampling period if the initial sample fails.

Production:  

A factory specializing in manufacturing metal in a specialized shapes will help to  finalize the rings including postprocess. And upon the completion of the campaign, we will arrange a pilot production to verify all the tools, processes and finished product immediately. So production delays are unlikely.  

Shipment:  

  • We will ship them to anywhere in the world via tracked shipment, so we don't expect any issues.

story:
Who am I?

Hello, my name is Constantin, I am 20 years old and originally I am from Republic of Moldova, a small country located in Eastern Europe, famous for it's great wines, picturesque landscapes, high level of corruption and poverty. At the moment I moved to Netherlands in search of a better life and I started my bachelor in Business and Economics at University of Groningen.  From the age of 16 I was helping my grandfather to run his workshop, which was producing handmade shoes. Unfortunately, because of his health issues, our family took the decision that it is better for him to close his shop and to retire. I decided to continue his work. A friend  and decided that we will unite our forces and will open our own workshop. At the beginning it was really hard, no one knew about us and we were struggling to pay for our materials and rent. After a few months, everything changed, our costumers loved out products and shared their impressions with their friends and relatives. Soon enough we started having much more orders. It was one of the most beautiful period of my life until the corona pandemic hit the world and affected our business too. We went bankrupt and that's when I decided that it will be better to emigrate and start my life from an empty page, but the thought that I gave up so easily haunts me every day... 

About my products.

I have a decent experience in producing handmade leather accessories. All products are made from premium Italian leather. Before shipping, the products are verified to exclude the possibility  of a production defect.

 What I am asking?

A lot teenagers don't know what they want to do in the future, but I do. I don't want to give up my dream because I don't have the necessary amount  of money to start it all over again. At the moment I am working as a delivery guy, but I don't make much money, and in addition to this, I spend them all on rent, utilities and paying for my studies. I would kindly ask you to support me in order to be able to reopen my workshop. I have dedicated a good amount of time on creating leather goods and I am sure that I will be able to open one in the Netherlands. At the beginning, I will need a place where I can work in peace, I already found a small room which can be used. After that the materials and tools will be bought. That's basically all I need. In the future I want to create a web-site, where all my products will be posted.

My works.

Below are shown the products which I created and these will be the accessories the bakers will get as a reward, they are a great present for Christmas, New Year or Birthday. Even if you are not interested in purchasing a leather product, please tell your friends about me, it will be a great help to achieve my goal. Thank You!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

If you have some questions you can contact me on : co.cainarean@gmail.com

At the moment I moved to Netherlands in search of a better life and I started my bachelor in Business and Economics at University of Groningen.  From the age of 16 I was helping my grandfather to run his workshop, which was producing handmade shoes. Unfortunately, because of his health issues, our family took the decision that it is better for him to close his shop and to retire. I decided to continue his work. A friend  and decided that we will unite our forces and will open our own workshop. At the beginning it was really hard, no one knew about us and we were struggling to pay for our materials and rent. After a few months, everything changed, our costumers loved out products and shared their impressions with their friends and relatives. Soon enough we started having much more orders. It was one of the most beautiful period of my life until the corona pandemic hit the world and affected our business too. We went bankrupt and that's when I decided that it will be better to emigrate and start my life from an empty page, but the thought that I gave up so easily haunts me every day... About my products.I have a decent experience in producing handmade leather accessories. All products are made from premium Italian leather. Before shipping, the products are verified to exclude the possibility  of a production defect. What I am asking?A lot teenagers don't know what they want to do in the future, but I do. I don't want to give up my dream because I don't have the necessary amount  of money to start it all over again. At the moment I am working as a delivery guy, but I don't make much money, and in addition to this, I spend them all on rent, utilities and paying for my studies. I would kindly ask you to support me in order to be able to reopen my workshop. I have dedicated a good amount of time on creating leather goods and I am sure that I will be able to open one in the Netherlands. At the beginning, I will need a place where I can work in peace, I already found a small room which can be used. After that the materials and tools will be bought. That's basically all I need. In the future I want to create a web-site, where all my products will be posted.My works.Below are shown the products which I created and these will be the accessories the bakers will get as a reward, they are a great present for Christmas, New Year or Birthday. Even if you are not interested in purchasing a leather product, please tell your friends about me, it will be a great help to achieve my goal. Thank You!                   If you have some questions you can contact me on : co.cainarean@gmail.com

story:
How it works

 

We created the Best Shirt Ever using a patented finishing process that transforms standard cotton into the ultimate performance material. This process starts with combining alternating yarns of hydrophobic and hydrophilic cotton giving it the ability to wick moisture away from your body while also providing protection from water and stains. This allows the garment to repel sweat and water, dry 40% faster than an untreated cotton shirt, and maintain cotton’s natural ability to breathe.

  

What’s The Catch? Why Isn’t Every Shirt Like This?

There are challenges to making this shirt, but they primarily impact us (the producer), and not you (the consumer). The reasons why you haven't seen these shirts at your local department store yet are as follows:

1. The Technology We Are Using Is New - The technology we are using to create The Best Shirt Ever is very new, and larger companies typically take longer to adapt to new trends.

2. The Fabric Is Expensive - The tech fabric we use costs 200%-300% as much as comparable cotton fabrics that do not have tech finishings.

3. The Fabric Needs To Be Specially Milled For Each Color - The good news is that we created a stainproof shirt. The bad news is - we can’t dye this shirt. This limits our ability to offer a wide variety of colors, as each color needs to be specially milled by our fabric supplier.

4. Slow Fashion - Much of the fashion industry is gravitating towards “fast fashion”.  Fast fashion focuses on churning out trendy clothing as quickly and as cheaply as possible. Zara and H&M pioneered this model so that they could distribute on trend, inexpensive and disposable clothing before any of their competitors. Since trends don't last long, fast fashion brands don't worry if their clothes fall apart after a few wears. With the industry moving towards fast fashion models, it's hard to find classic, high-quality wardrobe staples that fit well and last. At Clickbait Clothing, by focusing on timeless staples of every man’s wardrobe at an accessible price point, we can spend the time perfecting and iterating to create a better button-down. We'll never be fast fashion. We're ok with that.

 

Our Story

Three years ago, we launched Speakeasy Briefs - Men’s Underwear With A Secret Pocket - on Kickstarter. The Kickstarter community enabled us to follow our entrepreneurial dream, and we responded by delivering premium quality underwear to our backers. We didn't have a background in fashion, but a funny thing happened on the way to the underwear factory...we learned how to make great clothing! Speakeasy Briefs have an average rating of 4.8 stars out of 5 on over 200 customer reviews.

We are offering Speakeasy Briefs at a discounted price to our Kickstarter backers during our campaign to help us raise as much money as possible for the Best Shirt Ever. Speakeasy Briefs are available in 4 sizes (Small-XL), and 3 colors (Black, Blue, Red).

 

We Need Your Help

We believe that this shirt is awesome and it needs to exist. We don’t have the resources to pay for a full production run ourselves, and we need your help. We have already invested 18 months of our time and over $10,000 of our own money in preparation for this campaign, and with your support, we can bring a better button down to the masses.

We included our first Kickstarter product in this campaign for 2 reasons:

1) We wanted to show our backers that we can deliver. If you back our project and we reach our funding goal, you will get your shirt. That is a guarantee. We have done this before, and we know infinitely more today than we did 3 years ago.

2)  We are hoping to raise more than our goal so that we can offer a wider variety of colors and styles than we can currently offer.

 

Styles and Colors

 

 

Sizing

 

 

  

Rewards

  

Production Timeline 

 

Help Us Spread The Word

story:
Women’s lives have changed radically, but our jeans have not caught up and we have to sacrifice comfort and utility for style. Not any more. Introducing RADIAN JEANS - deep yet subtle pockets, 4-way stretch, temperature regulation and many other features!

Available in S (28"), M (30") or L(32") Inseam lengths

How to use this chart:  Please refer to our sizing chart to choose your jeans size that fits best. 

IF YOU'D LIKE TO SEE MORE SIZES, PLEASE HELP US OUT BY FILLING A SHORT SURVEY  

If you'd like to see our beta testers wearing Radian Jeans and their reviews, please see our Instagram:  instagram.com/radianjeans 

Textile factories require minimum orders to include us in their production runs. With your pledges, we will be able to hit production minimums and jump-start manufacturing. Every single one of your pledges matters in helping us reach that goal! If we exceed our goal it will also allow us to explore other innovative ideas and keep bringing women the most helpful, innovative and high quality fashion out there!

story:
Be fully immersed with Feelreal - the first patented multisensory mask for VR capable of simulating smell, rain, wind, vibration, punches and more!

 

You’ll be transported into different worlds with the combination of scent, mist, heat, wind, and vibration. This is what VR was meant to be.

 

Feelreal is a multisensory mask that, when attached with your VR headset, gives you a full sensory experience in your VR environment. From smell to temperature to vibration, you’ll have all your senses firing as you dive into new worlds.

Experience over 255 unique aromas and combine them to create out-of-this-world scentscapes that will teleport you anywhere you imagine - past, present, future, or fantasy.

Because smells trigger the strongest neurological reaction to memory and emotions, you’ll be transporting your entire body and brain to the environment of your choice subconsciously - making your virtual experience even more immersive.

Plus, your sense of smell is closely integrated with your sense of taste, allowing you to get extremely close to tasting items in VR.

Be fully immersed in a world of smells, scents, and tastes and encounter a whole new way to engage with your imagination.

Check out our Feelreal Dreams Aroma Set!  We also included Patchouli Aroma Capsule in each set as a bonus - try using Feelreal for relaxing aromatherapy session.

Feel the wind in your face as you race to the finish line, the mist of the forest as you stalk your prey, or the pouring rain while you battle in a storm.

 

Your VR fire doesn’t have to be cold anymore. Trigger heat or cold to fully experience your environment. Micro-coolers and micro-heaters let you sense the cool chill of the mountain air or be surrounded by the warm desert gust of your virtual world.

You can even program temperature effects for objects and events. Experience the scorching heat of a dragon’s flame or the icy blast of a winter storm.

And if you’re ever getting too heated during your VR session, the temperature mechanism can help cool you down and defog your headset. No more sweaty mask rings!

 

But we didn’t stop there. Haptic Feedback Motors create vibrations that you can feel through your face. Whether it’s a punch from an opponent, a high-speed motorcycle chase, or the rumble of a dragon’s roar, you’ll FEEL the vibrations resonating through your face and body.

Fully immerse yourself and your body into whole new worlds. Sense the physical touch of interactions with characters and events in your adventures. This is next level VR. 

 

There are no limitations with Feelreal. Enhance your entertainment, your gaming, even your meditations and home environment with scents, weather simulation, and haptic vibrations!

Feelreal supports a variety of media forms and already has a few ready-to-experience tracks for you to enjoy when you receive yours!

 

Open 360 videos with Feelreal player and watch them like never before! Download existing Feelreal tracks from our expanding online library or ​create your own to share with friends.

Feel the rush of mountain air as you wingsuit down the Alps or smell the ancient, mystical scent of Fangorn Forest. With Feelreal, you’ll experience your favorite movies and videos in a whole new way!

 

Transform the way you game. Feelreal supports several popular VR games and experiences right out of the box. Feel the heat and force of an exploding rocket, experience the blast of cold winter wind as you ride a dragon, and smell the gunpowder and earthy scent of rotting flesh as you fight off hordes of zombies.

Fully immerse yourself in your fantasy world and smell, feel, sense everything like you’re actually there. 

 

Jump into one of the amazing worlds created by our developers and independent creators designed specifically to stimulate your senses. With every door you open and each choice you make, you’ll explore new sensual possibilities and broaden your scope of experience.

Dive deep into relaxation and presence as you enjoy not just the sights and sound but also the scents and sensations of your favorite meditation environments. Drift into a remote beach while you feel the gentle ocean breeze or breath in the relaxing aroma of fresh pine leaves in a still forest.

Be fully immersed and sink into the sights, sounds, and smells of a powerful meditation retreat. You can even set your own preferred aromas to jumpstart your body into a meditative state.

 

With vibration, smell, heat, and air, you know Adult VR will get even better. You’ll be able to smell the perfume, feel the soothing breath on your lips, and even experience the tingle of a kiss on your cheek. Full sensory VR means maximum sensual stimulation.

You can even use Feelreal without a VR headset and control it via mobile app. Use it as your own personal aromatherapy device and get relaxing or focus-inducing scents wherever you go.

The most powerful sensory system is our ability to smell. Scents are processed through your olfactory bulb, which is closely related to the area of your brain which processes memories and emotions. No other sensory system passes through this same area, so the only way to trigger these deep emotional feelings is through smell.

Adding scents to your virtual experience creates a surge of emotions, memories, and sensation that is only paralleled by actual reality. By seeing, hearing, and smelling your environment, you’ll be fully immersed and lost in your virtual world. VR will become reality to your senses, and you’ll experience immersion like never before. 

Get ready to Feelreal.

 

The synchronization of your visual, auditory, motor, temperature, and olfactory (smell) senses through your VR headset combined with Feelreal allows you to completely transport your body and mind into whole worlds and environments without ever leaving your room.

Every one of your senses is engaged - making your body feel and your mind think that you are in a separate reality. Besides a full body haptic suit, there is nothing more virtually immersive than this. You’re in the action, the rush, the fantasy - and you can FEEL it. 

It’s like you’re actually there - for real.

 

We developed a reliable scent generator that holds an easily replaceable cartridge containing 9 individual aroma capsules. Choose and combine any of the 255 scents available! Install and change them depending on your VR experience.

Our scents are all marked by our CleanScent guarantee. We only use absolutely safe sources and practices to create our aromas, so you can experience your worlds without worry.

All our aromas are exclusively designed by acclaimed perfumer, olfactologist, and perfume critic, Bogdan Zubchenko. Combining techniques from over 20 years of experience, Bogdan created and designed a plethora of memorable and diverse aromas and scentscapes to give you the ultimate smell sensory experience!

 

Feelreal is equipped with two force feedback haptic motors that kick in when there is a perceived impact, touch, or force in your virtual world. You’ll feel the punch of an opponent and shake with the trembles of monster’s roar through the powerful touch of vibrations. This makes the experience so much more real.

We used an ultrasonic ionizing system to create water mists that can be sprayed at you for the visceral sense of liquid on your face. The system is silent and controlled - so it won’t interrupt your session.

Whether it’s rain, an ocean spray, mist in a forest, or the spit of some dungeon creature, you’ll feel it and be thrown even deeper into your virtual experience!

 

Dual micro-coolers and a micro-heater generate temperature and weather functions - allowing you to feel a hot breath or a cool breeze. The micro-coolers blow cool air to your face to simulate wind, while the micro-heater warms up the air in your mask to simulate heat coming from a fire or the environment.

The temperature simulators can also be used to regulate your own body temperature and help defog your VR headset. Cool off while you level up and continue swinging your swords and lightsabers without worry of a sweaty mask afterwards.

 

We worked hard to make sure Feelreal doesn’t intrude on your VR session. That’s why we spent extraordinary effort designing the mask to be as lightweight and as easy to use as possible.

Feelreal uses a magnetic mount to firmly attach itself to your headset and only weighs 7oz (200g)! That’s as light as a hamster! No fumbling around with attachments and no significant additional weight to your face.

We designed replaceable headset adapter for each compatible headset. If you change or upgrade your headset, you can simply purchase a new adapter rather than buying a new Mask!

Explore the VR multiverse with no extra burden to hold you down.

 

Feelreal is ready to use out of the box! From receiving your mask to experiencing its magic, we designed Feelreal to be a completely seamless experience.

After attaching the magnetic mount system, simply insert your scent cartridges, snap on the mask, and you’re good to go! The mask uses bluetooth or WiFi to connect with your headset so no wires are needed.

 

Feelreal connects with any VR headset. Whether it’s PC, console, or even a phone setup, you’ll be able to experience full-immersion VR with your preferred platform.

We already have several titles ready for you to experience when you get your own Feelreal, and there’s much more coming soon! From zombies, to dragons, to Youtube 360 and our own created worlds - you’ll have no shortage of full sensory experiences to enjoy on first release!

Not seeing your favorite title supported? Don’t worry! Adding Feelreal support is super easy! 

Our free Feelreal Video Editor lets you easily add scent and sensory tracks to any movie, video, or 360 recording. It works almost like subtitles - simply drag your preferred effect in the timeline over your desired scene an save the Aroma Track. Open the track in Feelreal Video Player and enjoy the experience or share it with fellow fans through our online library.

Game developers can use our SDK for Unity and Unreal Engine to easily patch sensory effects into their games and experiences. Our SDK offers unprecedented creative possibilities to immerse players into your virtual worlds!   

VR has allowed us to step into amazing, awesome, and utterly unique worlds. Through it, we’ve been able to escape on epic adventures and experience things we would never experience prior.

Until now, those experiences were limited to only two senses - limiting your ability to fully immerse. Your conscience still partially remained in the reality outside the headset because your other senses were not engaged in the virtual world. 

Emotionally, you may have been detached, because smell, your major sense associated with memory and emotion, was not being stimulated in your simulations.

With Feelreal, all your senses will be firing through your VR experience. Get totally lost in the dreamscapes of virtual reality and experience full immersion as you smell, feel, and sense every environment, gust of wind, forceful punch, and delightful scent. 

Witness virtual reality blend with actual reality as aromas, memories, and feelings enter your experiences, and be ready to Feelreal.

 

Don’t see your platform? Message us, and we’ll see what we can do!

Feelreal Dreams Basic Aroma Set includes the following scents:

 

 

We are a team of hardworking engineers and designers lead by visionary entrepreneur. To be honest as people we’re quite a diverse bunch. Some of us love tech and all the coolest new gadgets, others adore poetry and immersive theater. But we all share a common passion for VR and entertainment. Every one of us vividly remembers their first time trying VR helmet and the feeling of sheer excitement after teleporting into new reality. But we always felt that it’s capable of even more

Now we feel extremely proud that we finally have the opportunity to break the boundaries of what was thought possible and introduce new dimensions to our favorite medium. And we’re focused and determined to get every little detail right.

And special thanks to everyone who worked with us over the years to create the Multisensory VR Mask!

Your conscience still partially remained in the reality outside the headset because your other senses were not engaged in the virtual world. Emotionally, you may have been detached, because smell, your major sense associated with memory and emotion, was not being stimulated in your simulations.With Feelreal, all your senses will be firing through your VR experience. Get totally lost in the dreamscapes of virtual reality and experience full immersion as you smell, feel, and sense every environment, gust of wind, forceful punch, and delightful scent. Witness virtual reality blend with actual reality as aromas, memories, and feelings enter your experiences, and be ready to Feelreal. Don’t see your platform? Message us, and we’ll see what we can do!Feelreal Dreams Basic Aroma Set includes the following scents:  
  
 We are a team of hardworking engineers and designers lead by visionary entrepreneur. To be honest as people we’re quite a diverse bunch. Some of us love tech and all the coolest new gadgets, others adore poetry and immersive theater. But we all share a common passion for VR and entertainment. Every one of us vividly remembers their first time trying VR helmet and the feeling of sheer excitement after teleporting into new reality. But we always felt that it’s capable of even moreNow we feel extremely proud that we finally have the opportunity to break the boundaries of what was thought possible and introduce new dimensions to our favorite medium. And we’re focused and determined to get every little detail right.
 And special thanks to everyone who worked with us over the years to create the Multisensory VR Mask!

story:
A New World Order is impossible to achieve alone, it requires the efforts of the inspired. 

So we present this calling: 

To all who believe themselves to be the socially outcasted, on the outside looking in on the stagnant societies of the world. 

If you consider yourself to be a Freak, Geek, or Monster, join us. 

Join the “Crüminati”.

We need your help. 

Being a 100% DIY organization, keeping up with growing production demands, requires us to take our printing set up to the next level. At our core, from design and print to package and ship, Skeletön Crüe is a 2 person operation. We are also very proud to be an environmentally aware brand, using only naturally based cleaners and printing inks. However, in order to successfully grow this way, we are in desperate need to evolve, we need to rise to our next level so we can better supply you with new, more epic, and eco-friendly products with a faster and more efficient turnaround time.  

Crüminati and The Oder of the Skull  

As a member of the Crüminati you will be a vital element in the fulfillment of Skeletön Crüe’s evolution. 

A Crüminati membership is a onetime opportunity, and the benefits of devoting yourself to our underground society are bounteous and eternal. 

Every membership comes with a limited press Skeletön Crüe one-shot tee and sticker set, featuring our new “Crüminati" logo. As an added perk to being a member of the Cruminati you will regularly receive monthly discount codes on select Skeletön Crüe products, and early access to all new Skeletön Crüe items and collectables. 

But if it’s trüe devotion you seek.. 

There will be none higher, in our society, than those who chose to devote themselves to “The Order of The Skull”. As a member of The Order you will receive all the same perks as the prior but with the added gift of the highly sought after Skeletön Crüe presents: HANK 3 DVD, recut and rebranded specifically for this campaign. The DVD will include more musical performances from an array of underground artists, (including Blitzkid, Koffin Katts, Mike Herrera of MXPX, and more), all from, Skeletön Crüe founder, Rev. Jay Leal’s personal video vault. This will be the only time this particular DVD will be offered. 

If you chose to donate to our Evolution campaign, you will be playing a curtail part in the history of Skeletön Crüe, you will become a legend in our eyes and we will be forever grateful for your gratitude. 

Meeting, and hopefully exceeding, our goal will enable us to put projects and concepts into production that we are now only dreaming of with our current printing set up. 

Surpassing this goal will only allow us to further evolve, expanding on our already ever-growing catalogue with even better production and turnaround times. 

If by chance we don’t meet our goal, we will still use the funds we are given via this campaign and  put them towards the inevitable evolution of Skeletön Crüe. We are here to stay, on a never ending quest to better this planet. 

If you are unable to contribute monetarily, any help that you can provide is in no way less valuable to our cause. Hit the streets and help us spread the word, the more people who know the better our odds are of being able to change this world for the better. 

Thank You for your time and interest,          

The Skeletön Crüe 

www.TheSkeletonCrue.com

story:
We're heading into production! Check out our website: http://theprimalprofessional.com/

For more frequent updates, Like us at https://www.facebook.com/thePrimalProfessional&... for the big, monthly updates straight to your inbox, subscribe to our newsletter http://eepurl.com/i2egb  

---

The best way to describe the Primal Professional? They are...

 

Our Story

My name is Mountain, and like you, I enjoy walking, running, lifting, playing, and doing pretty much everything barefoot. It all started in 2009. From the 4-Hour Workweek blog and the book Born to Run, I discovered barefoot running. It made sense. It felt right. 6 months later, I completed the LA Marathon, bare soles to the road for 26 miles.

From then, there was no turning back. But I still had to spend five days a week in a business environment. What's a modern caveman to do? On a casual Friday, I wore my FiveFingers and my colleagues freaked out. This is not a good thing for an accountant. So I put up with my regular work shoe until one day. I came home, so frustrated with the thick heels that I tried to trim them down with a hand saw. It didn't work as I imagined, and the shoes were just ruined. 

It was in this moment, this moment of failure, that inspiration struck. We need a shoe that has the barefoot feel we love, with the classic look people expect. A shoe for Primal Professionals. Whether you work an office, a restaurant, a hospital, or a beat, the Primal Professional, with its slip-resistant sole, is for professionals from all walks of life. 

Features

 I set out to create a shoe that looks indistinguishable from the most conservative Oxford. A shoe you could wear through a job interview and into a black tie affair. Without compromising barefoot comfort. How is this possible? We came up with a couple tricks of the eye that you'll love.
 
The best way to illustrate the key features of the Primal Professional is to compare them against a Traditional shoe, and earlier attempts at a barefoot dress shoe.  A Traditional shoe has a heel lift, arch support, and a thick sole. We hate these things, but they're what people expect visually of dress shoes. Earlier attempts take a dressy upper and attach it to a flat sole, so there's no heel lift, no arch support, and a thin sole, but dressy looks are lost. Through creative design, our patent-pending Time CapSole allows the best of both worlds. While it may look like there is a heel lift and arch support, those structures are actually hollow, and allow the foot to sit flat inside for a real barefoot feel.
 
Another key feature of the Primal Professional is the innovative shape. A Traditional shoe has a dressy, narrow tip, but it severely constricts the toes. An earlier attempt shoe might try a wider tip, but that looks too casual. In developing our shoe, we identified where the toes are within the toebox, allowed ample space for them up to that point, then dramatically tapered everything thereafter into a dressy tip. Tricks of the eye. Like a hunter-gatherer in camouflage.
 

Pride

As a minimalist, the last thing I want is another cheap consumable made from exploited workers and environmental pollution. Without compromise, this shoe had to be made ethically and sustainably. By searching locally for vendors, nearly every part of our product is proudly made in the USA, with only the lasts made next door in Mexico. The leather in our shoes, tanned in Wisconsin, comes from Texas steers. Our unique outsoles are made in Missouri, as are the molds that make those outsoles. Our design was done by an artist in California.
 
Sustainability isn't just about manufacturing, but also how long that product lasts. To keep the Primal Professional on your feet, and out of a landfill, we had to ensure the very best build quality.  The final product is being assembled by Weinbrenner, an employee-owned company in Wisconsin whose high caliber shoes have carried America's heroes for 120 years, including the brave firemen on 9/11. We are proud to say the Primal Professional is made in the USA, by a shoemaker that produces some of the finest, most durable footwear in the world.

story:
What's this all about?

We're pro-life. We're pro-peace. We're a group of young people with an aim to change the world by framing the arguments and activism for human rights from a holistic perspective that promotes nonviolence and nonaggression.

These shirts are both a chance for you to wear your convictions on your sleeve and a great opportunity to open doors to greater conversation. We believe that these shirts can help elevate the discourse and that they pose the challenging questions to the inconsistent, the disaffected, and the apathetic.

We know that our generation is poised to make change -- will you help us change hearts and minds?

What We Need & What You Get

This time around, our shirts really do represent a consistent ethic of life not only in the designs, but also in the production process - this is why we need your help!

  • All shirts will be ethically produced: both sweatshop-free AND printed with eco-friendly inks by a  local Pittsburgh print shop.
  • Due to the sweatshop-free nature of the shirts this time around, our production price has increased substantially -- we need more money to get off the ground in the first place. The increase in per-shirt price is looking at something close to $3: this is due both to the improved multi-color designs as well as the ethically-sourced shirts.
  •  If we reach $900, we will print 1 design. If we reach $1800, we will print 2 designs. If we reach $2700 (that's our goal), we will print 3 designs. 
  • We know people are loving ALL of the designs you voted on, so as an added bonus, if we reach $3500 in fundraising, we will print an EXTRA design (3+1) to be made available at the same time as the rest of our shirts -- voting for this design will be sent to a run-off on our Facebook page upon fulfillment. 

The Impact

Your individual contribution will help us in manifold ways:

  • We are able to demonstrate our pro-every-life values by printing on sweatshop-free shirts!
  • We help each campaign contributor by including some of our educational materials in each package -- both elevating the discourse with what we wear and in how we approach the arguments for human rights and the right to life.
  • Each shirt we sell gets us closer to being able to effectively attend conferences and activism events all over the US.

Risks & Challenges

Because we've worked with this print shop before, we're not too worried about production, but reaching our goals is certainly going to be more challenging than in past years!

  • We've grown our fan base and our outreach and I think we are well equipped to reach our fundraising goals.
  • The most important part of this campaign is YOUR sharing and outreach with friends and activist partners who YOU believe will appreciate our message and our goals. If you want all of the designs printed to ensure you get your favorite shirt, then share like crazy!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

  • Please share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and with your family and friends!
